record.title: 880-02 Ḥilyat al-lubb al-maṣūn bi-sharḥ al-Jawhar al-maknūn : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Inna afḍala mā taḥallat bi-hi jiyād al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān, wa-tabāhat bi-badīʻ unsihi qulūb ahl al-ʻirfān, al-thanāʼ ʻalá Allāh al-mukhtaṣṣ ʻalá al-ḥaqīqah bi-al-kamāl, al-munazzah fī dhātihi wa-ṣifātihi ʻan shāʼibat al-mithāl. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afṣaḥ al-anām Muḥammad alladhī balagha al-musnad ilayhi ghāyat al-marām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ṭayyibīn al-bādhilīn nufūsahum fī tashyīd qawāʻid al-dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-rājī min Mawlāhu al-khurūj min sijn al-taqṣīr Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī mattaʻahu Allāh bi-ḥuṣūl āmālih, wa-manna ʻalayhi bi-kamāl al-tawfīq fī aqwālih wa-afʻālih: Hādhā bayān lil-risālah al-mawsūmah bi-al-Jawhar al-maknūn fī ʻilm al-bayān lil-ʻārif billāh taʻālá Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Akhḍarī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi, qad iltamasahu minnī al-ʻAllāmah al-nabīl wa-al-niḥrīr al-darrākah al-jalīl Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sūsī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-thāniyah al-taysīr ʻalá al-nās.
17 x 23 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: The manuscript is wraped in thick paper cover.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; verses of "al-Jawhar al-maknūn" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Ḥilyat al-lubb al-maṣūn."
On folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhu Ḥilyat al-lubb al-maṣūn bi-sharḥ al-Jawhar al-maknūn ..."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Wa-yanbaghī li-ṣāḥibi al-kalāmi // taʼannuqun fī al-badʼ wa-al-khitāmi. Bi-ḥasbi al-ibtidā bi-al-ilmāʻ // wa-ḥusni al-iqtiṣāri wa-al-ibdāʻi. Fī ākhiri ʻudhūbati al-tarkībi // wa-jūdihā fī al-maṭlaʻi al-qarībi. Wa-min simāti ..."
al-Jawhar al-maknūn starts with: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-badīʻi al-hādī // ilá bayāni mahyaʻi al-rashādī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Hidāyat al-Malik al-Mutaʻāl fī ithbāt karāmāt al-awliyāʼ baʻda al-intiqāl : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Asqāṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Suʼāl warada ʻalá ʻulamāʼ Miṣr bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azhar, sanat thalāth wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, wa-huwa: Mā qawlukum, dāma faḍlukum, fī rajul ankara karāmāt al-awliyāʼ baʻda al-mawt, muddaʻiyan anna takhlīṣ al-asīr lā yaṣiḥḥu an yaqaʻa karāmatan li-Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Badawī, li-kawnihi bāṭilan wa-kadhiban wa-mamnūʻan, mustadillan ʻalá dhālika, bi-annahu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, lam yaqaʻ la-hu baʻda al-mawt takhlīṣ al-asīr, li-kawnihi lā taṣrīfa la-hu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, Ḥāshāhu min dhālik, fa-kayfa yaṣiḥḥu wuqūʻuhu li-ghayrihi min al-awliyāʼ. Fa-mādhā yulzimuhu fī dhālik, baʻda bayān ibṭālih? Afīdū al-jawāb wa-lakum al-thawāb ..."
Secundo folio: bi-daʻwá al-nubūwah yakūnu muʻjizah.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi risālah tusammá 'Hidāyat al-Malik al-Mutaʻāl fī ithbāt karāmāt al-awliyāʼ baʻda al-intiqāl'. wa-hiya suʼāl kataba ʻalayhi al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Asqāṭī al-Ḥanafī, wa-al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Bulaydī al-Mālikī, wa-al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-ʻAzīzī al-Shāfiʻī, wa-al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī."

On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations about miracles: "Qāla fī al-Nahr [could not be identified], naqlan ʻan al-Qarāfī al-Mālikī [probably Aḥmad ibn Idrīs al-Qarāfī, died 1285]: Wa-iʻlam annahu dhakara fī 'Qawāʻidihi' an min al-ḥarām ayḍan an yasʼala Allāh ayḍan an yajʻalahu fī makānayn mutabāʻidayn fī zaman wāḥid, wa-an yasʼala al-mustaḥīlāt al-ʻāriyah, ka-nuzūl al-māʼidah illā an yakūna nabīyan aw walīyan. Intahá." "Qawluhu wa-al-ṭayarān fī al-hawāʼ, kamā nuqila ʻan Jaʻfar ibn Abī Ṭālib, rawāhu jamāʻah, minhum al-Tirmidhī wa-al-Ḥākim, wa-fī isnādihi ḍuʻf, lākin la-hu shāhid min Ḥadīth ʻAlī ʻan Ibn Saʻd, anna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: Raʼaytu Jaʻfar ibn Abī Ṭālib yaṭīru maʻa al-malāʼikah. Wa-akhraja al-Ṭabarānī, bi-isnād ḥasan, bi-maʻnāh: Wa-lākinnahu innamā summiya al-Ṭayyār, li-ikhbārihi ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻan ṭayarānihi fī al-Jannah ʻaqiba istishhādihi bi-mawtih, fa-lā yaṣluḥu an yuʻadda min al-karāmāt al-dunyawīyah allatī hiya maḥall al-nizāʻ. Intahá min al-Farāʼid al-qalāʼid ʻalá Aḥādīth Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid lil-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Qārī." "al-ʻilm ʻilmān: ʻIlm fī al-khalq mawjūd wa-ʻilm fī al-khalq mafqūd. Fa-inkār al-ʻilm al-mawjūd kufr, wa-iddiʻāʼ al-ʻilm al-mafqūd kufr. Lā yaṣiḥḥu al-īmān illā bi-qubūl al-ʻilm al-mawjūd wa-tark al-ʻilm al-mafqūd. Ṭaḥāwī."
On the upper right corner of folio 1a: "Wa-tusammá ayḍan 'al-Ḥirāb wa-al-nibāl fī kabid man yunkiru karāmat al-walī baʻda al-intiqāl'."
On the upper left corner of folio 1a: "Wa-tusammá ayḍan 'Ḍarb al-ḥirāb wa-al-nibāla fīman yunkiru karāmat al-walī baʻda al-intiqāl'."

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Tamma dhālika bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Man lā Nabī baʻdah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, ʻadada mā ṣulliya ʻalayhi, ilá Yawm al-Qiyāmah. Āmīn. Taḥrīran fī yawm al-Khamīs, ʻishrīn Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1146."

Translation of the colophon: "God is more knowledgeable. It is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on Him, who no prophet comes after Him [Prophet Muḥammad], on his family and his companions, the number of prayers prayed upon him, until the Day of Resurrection. Amen. Dated on Thursday, 20 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, the year 1146 [of the Hijrah = 24 April 1734]."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ. Al-Fann al-awwal : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-talkhīṣ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī, wa-nawwara qulūbanā bi-lawāmiʻ al-tibyān min maṭāliʻ al-mathānī, wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Nabīyika Muḥammad, al-muʼayyid dalāʼil iʻjāzihi bi-asrār al-balāghah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muḥrizīn qaṣab al-sabq fī miḍmār al-faṣāḥah wa-al-barāʻah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī, Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar, al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī, hadāhu Allāh sawāʼa al-ṭarīq, wa-adhāqahu ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq: Qad sharaḥtu fīmā maḍá 'Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ' wa-aghnaytuhu bi-al-Iṣbāḥ ʻan al-Miṣbāḥ, wa-awdaʻtuhu gharāʼib nukat samaḥat bi-hā al-anẓār, wa-washshaḥtuhu bi-laṭāʼif fiqar sabakathā yad al-afkār, thumma raʼaytu al-kathīr min al-fuḍalāʼ, wa-al-jamm al-ghafīr min al-adhkiyāʼ yasʼalūnanī ṣarf al-himmah naḥwa ikhtiṣārih wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá bayān maʻānīhi wa-kashf astārih ..."
Secundo folio: Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd.
16.5 x 22.7 cm; written surface: 6 x 11.5 cm; 8-10 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion and corners decorations (in 33 unnumbered quires).
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Talkhīṣ Miftāḥ al-ʻulūm" and headings in red; numerous commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.
On folio 1a: Quotation about "al-Maqūlāt al-ʻashr" (Ten catigories in logic)
Colophon: "Tamma 'al-Fann al-awwal' bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-tawfīqhi. Wa-Īyāhu asʼalu fī itmām al-fannayn al-ākharayn hidayat ṭarīqih."
Translation of the colophon: "The first art is concluded by the help of God and His abundant benevolence. I beseech Him for the guidance of His way to complete the other two arts."

record.title: 880-02 al-Iftitāḥ fī sharḥ al-Miṣbāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn al-Aswad.
record.note: Title from reference sources (See: Brockelmann. S 2:312)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ al-Furqān, wa-khalaqa min al-turāb al-insān, wa-sawwá al-mawt bayna al-faqīr wa-al-amīr wa-al-sulṭān, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī Muḥammad al-maḥfūf bi-jamājim Banī ʻAdnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi dhawī al-karam wa-al-iḥsān. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥawāshī [ḥawāshin] katabtuhā lil-Miṣbāḥ, wa-sammaytuhā bi-al-Iftitāḥ, bi-iltimās baʻḍ al-aṣḥāb, mustaʻīnan bi-al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Qāla al-muṣannif fī ṣadr al-kitāb ..."
Secundo folio: aḥaqq an lā yataqaddama ʻalayhā.
13.5 x 18 cm; written surface: 7 x 12 cm; 13-19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; some inserts; catchwords.
On the label pasted to the front cover: "Kitāb al-Iftitāḥ fī sharḥ al-Miṣbāḥ."
On the back of the front cover: "Iftitāḥ sharḥ al-Miṣbāḥ."
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Iftitāḥ."
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King."

record.title: 880-02 al-Iftitāḥ fī sharḥ al-Miṣbāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn al-Aswad.
record.note: Title from reference sources (See: Brockelmann. S 2:312)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ al-Furqān, wa-khalaqa min al-turāb al-insān, wa-sawwá al-mawt bayna al-faqīr wa-al-amīr wa-al-sulṭān, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-maḥfūf bi-jamājim Banī ʻAdnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi dhawī al-karam wa-al-iḥsān. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥawāshin katabtuhā lil-Miṣbāḥ, wa-sammaytuhā bi-al-Iftitāḥ, bi-iltimās baʻḍ al-aṣḥāb, mustaʻīnan bi-al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Qāla al-muṣannif fī ṣadr al-kitāb ..."
Secundo folio: al-ʻamal fīmā qablahā li-anna maʻmūlahā
13 x 17 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 12.5 cm; 15-19 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding; dark brown leather on spine.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords. Folios 83-103 are written in a different hand.
At the head of folio 1a: An erroneous title is given to the manuscript, as follows: "Sharḥ al-Miftāḥ."
On folio 1a: "Iftitāḥ."

Colophon: "Tammat." On the lower right margin of the colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah fī al-shahr al-mubārak, fī awāsiṭ Muḥarram, fī ākhir Panj Shanbah, fī waqt al-ḍuḥá, ʻalá yad al-ḍaʻīf al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Allāh taʻālá, Sayyid ʻAlī ibn Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh [la-hu] wa-li-wālidayhimā [wa-li-wālidayhi], wa-al-jamīʻīn [wa-li-jamīʻ] al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed." On the lower right margin of the colophon: "This noble copy was completed at dawn, the end of Thursday, in the middle of the blessed month of Muḥarram [year of not mentioned], by the hand of the poor to the mercy of God Almighty, Sayyid ʻAlī ibn Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslim men and women."

record.title: 880-02 al-Iftitāḥ fī sharḥ al-Miṣbāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn al-Aswad.
record.note: Title from reference sources (See: Brockelmann. S 2:312)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ al-Furqān, wa-khalaqa min al-turāb al-insān, wa-sawwá al-mawt bayna al-faqīr wa-al-amīr wa-al-sulṭān, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-maḥfūf bi-jamājim Banī ʻAdnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi dhawī al-karam wa-al-iḥsān. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥawāshin katabtuhā lil-Miṣbāḥ, wa-sammaytuhā bi-al-Iftitāḥ, bi-iltimās baʻḍ al-aṣḥāb, mustaʻīnan bi-al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Qāla al-muṣannif fī ṣadr al-kitāb ..."
Secundo folio: wa-amma bishrun faqad aʻraḍtu ʻanhu.
12 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 14.5 cm; 15 lines per page. Leaves 108-115 are blank; text folios 1b-107b.
Binding: In cardboard binding; dark brown leather on spine.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Miṣbāḥ" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the preliminary leaf 1a: "Iftitāḥ Sharḥ Miṣbāḥ." "Hādhā Kitāb Sharḥ Miṣbāḥ." "Thaman [...] 103."
At the head of folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Iftitāḥ."
On folio 1a: An invocation in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-ghayr al-lāzim, ay, al-istiknān alladhī lā yakūnu lāziman fī al-māḍī al-mudhakkar, naḥwa faʻala, wa-fī al-muḍāriʻ al-mudhakkar, naḥwa yafʻalau, wa-kadhā al-muʼannath, ay, muʼannathuhumā, naḥwa faʻalat wa-tafʻalu, fa-inna al-istiknān fī hādhihi al-afʻāl ghayr lāzim, naḥwa ḍaraba Zaydun wa-yaḍribu Zaydun, wa-ḍarabat Hindun wa-taḍribu Hindun, wa-fī ism al-fāʻil wa-al-mafʻūl wa-al-ṣifah al-mushabbahah, fa-idhā rafaʻta bi-hā, ay, bi-ism al-fāʻil wa-al-mafʻūl wa-al-ṣifah al-mushabbahah isman ẓāhiran baqiyat hādhihi al-mushtaqqāt ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title of "Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ" from reference sources.
Title of "Kāfīyah al-badīʻīyah fī al-madāʼiḥ al-Nabawīyah" from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alhamanā ḥaqāʼiq al-maʻānī wa-daqāʼiq al-bayān, wa-khaṣṣaṣanā bi-badāʼiʻ al-ayādī wa-rawāʼiʻ al-iḥsān. Atqana bi-ḥikmatihi niẓām al-ʻālam ʻalá wafq mā iqtaḍathu al-ḥāl, wa-awrada bi-raʼfatihi firaq al-anām fī ṭaraf [ṭuruq] al-inʻām wa-al-ifḍāl, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥmmad khayr man nabaʻa [nabagha] min ḍiʼḍiʼ al-karam wa-al-samāḥah, wa-ashraf man nabaʻa min dawḥat al-lasn wa-al-faṣāḥah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna bihim talaʼlaʼa ghurrat al-ḥaqq wa-al-dīn, wa-iḍmaḥalla dujá al-bāṭil, wa-lamaʻa nūr al-yaqīn ..."
Secundo folio of Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ: al-bayān urājiʻu al-shuyūkh alladhīn ḥāzū.

Incipit of "al-Kāfīyah al-badīʻīyah fī al-madāʼiḥ al-Nabawīyah": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Barāqat [Barāʻat] al-maṭlaʻ wa-al-jinās al-murakkab. In jiʼta Salʻan fa-sal ʻan jīrati al-ʻAlam // wa-qra al-salāma ʻalá ʻurbin bi-Dhī Salam ..."
Secundo folio of "Kāfīyah al-badīʻīyah fī al-madāʼiḥ al-Nabawīyah": Min hunna man yarfaqu.
16.4 x 26 cm; written surface: 10 x 18.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather; cover embossed with central medallion.
In medium and good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Talkhīṣ Miftāḥ al-ʻulūm" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: Ownership statements, as follows: 1. "[... ... ...] al-sharʻī min ghayr munāziʻ yunāziʻ wa-muddaʻin yaddaʻī. Wa-anā al-aqall Aḥmad najl ʻAbd Allāh al-Khuzāʻī. Sanat 1154 [of the Hijrah = 1741/1742]." 2. "Kayfa aqūlu mulkī wa-al-mulk lillāh. Wa-anā al-faqīr [... ... ...]. Fī 14 L [Shawwāl (?)], sanat 1142 [of the Hijrah = 2 May, 1730]." 3. "Huwa al-mālik al-ḥaqīqī. Intaqala bi-al-bayʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ al-sharʻī ilayya min ghayr munāziʻ yunāziʻ wa-muddaʻin yaddaʻī. Wa-anā al-aqall ʻAlī najl [... ... ...] najl al-marḥūm al-Sayyid Sharīf najl al-marḥūm Shaykh Falāḥ [...] sākin al-Maḥallah [...] sākin al-maḥallah. Fī [...] sanat 1212 [of the Hijrah = 1779/1798]." 4. "[... ... ...] ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Shaykh [...] ibn al-Shaykh Ḥusayn ibn al-Ḥājj Ḥamzah ibn [... ... ...] Nāṣir al-Aʻrajī."

On folio 1a: Two verses of poetry praising the rooster, and comparing it to the "muʼadhdhin" (the mosque officer who performs the adhān "call to prayer"): "Fī madḥ dīk. Niʻma al-muʼadhdhinu law badā laka ṣawtuhu // wa-wajhu ṣubḥin lam yufiq wasnānuhu. Fa-la-in atāka muṣawwitan fa-ḥadīthuhu // hādhā al-ṣabāḥu fa-lā yafutka adhānuhu."

On folio 2a: al-Taftāzānī states that he often thought about writing a commentary on "Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ" of al-Qazwīnī, as follows: "... wa-kathīran mā kāna yukhāliju qalbī an ashraḥa 'Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ' al-mansūb ilá Jalāl al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Qazwīnī, al-khaṭīb bi-Jāmiʻ Dimashq ..."

Colophon of Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ (folio 162b): "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb wa-ḥusn tawfīqih ʻalá yad aḍʻaf al-ʻibād Muḥammad Ḥusayn, fī thānī wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Shawwāl, sanat alf wa-arbaʻah wa-tisʻīn. M."

Translation of the colophon of Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ: "God is more knowledgeable of what is correct. To Him is the reference and returning. The book is completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King and His abundant benevolence, by the hand of feeblest of the servants, Muḥammad Ḥusayn, on 22 Shawwāl, 1094 [of the Hijrah = 14th October 1683]. M."
"al-Kāfīyah al-badīʻīyah fī al-madāʼiḥ al-Nabawīyah" ends with: Barāʻat al-khitām. Fa-in saʻidtu fa-madḥī fīka mūjibuhu // wa-in shaqītu fa-dhanbī mūjibu al-naqami.
Colophon of al-Kāfīyah al-badīʻīyah fī al-madāʼiḥ al-Nabawīyah: "Tammat al-qaṣīdah bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb wa-ḥusn tawfīqih."
Translation of the colophon of al-Kāfīyah al-badīʻīyah fī al-madāʼiḥ al-Nabawīyah: "The poem is completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King and His abundant benevolence."

record.title: 880-02 Taʻlīq al-farāʼid ʻalá Tashīl al-fawāʼid : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Damāmīnī.
record.note: Title from folio 4a: "... wa-sammaytu hādhā al-sharḥ bi-Taʻlīq al-farāʼid ʻalá Tashīl al-fawāʼid ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá al-Mawlá al-Ghanī, Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn ʻUmar al-Makhzūmī al-Damāmīnī al-Mālikī, ʻāmalahu Allāh taʻālá bi-luṭfihi al-khafī wa-birrihi al-ḥafī: Allāhumma, wa-Īyāka naḥmadu ʻalá niʻam tawajjahat al-āmāl ilá naḥwihā, fa-asʻaftahā bi-tashīl al-fawāʼid, wa-shakat mā talqāhu min naqṣ al-ḥaẓẓ fa-asʻadtahā bi-takmīl al-maqāṣid, wa-nashkuruka ʻalá taṣrīfika lanā fī khidmat kalimat al-Islām ..."
Secundo folio: wa-kāna al-rafʻ thābitan li-maḥall tilka al-akhbār.
14 x 20.3 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 13 cm; 17 lines per page (in 18 numbered quires).
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Tashīl al-fawāʼid wa-takmīl al-maqāṣid " in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Sharḥ al-Tashīl lil-Damāmīnī fī ʻilm al-naḥw."

On folio 1a: An index of contents of the codex: "Bāb Sharḥ al-kalimah wa-al-kalām wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hi. Bāb Iʻrāb al-ṣaḥīḥ. Bāb Iʻrāb al-muʻtall al-ākhir. Bāb Iʻrāb al-muthanná wa-al-majmūʻ ʻalá ḥidah. Bāb Kayfīyat al-tathniyah wa-jamʻay al-taṣḥīḥ. Bāb al-Maʻrifah wa-al-nakirah. Bāb al-muḍmar. Bāb al-Ism wa-al-ʻalam. Bāb al-Mawṣūl. Bāb Ism al-ishārah. Bāb al-Muʻarraf bi-al-adāh."
At the head of folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa lillāh taʻālá hādhā al-kitāb Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Najjārī."
On the lower edge: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal min Sharḥ al-Tashīl."

At the end of the codex: An inserted folded letter, from "Ḥasan Khiḍr", to "al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Bukhārī", informing him that "al-Amīr ʻUthmān Afandī", "Nāẓir Fiʻlī al-Anwāl" (Official Superintendent of the Weaving Shuttles) in Beirut, has sent him with "Aḥmad ʻAllām" a "zaʻbūṭ aḥmar" (red woolen garment).

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-qad taqūmu 'al' fī ghayr al-ṣilah maqām ḍamīr rābiṭ wa-ghayrihi, fa-al-awwal naḥwa 'Fa-inna al-Jannah hiya al-maʼwá', wa-al-thānī naḥwa 'Wa-ishtaʻala al-raʼsu shaybā', ay, raʼsī, wa-ʻalá hādhā, fa-al-ḍamīr aʻamm min ḍamīr al-ghāʼib wa-ḍamīr al-ḥāḍir. Wa-qīl, al-muṣannif, al-masʼalah bi-ghayr al-ṣilah, fa-kharaja naḥwa Zayd alladhī ḍarabtu al-ẓahr wa-al-baṭn, ay, ẓahrahu wa-baṭnahu, wa-kathīr lam yataʻarraḍ ilá dhālik, wa-qīl, al-muṣannif ayḍan mā taqūmu 'al' maqāmahu bi-kawnihi ḍamīran, fa-kharaja al-ism al-ẓāhir. Wa-fī al-Kashshāf annahā taʼtī khalafan min al-muḍāf ilayhi, wa-law kāna ẓāhiran, naḥwa 'Wa-ʻallama Ādama al-asmāʼa kullahā', wa-anna al-aṣl asmāʼ al-musammayāt ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Manāhij al-Kāfiyah fī sharḥ al-Shāfiyah : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: ""Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tafaḍḍala wa-takarrama, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ waḍaʻtuhu ʻalá al-Shāfiyah fī ʻilamy al-taṣrīf wa-al-khaṭṭ, taʼlīf al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām Jamāl al-Dīn Abī ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn ʻAmr [ʻUmar] ibn Abī Bakr ibn Yūnus Ibn al-Ḥājib al-Miṣrī al-Mālikī, raḥimahu Allāh, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahā, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼialahā ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-nahj munīf, khālin min al-ḥashw wa-al-taṭwīl, ḥāwin lil-dalīl wa-al-taʻlīl, wa-sammaytuhu al-Manāhij al-kāfiyah fī sharḥ al-Shāfiyah. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi. Wa-huwa ḥasbī, wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Badaʼa bi-al-Basmalah wa-al-Ḥamdalah.
14 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 12 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion (in 24 unnumbered quires).

In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of 'al-Shāfiyah' in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords. Folios 40a-81b are written in a different hand in good ruqʻah script.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Manāhij al-Kāfiyah fī sharḥ al-Shāfiyah, taʼlīf Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Shaykh Mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Abī Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Khazrajī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh [bi-raḥmatih wa-askanahu] buḥbūḥat jināh [jinānih], wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā min barakāt ʻulūmih. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

On the left margin of the incipit: A statement by a reader indicating that he read this manuscript with his teacher al-Shaykh Ilyās al-Kurdī, as follows: "Qawluhu al-Miṣrī ilkh. ṣifah li-Jamāl al-Dīn al-madhkūr. Wa-ammā aṣuluhu fa-hum Akrād, kamā akhbaranā bi-dhālika Shaykhunā al-Shaykh Ilayās al-Kurdī, ḥīna qaraʼnā hādhā al-sharḥ ʻalayhi."
At the head of some of the folios: Endowment statements, as follows: "Waqf bi-Ruwāq al-Akrād."Waqf bi-Ruwāq al-Akrād bi-al-Azhar al-muʻammar bi-al-ʻulūm."

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-qad tamma kitābat al-Manāhij al-kāfiyah fī sharḥ al-Shāfiyah fī ʻilm al-taṣrīf ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr Muḥammad al-ʻAzīzī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī fī suwayʻah min yawm al-Aḥad, 29 Rajab al-Fard, sanat 1200. M."

Translation of the colophon: "God is more knowledgeable. The copy of 'al-Manāhij al-kāfiyah fī sharh al-Shāfiyah' on the science of morphology was completed by the hand of the poor Muḥammad al-ʻAzīzī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī, in a little while, on Sunday, 29 Rajab, 1200 [of the Hijrah = 28 May 1786]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām fī masāʼil al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām : manuscript / Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan al-Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Allāhumma innī aḥmaduka ḥamdan yaqillu fī intishārih ḥamd kull ḥāmid, wa-yaḍmaḥillu bi-ishtihārih juḥda kull jāḥid, wa-yufallu bi-ghirārih ḥasad kull ḥāsid, wa-yaḥullu bi-iʻtibārih ʻaqd kull kāʼid, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādatan aʻtadtuhā li-dafʻ al-shadāʼid, wa-astariddu bi-hā shārid al-niʻam al-awābid, wa-uṣallī ʻalá Sayyidinā al-hādī ilá anjaḥ al-maqāṣid wa-arjaḥ al-fawāʼid, [wa-ālihi] al-ghurr al-amājid, al-muqaddamīn ʻalá al-aqārib wa-al-abāʻid, al-muʼayyadīn fī al-maṣādir wa-al-mawārid, ṣalātan tusmiʻu kulla ghāʼib wa-shāhid wa-taqmaʻu kulla shayṭān mārid ..."
Secundo folio: mā kāna al-umūr al-thalāthah.
19.5 x 26 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding covered with bluish green cloth.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; many commentaries on the margins and interlinear; some inserts; catchwords.
At the head of folio 1a: "Sharḥ al-Kanz."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Dakhalat fī mulk al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh Ṣaghīr Millī miskīn. Sharḥ al-Kanz."

On folio 331a: Two ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Qad ishtará hādhā al-kitāb afqar al-wará Makkī ibn Muḥammad ibn Shams al-Dīn najl al-shahīd Muḥammad ibn Makkī, fī sanat 1154 [1741/1742]." 2. "Qad intaqala bi-al-bayʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ al-ṣarīḥ min al-buqʻah al-mubārakah allatī tusammā [tusammá] bi-al-Najaf, ilá al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr ʻAbd Allāh ṣaghīr, ghafara Allāh lil-kātib wa-al-qārī."

On folio 331b: A statement in Persian about the Dīwān (Collected poems) of ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, and an invocation in 16 verses of Arabic poetry from the Dīwān, starting with: "Laka al-ḥamdu yā dhā al-jūdi wa-al-majd wa-al-ʻulá // tabārakta tuʻṭī man tashāʼu wa-tamnaʻu ..."

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Khayr Khalqih, Muḥammad wa-ahl baytih al-ṭāhirīn. Katabahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá ʻafw al-Malik al-Laṭīf wa-raḥmatihi wa-shafāʻat al-Nabī wa-al-Aʼimmah al-maʻṣūmīn, ṣalawāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, Ibn Rūḥ Allāh Khalīl Allāh al-Hamadānī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhumā bi-Muḥammad wa-ālih. Wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihi fī shahr Rajab al-murjib, sanat khams [wa-]thalāthīn wa-alf. Allāhumma irḥam man yastarḥimu li-kātibihi, wa-ighfir li-man istaghfara la-hu bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. May God pray on the Best of His Creation, Muḥammad and the pure people of his household. Copied by the servant who is poor to the forgiveness of the Gracious King and His mercy, and to the intercession of the Prophet and the infallible Imāms, may the prayers of God be upon all of them, Ibn Rūḥ Allāh Khalīl Allāh al-Hamadānī, may God pardon both of them, by the intercession of Muḥammad and his family. The copy was written during the month of Rajab, of the year 1035 [of the Hijrah = March/April 1626]. O God have mercy upon him who invokes You to have mercy upon its copyist, and pardon him who invokes You to pardon him, by the intercession of Muḥammad and his pure family. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Mukhtaṣar Khalīl : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Kharshī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... waḥshīyan dujjina wa-ṣāra yuʻmalu ʻalayhi ʻanhu. Mālik fī al-Mudawwanah, khilāfan li-Ibn Qāsim. Ṣ. wa-al-makrūh sabʻ wa-ḍabʻ wa-thaʻlab wa-dhiʼb wa-hirr, wa-in waḥshīyan. Wa-hādhā mafhūm qawlihi 'lam yaftaris', wa-al-maʻná anna al-sabʻ wa-mā maʻahu makrūh ʻalá al-mashhūr, wa-huwa madhhab al-Mudawwanah, li-qawl Mālik fīhā: Lā uḥibbu akl al-sabʻ wa-lā al-thaʻlab wa-lā al-hirr al-waḥshī wa-lā al-insī wa-lā shayʼ min al-sibāʻ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-zamānuha. Wa-ʻarrafahā Ibn ʻArafah.
15 x 22 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion (in 42 unnumbered quires).

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of "al-Mukhtaṣar" of Khalīl al-Jundī preceded by the letter Ṣ, and the commentary of al-Kharshī by the letter Sh, in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: A statement in a recent hand, attempting to give the work an "incipit" and a title (which could not be identified), as follows: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ijtabá min ṣafwat ʻibādih ʻiṣābat ahl al-ḥaqq wa-al-sunnah, wa-khaṣṣahum min bayn sāʼir al-firaq bi-mazāyā al-luṭf wa-al-minnah. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad allaftu kitābī hādhā wa-jaʻaltuhu bi-Sunnat al-Nabī al-karīm, wa-sammaytuhu 'Hidāyat al-Mālik fī madhhab al-Imām Mālik', wa-jaʻaltuhu fī jāmiʻ al-ʻilm al-qadīm wa-al-mashhūr fīhi. Waḥshīyan ..."
At the head of folios 241b and 242a: An illegible stamp.

Text ends with: "... Ṣ. Wa-lā shayʼ li-ḥāḍin li-ajlihā. Sh. ʻalá annahu lā nafaqah lil-ḥāḍin, wa-lā ujrat ḥiḍānah, fa-lā yunāfī anna la-hu ujrat al-sukná. Wa-iḥtaraza bi-qawlihi li-ajlihā ʻammā law kāna hunāka sabab ghayrihā, kamā idhā kāna al-walad mūsiran wa-huwa maḥḍūn li-ummihi al-faqīrah, fa-lahā ujrat al-ḥiḍānah, li-annahā tastaḥiqqu al-nafaqah min mālihi wa-law lam taḥḍunhu."

Colophon: "Wa-qad tamma hādhā al-juzʼ al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed part is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and on his family and companions and grant them abundant peace until Judgement Day. Amen.

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Mūsá al-Khayālī.
record.note: Title of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah from reference sources.
Title of Ḥāshiyat al-Bihishtī (Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Khayālī) supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah: "Rabbi yassir wa-lā tuʻassir. Rabbi tammim bi-al-khayr. Wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-shāriḥ al-niḥrīr, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khaṭīr, baʻdamā tayammana bi-al-tasmīyah, al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Aqūlu: Fī taʻqīb al-tasmiyah bi-al-taḥmīd iqtidāʼ bi-uslūb al-Kitāb al-Majīd, wa-ʻmal bi-mā shāʻ, bal waqaʻa ʻalayhi al-ijmāʻ, wa-imtithāl bi-Ḥadīthay al-ibtidāʼ, wa-mā yutawahhamu minhu taʻāruḍuhmā, fa-madfūʻ, fa-al-ḥaml bi-al-ibtidāʼ ʻalá al-ʻurfī al-mumtadd, aw li-ḥaml aḥadihimā ʻalá al-ḥaqīqī wa-al-ākhar ʻalá al-iḍāfī, ka-mā huwa al-mashhūr ..."
Secundo folio of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah: aw al-waḥdah al-kāmilah.

Incipit of Ḥāshiyat al-Bihishtī (Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Khayālī): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamd al-ʻākifīn bi-bābih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad Sayyid aḥbābih, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-kirām wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna taʼaddabū bi-ādābih. Lil-Ḥadīth maʻná. Ih. Huw takhayyur min al-nisbah ilá al-mafʻūl al-ghayr al-ṣarīḥ, wa-al-murād innahu immā ʻadala ʻammā shāʻa min dhikr lafẓ al-ḥamd, fa-lā yatawajjahu anna kull ʻāmil bi-naṣṣ kadhālika, li-anna ḥaqīqat al-ḥamd qad yuqālu mā dhukira laysa bi-maʻnāh ..."
Secundo folio of Ḥāshiyat al-Bihishtī (Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Khayālī): lam yustaḥsanu dhālika li-annahu jawāb.
16.5 x 22.7 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 17.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding; dark brown leather on spine and the sides.
In Farsī script, in black ink, on white paper; some inserts; the many notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.
On the label pasted to the front cover: "Kitāb Khayālī."
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Khayālī."
On folio 42b: An ownership statement: "Ṣāḥib al-kitāb Abū Lays [Layth] Afandī. Min al-Ḥājjī al-Wahhāb Munlā ishtaraytu minhu al-kitāb. Khamsūn ghurūshan."
Folio 43a is blank.
On folio 43b: An astronomical/meteorological chart, in Ottoman Turkish, listing the Hijrī and Western months.
Folio 44 is blank.
On folio 45a: "Hādhā Kitāb Bihishtī. Ḥāshiyatuhu lil-ʻImād."
On folio 63b: An ownership statement: "Ṣāḥib hādhā al-kitāb Abū Lays [Layth] Afandī. Min al-Ḥājjī al-Wahhāb Munlā ishtaraytu minhu al-kitāb. Khamsūn ghurūshan."

The text of al-Khayālī ends with: "... ṣifāt fāḍilah yaḍmaḥillu afḍal al-ʻamal fī janbihā. Qultu: Hādhā al-iddiʻāʼ mimmā lā yuqbalu fī ḥaqq al-anbiyāʼ, wa-bi-hi yaẓharu anna hādhā al-wajh ayḍan yufīdu tafḍīlahum faqaṭ, wa-anna al-faḍl bi-yad Allāh yuʼtīhi man yashāʼ, wa-Allāh dhū al-faḍl al-ʻaẓīm."

Colophon of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah (folio 42b): "Thumma al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā waffaqanī li-itmām kitābat hādhā al-naskh. Thumma al-ḥamdu lillāh ilá inqirāḍ al-dawarān."

Translation of the colophon of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah: "Praise be to God for enabling me to complete the transcription of this copy. Praise be to God until the end of circulation [i.e. time]."
Colophon of Ḥāshiyat al-Bihishtī (Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Khayālī): "Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlamu bi-ḥaqīqat al-ḥāl. Minhu al-ibtidāʼ wa-ilayhi al-maʼāl. Tārīkh sanat 1155."

Translation of the colophon of Ḥāshiyat al-Bihishtī (Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat al-Khayālī): "God, may He be praised, is more knowledgeable of the reality of the case. From Him is the beginning and to Him is the returning. Dated in the year 1155 [of the Hijrah = 1742 or 1743]."

record.title: 880-01 Zubdat al-wāʻiẓīn fī bayān kalām Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-fī Aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-ḥikāyāt al-mutaqaddimīn : manuscript.
record.note: Title of Zubdat al-wāʻiẓīn fī bayān kalām Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-fī Aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-ḥikāyāt al-mutaqaddimīn from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Zubdat al-wāʻiẓīn fī bayān kalām Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-fī Aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-ḥikāyāt al-mutaqaddimīn: No "Basmalah", starts with "al-Ḥamdu lillāh majmaʻ [bi-jamīʻ] al-maḥāmid ʻan [ʻalá] jamīʻ al-niʻam. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr khalqihi Muḥammad al-mabʻūth ilá khayr al-umam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi mafātiḥ al-ḥikam wa-maṣābīḥ al-ẓulam. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Allāh taʻālá: Aradtu an ajmaʻa kitāban min zubdat kutub al-mawʻiẓah, wa-akhadhtu min kull mā yushawwiqu al-qalb ilá Allāh taʻālá wa-ṭāʻatih, wa-yuʻarrifu al-ṭarīq ilá dār karāmatih, wa-yaqṭaʻu ladhdhat al-nafs ʻan al-dunyā wa-shahawātihā, wa-yuraghghibuhā fī al-ākhirah wa-darajātihā, wa-yubʻiduhā ʻan al-nār wa-darakātihā, fa-jamaʻtu hādhā al-kitāb wa-sammaytuhu 'Zubdat al-wāʻiẓīn fī bayān kalām Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-fī Aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-ḥikāyāt al-mutaqaddimīn', wa-kasartuhu fī thamāniyah wa-arbaʻīn Jumʻah; fa-akthar al-wāʻiẓīn fī al-buldān wa-al-qurā [wa-al-qurá] yaʻiẓu al-nās fī al-Jumʻah marratan. Fa-idhā kāna kadhālik akhṣartuhā [ikhtaṣartuhā] min kull abwāb kutub al-mawāʻiẓ ʻalá thamāniyah wa-arbaʻīn bāban ..."
Secundo folio: ilayhi wa-hunna al-ajnās min al-ins wa-al-jinn.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 10.5 cm; lines per page vary.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; commentaries and notes on the margins in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish; some headings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: An ownership statement and stamp of the owner: "Tamallakahu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr Ḥāfiẓ Muṣṭafá Ṣūfī fī 5 Muḥarram, sanat 1280 [22 June 1863]."
At the head of folio 1b: "Kitāb Badr al-wāʻiẓīn." "Muṣṭafá Ṣūfī."

Colophon of Zubdat al-wāʻiẓīn fī bayān kalām Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-fī Aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-ḥikāyāt al-mutaqaddimīn: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with "al-Bāb al-rābiʻ ʻashar "Fī bayān faḍāʼil al-ṣadaqah" (Chapter 14 "On expounding the virtues of almsgiving"), as follows: "... Qāla al-Nabī ʻA M [ʻAlayhi al-Salām]: al-Sakhāʼ shajarah fī al-Jannah, aghṣānuhā mutawāliyāt fī al-dunyā, fa-man akhadha baʻḍan minhā qādahu ilá al-Jannah, wa-al-bukhl shajarah fī al-nār aghṣānuhā mutawāliyāt ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatāwá al-Bazzāzīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Bazzāz al-Kardarī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 5b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Ḥamdan li-man daʻā ilá Dār al-Salām, bi-Muḥammad ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, shāriʻ aḥkām al-Islām, nāhij nahj al-ḥilāl wa-al-ḥarām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā mukhtaṣar fī bayān tafrīʻāt al-aḥkām, jamaʻahu al-ʻabd Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Kardarī, aḍʻaf al-anām, dhākiran fīhi khulāṣat nawāzil al-ayyām wa-mukhtārāt al-mashāyikh al-kirām <ʻawnan li-man> li-yakūna ʻalá raʼy Nuʻmān ibn Thābit al-Imām wa-aṣḥābihi al-ghurrāʼ [al-ghurr] al-kirām, ʻawnan li-man taṣaddá al-iftāʼ [lil-iftāʼ] bi-al-lisān wa-al-aqlām, wa-sababan lil-khalāṣ yawma tazillu fīhi al-aqdām. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Kitāb al-Ṭahārah tisʻat fuṣūl. al-Awwal fī al-ālah ..."
Secundo folio: al-māʼ qabla al-ikhrāj khilāfan li-Muḥammad.
18 x 26 cm; written surface: 12 x 19.5 cm; 29 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather with central medallion and tooled cover in gold; front cover missing.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; titles of the fatwas on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: Ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Fatāwá Bazzāzīyah li-Muftī Shamnī [?] Sulaymān Afandī." And four illegible stamps. 2. "Yā Ḥāfiẓ [... ... ...] al-faqīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ʻafā ʻanhumā [...] bi-mannihi wa-karamih." 3. "Dakhala fī silk mulk al-faqīr al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Qadīr [... ... ...]." 4. "Tamallakahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-fānī ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Nābulusī al-Ḥanafī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-al-Muslimīn bi-mannih wa-karamih, fī awwal Rabīʻ al-Awwal."
On folios 1b-5a: A detailed table of contents.
At the head of folio 5a: "ʻAdad awrāq 437."
On folio 5a: "Tamma fihrist 'Jāmiʻ al-fatāwá al-Bazzāzīyah' lil-ʻAllāmah Muḥammad al-Kardarī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu."

On folio 1a: A biographical note about al-Kardarī, by a reader, quoted from "al-Shaqāʼiq al-Nuʻmānīyah" of Ṭāshkubrīʹzādah (1495-1561), stating that al-Kardarī debated with another scholar "al-Mawlá al-Fanārī" (Muḥammad ibn Ḥamzah, 1350 or 1351-1430 or 1431) and died in the middle of Ramaḍān, 827 of the Hijrah (20 August 1424).

Colophon: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tamām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad Sayyid al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ʻiẓām wa-ṣaḥbihi al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr al-kitāb al-sharīf bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Laṭīf, fī awāʼil shahr Rajab, fī tārīkh sanat tisʻ ʻashar wa-tisʻmiʼah min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá yad aḍʻaf al-ʻibād, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, ghafara Allāh la-humā wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, bi-raḥmatihi wa-karamihi wa-luṭfih. Āmīn. Yā Muʻīn!"

Translation of the colophon: "Praise be to God on the completion. May prayer be on His Messenger, Muḥammad, Master of humankind, on his grand family and his noble companions. The copy of this noble book was completed, by the help of the Gracious King, at the beginning of the month of Rajab, of the year 919 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [12 September 1513], by the hand of the weakest of the servants, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, may God forgive both of them, and all Muslim men and women, by His mercy, His generosity and graciousness. Amen. O Supporter!"

record.title: 880-01 al-Ifṣāḥ : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b): "... wa-sammaytu [wa-sammmaytuhu] bi-al-Ifṣāḥ ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa al-samāwāt bi-ghayr <ʻamd ʻimād>, wa-khafaḍa al-arḍ wa-naṣaba al-jibāl bi-ḥazm al-qaḍāʼ al-mīʻād [lil-ʻibād], wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyihi alladhī sanna al-waqf wa-jāhada ḥaqq al-jihād, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhī [alladhīna] ḍamma ilá suyūfihim kasr al-aʻdāʼ wa-fatḥ al-bilād, wa-al-thanāʼ li-Khalīfatihi, aʻnī al-Sulṭān Murād, alladhī qāda al-khalq ilá sabīl al-rashād, wa-asʻdahu Allāh fī al-dārayn kull al-isʻād, wa-ṭawwal ʻumrahu bi-al-naṣr wa-al-imdād, wa-jaʻala dhurrīyatahu bāqiyah bi-al-khayr wa-al-sadād, wa-arḥama [wa-raḥima] abāhu wa-ajdādahu Yawm al-Mīʻād, bi-ḥurmat al-Nabī al-shafīʻ Yawm al-Tanād, wa-ālihi al-ashrāf wa-ṣaḥbihi al-amjād. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā al-Mukhtaṣar fī iʻrāb Sūrat al-Fātiḥah wa-kitāb al-Kāfiyah, wa-dhikr shayʼ min al-maʻānī, jamaʻtuhu min kutub al-tafāsīr wa-al-Aḥādīth wa-al-qirāʼāt wa-al-ṣarf wa-al-naḥw wa-al-lughāt wa-al-kalām wa-al-ādāb wa-al-uṣūl wa-al-maʻānī ..."
Secundo folio: al-kitāb annahu kāna lī ishārah.
14.5 x 20.2 cm; written surface: 9 x 16 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap (half torn); dark brown leather on spine and flap.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Fātiḥah" and "al-Kāfiyah" in red; few commentaries on the margins; some inserts in Ottoman Turkish; some leaves copied in different hands; catchwords.
At the head of the preliminary leaf: "Hādhā fīhi Kāfiyah muʻrab."
Parsing of al-Fātiḥah ends on folio 12b. Parsing of al-Kāfiyah starts at folio 13a.

Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Sayyid al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-kirām wa-aṣḥābihi al-ʻiẓām, ḥasharanā Allāh taʻālá maʻahum fī Dār al-Salām ... Subḥāna Rabbika Rabbi al-ʻIzzati ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-Mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabbi al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon: "Praise be to God for the completion [of the book]. May prayer be upon our Master Muḥammad, Lord of mankind, and upon his glorious family and companions. May God Almighty Resurrect us with them in the Abode of Peace ... Praise be to your Lord, the Lord of Might, far is He from what they ascribe to Him. May peace be upon the Messengers. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. It is completed. It is completed. It is completed. It is completed."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Sīwāsī.
record.note: Title of "Sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah" from reference sources.
Title of "Lisān al-ḥukkām fī maʻrifat al-aḥkām" from reference sources.
Title of "Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ" from incipit (folio 133b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of "Sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī abraza bi-al-farāʼiḍ bahjat riyāḍ al-sharʻ, wa-aḍhara [wa-aẓhara] qawānīn al-aṣl wa-al-farʻ, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Hādī ilá al-manhaj al-qawīm wa-al-dāʻ [wa-al-dāʻī] ilá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm, Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-tābiʻīn al-sanan al-ḥaqq wa-al-sālikīn salk al-ṣidq. Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā kāna khayr mā yaṣrif al-insān ilayhi ʻīdahu [waʻyahu] wa-saʻat wakrihi [fikrihi], wa-awbā [wa-awwal] mā yabdhulu fīhi al-ʻāqil ghāyat jahlihi [juhdihi] wa-jaddihi, huwa ʻilm al-farāʼiḍ, fī maqāṣid taḥṣīlihi, alladhī huwa bi-mā yaqṣidu wajh Allāh fī taʻallumihi wa-taʻlīmih, wa-yudriku fī al-dārayn aqṣá maqāṣid taḥṣīlih bi-al-ʻamal bi-mā waqaʻa min jamlihi wa-tafṣīlih ..."
Secundo folio of "Sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah": al-taʼlīf sabʻ ṭarīq thalāthah.

Incipit of "Lisān al-ḥukkām fī maʻrifat al-aḥkām" (folio 21a): The incipit is missing. Text starts with: "... Hal lil-qāḍī akhdh al-ujrah ʻalá katbihi al-maḥāḍir wa-al-sijillāt wa-ghayrihā min al-wathāʼiq bi-miqdār ajr al-mithl, wa-dhālika li-anna al-qāḍī innamā yajibu ʻalayhi al-qaḍāʼ wa-īṣāl al-ḥaqq ilá mustaḥiqqih fa-ḥasb. Ammā al-kitābah fa-ziyādat ʻamal yaʻmaluhu lil-muqḍá la-hu. Wa-ʻalá hādhā qālū: Lā baʼsa lil-muftī an yaʼkhudha shayʼan ʻalá kitābat jawāb al-fatwá, wa-dhālika li-anna al-wājib ʻalá al-muftī al-jawāb bi-al-lisān dūna al-kitābah bi-al-banān. Wa-maʻa hādhā al-kaff ʻan dhālik awlá, iḥtirāzan min al-qīl wa-al-qāl wa-ṣiyānan li-māʼ al-wajh min al-ibtidhāl ..."
Secundo folio of "Lisān al-ḥukkām fī maʻrifat al-aḥkām": ilá al-qāḍī idhā ʻalima al-qāḍī.

Incipit of "Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ" (folio 133b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb Jawāhir farāʼiḍ [al-farāʼiḍ]. Iʻlam anna dhālik idhā māta al-insān, awwalan yubdaʼu min al-tarikah bi-tajhīzih, wa-huwa mā yaḥtāju ilayhi al-mayyit, thumma yuqḍá duyunuhu, in kān, thumma tunaffadhu waṣāyāhu, in kān, thumma yuqsamu al-bāqī bayna al-warathah. Masʼalah: Rajul māt wa-taraka aban lā ghayr, fa-al-māl kulluhu al-ab [lil-ab]. Masʼalah: Rajul māt wa-taraka aban wa-umman, fa-lil-umm al-thulth wa-al-bāqī al-ab [lil-ab]. Aṣl al-masʼalah min thalāthah. Masʼalah: Rajul māt wa-taraka umman wa-aban wa-ibnayn, fa-lil-ab al-suds wa-al-umm kadhālik wa-al-bāqī bayn al-ibnayn bi-al-sawīyah ..."
Secundo folio of "Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ": fa-taṣīru ithnay ʻashar sahmān lil-umm.
14.5 x 20 cm; written surface: varies; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather.
In fair to good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some commentaries on the margins; some text within red frame; some inserts; catchwords.
On folio 1a: A mathematical chart for the distribution of inheritance among the inheritors.
Folio 13a is blank.
On folio 147a: A document in Ottoman Turkish, dated in the year 1188 of the Hijrah (1774/1775), about freeing of a slave, signed by al-Ḥājj Salmān Kūkilbāsh.

Colophon of "Sharḥ al-Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-law taraka aban ayḍan fa-lil-zawjah al-thumn, wa-al-umm [wa-lil-umm] al-suds, wa-li-awlād al-umm al-suqūṭ, wa-bintay al-ʻillāt [?] wa-al-aʻyān al-suqūṭ, wa-lil-jadd al-suqūṭ, wa-li-bintay al-ab maʻa ibn al-suqūṭ, wa-li-bintay al-ṣulbīyah maʻa ibn al-ṣulbī ʻuṣūbah lil-dhakar mithl ḥaẓẓ al-unthayayn, wa-lil-ab al-suds. Hādhihi masāʼil al-ikhtilāṭ allatī dhakarahā aʻlá ..."

"Lisān al-ḥukkām fī maʻrifat al-aḥkām" ends (folio 133a) with: Text ends with: "... ʻalá anna ʻinda Abī Ḥanīfah lā yukrahu libs al-ḥarīr idhā lam yattaṣil bi-jildihi ḥattá law labisahu fawqa qibāʼ aw shayʼ ākhar maḥshūwan, wa-kānat jubbah min ḥarīr biṭānatuhā laysat bi-ḥarīr, wa-qad labisahā fawqa qamīṣ ghazlī, wa-fī hādhā rukhṣah ʻaẓīmah fī mawḍiʻ ʻamma fīhi al-balwá. Wa-lākin ṭalabtu hādhā al-qawl ʻan Abī Ḥanīfah fī kathīr min al-kutub fa-lam ajid siwá hādhā. Wa-qāla Shams al-aʼimmah al-Ḥalwānī [?]: Wa-min al-nās man yaqūlu innamā yukrahu idhā kāna al-ḥarīr yamassu al-jild, wa-qālā [wa-illā] fa-lā. Wa-ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās innahu kāna ʻalayhi jubbah min ḥarīr, fa-qīla la-hu fī dhālik, fa-qāl: Amā tará ilá mā yalī al-jasad? Fa-kāna taḥtahu thawb min quṭn. Thumma qāl: Illā anna al-ṣaḥīḥ mā dhakarnā, anna al-kull ḥarām. Intahá kalām al-Qinyah. Tamm."
Colophon of "Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ" (folio 139a): "Wa-hādhā kāfin li-nawʻ al-farāʼiḍ. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Tamm. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

Transaltion of the colophon of "Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ": "This is enough for the inheritance genre. God Almighty is more knowledgeable of what is correct. To Him is the reference and returning. It is completed. Praise be to God alone."

record.title: John Tregerthen Short diary : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Neat manuscript in brown ink on lined paper; bound in twentieth-century quarter calf with nonpareil marbled boards, spine gilt in compartments, red morocco lettering piece in one.

record.title: 880-02 Tafsīr Sūrat al-Nabaʼ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥamzah al-Rajāʼī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī afḍala ʻalaynā bi-inzāl Kitābihi al-mubīn, wa-ajmala ilaynā bi-irsālihi man jāʼa bi-hi hudan lil-ʻālamīn, fa-jaʻala al-tadabbur fī laṭāʼif āyātihi mirqāh ilá dhurá al-ḥaqāʼiq wa-al-tafakkur fī sharāʼif bayyinātihi mirʼātan li-ṣuwar ghawāmiḍ al-daqāʼiq, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá man bi-hi rafaʻa qadr al-mutaʼammilīn fī maẓāhir ṣifātihi, wa-radaʻa bi-majīʼihi al-mutasāʼilīn ʻammā istaʼthara bi-ʻilmihi min āyātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-fāʼizīn bi-mayāminihi bi-maʻālim anwār al-Tanzīl, wa-aṣḥābihi al-ḥāʼizīn bi-aymānihi madārik asrār al-taʼwīl ..."
Secundo folio: min al-muʻtabarāt al-laṭīfah wa-mimmā sanaḥa bi-khāṭirī.
13.7 x 21 cm; written surface: 6 x 13 cm; 18 lines per page.
Binding: Bound in thin yellow cardboard that used to be a printed cover for "Nahj al-balāghah", edited by Muḥyī al-Dīn Khayyāṭ and printed by Muḥammad Kamāl Bakdāsh, in Beirut.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes on the margins; markings in red; text within red frame; catchwords.
Colophon: "Khatama Allāh lanā bi-al-ḥusná. Huwa Mawlānā, niʻma al-Mawlá. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."
Translation of the colophon: "May God seal us with an amicable end. He is our Lord, the best Lord. It is concluded."

record.title: 880-02 al-Shudhūr al-dhahabīyah wa-al-qiṭaʻ al-Aḥmadīyah fī al-lughah al-Turkīyah : manuscript / Ibn Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ.
record.note: Name of the author: "Ibn Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ" from folio 2b.
Title from incipit (folio 5a): "... wa-tarjamtuhā bi-al-Shudhūr al-dhahabīyah wa-al-qiṭaʻ al-Aḥmadīyah fī al-lughah al-Turkīyah ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa al-insān wa-zayyanahu bi-al-nuṭq wa-al-lisān, wa-karramahu ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt, wa-faṣala [wa-faḍḍala] man shāʼa min ʻibādihi bi-al-faṣāḥah wa-al-ihtidāʼ ilá yumayyiz al-lifāq [tamyīz al-lughāt]. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādatan tuḥaqqiqu li-qāʼilaihā al-tamassuk bi-al-awāmir, wa-al-ijtināb min al-muhayyabāt [al-manhīyāt]. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth ilá sāʼir al-umam, Sayyidī [Sayyid] al-ʻUrb wa-al-ʻAjam, afṣaḥ man naṭaqa bi-al-Ḍād ..."
Secundo folio: al-muḥkam. Iqraʼ wa-Rabbuka al-akram.
13 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather; cover tooled with geometric design.

The translation of this work into modern Turkish "Eş-şüzûr-üz-zehebiyye vel-kıtaiʼl-Ahmediyye fil-lûgat-it-Türkiyye", was published in Istanbul, in 1949. See also Brockelmann (S II:632): "Maulānā b.M. Ṣāliḥ".
At the head of folio 1a: "al-Kitāb Tarjumān. Sanat 1088. Ṣāliḥ. Hādhā al-kitāb Tarjumān."

On folio 60b: An ownership statement, written within a decorative frame, in black, brown and green, with drawings of five musicians playing different instrument, only the first drawing (a female playing the tambourine is complete and colored): "Haydah al-kitāb al-Tarjmā [al-Tarjumān] ilá al-ʻabd al-faqīr Yūsuf ibn Ḥannā Tūmā al-Mārūnī."
On folio 61a: A dated ownership statement, as follows: "al-Faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-ṣāḥib al-mahīn, sanat 1092 [1681/1682]."
On folio 61b: Statements in Ottoman Turkish.
On the end pages statements in Italian.
In beautiful and large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the Ottoman Turkish terms written beneath the Arabic terms in red; headings in red; catchwords.
Colophon: "Tamma wa-kamula bi-ḥamd [Allāh] wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tammat. Tammat."

Translation of the colophon: "It is concluded and completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. May God pray of our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace. It is concluded. It is concluded."

record.title: 880-03 Minhāj al-karāmah fī maʻrifat al-imāmah : manuscript / al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī.
record.note: Title of "Minhāj al-karāmah fī maʻrifat al-imāmah" from incipit (folio 1a)
Title of "al-Tatimmah fī tawārīkh al-Aimmah" from folio 77a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of "Minhāj al-karāmah fī maʻrifat al-imāmah": The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... al-masāʼil min ghayr taṭwīl mumill wa-lā ījāz mukhill. Wa-sammaytuhā [Minhāj] al-karāmah fī maʻrifat al-imāmah. Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá fuṣūl. al-Faṣl al-awwal: Fī naql al-madhāhib [fī hādhihi al-masʼalah]. Dhahabat al-Imāmīyah ilá [anna] Allāh taʻālá ʻadl [ḥakīm lā] yafʻalu qabīḥan wa-lā yukhillu bi-wājib, wa-anna afʻālahu innamā taqaʻu li-gharaḍ ṣaḥīḥ wa-ḥikmah, wa-annahu lā yafʻalu al-ẓulm wa-lā al-ʻabath, wa-annahu raʼūf raḥīm bi-al-ʻibād, yafʻalu bihim mā huwa al-aṣlaḥ lahum wa-al-anfaʻ ..."
Secundo folio: yastaḥiqqu thawāban wa-al-ʻāṣī lā yastaḥiqqu ʻiqāban.

Incipit of "al-Tatimmah fī tawārīkh al-Aʼimmah" (folio 77a): The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... bayna ulī al-ḥubb wa-al-bughḍ, wa-malaʼat aqṭār al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-kam ẓahara fīhā min kitāb bāligh, wa-zahara [wa-ẓahara] fīhā min shihāb bāzigh, wa-naẓamtu fī silk tārīkhihim tawārīkh man ʻāṣarahum min al-khulafāʼ wa-baʻḍ al-mashhūrīn min ghayrihim, wa-baʻḍ ʻamalī kāna min al-qaṣaṣ wa-al-fawāʼid ʻalá wajh al-ikhtiṣār. Wa-qad sammaytu hādhihi al-risālah bi-al-Tatimmah fī tawārīkh al-Aʼimmah, wa-banaytuhā ʻalá arbaʻat ʻashar faṣlan, ʻadada al-maʻṣūmīn, ṣalawāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn ..."
Secundo folio of "al-Tatimmah fī tawārīkh al-Aʼimmah": wa-inshiqāquhu min ḥamuda bi-ḍamm al-Mīm.

Incipit of "Mulḥah" (Anecdote) transmitted from Jaʻfar al-Ṣādiq (folio 125a): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-hādhihi Malḥamah [Mulḥah] marwīyah ʻan Mawlānā Jaʻfar ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣādiq (ʻA), rawāhā ʻan jaddihi Amīr al-Muʼminīn, ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣ[allá] Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻan alwāḥ Mūsá ibn ʻImrān (ʻA): Rawá Abū Baṣīr qāl: Ḥaḍartu majlis Imāminā Jaʻfar ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣadiq (ʻA), fa-qultu la-hu: Ya Ibn Rasūl Allāh, urīdu an [tuʻlimanī (?)] bi-mā uʻlimta min umūr al-Sunnah, fa-qāl: Innahu lammā arāda Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, an yaqbiḍa Mūsá (ʻA), amarahu an yūdiʻa al-alwāḥ fī dhālika al-jabal, ilá an baʻatha Allāh, subḥānuhu, Muḥammad al-Muṣṭafá (Ṣ) ..."
Secundo folio of "Mulḥah" (Anecdote) transmitted from Jaʻfar al-Ṣādiq: bayna al-ʻāmmah wa-yaqtulu al-mulūk baʻḍuhā baʻḍan.

Incipit of "A Shīʻī anecdote/quotation from "al-Tahdhīb" of al-Ṭūsī (folio 127a): "Min 'al-Tahdhīb' lil-Ṭūsī fī ʻilm al-Ḥadīth: Ruwiya ʻan al-Aṣmaʻī qāl: Raʼaytu ʻinda maqām Ibrāhīm (ʻA) shābban ḥasan al-wajh lā nabāt bi-ʻāriḍayhi yatakallamu ʻalá al-nās bi-al-minbar, wa-min jumlat kalāmihi: Salūnī qabla an tafqidūnī fa-inna bayna janbayya ʻilaman jamman warithtuhu ʻan Rasūl Allāh (Ṣ), fa-qultu fī nafsī: Hādhihi al-kalimah lam tusmaʻ illā min Amīr al-Muʼminīn (ʻA) ..."
14.5 x 18 cm; written surface: 10 x 12.5 cm; 15-17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding; dark red leather on spine.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On the preliminary leaf: "Tawḥīd al-Shīʻah" (in pencil).
folios [128-134] are blank.

Colophon of "Minhāj al-karāmah fī maʻrifat al-imāmah" (folio 76b): "Fa-hādhā ākhir mā aradnā ithbātahu fī hādhihi al-muqaddimah. Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb. Tamma al-kitāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min takmilat naqṣ hādhā al-kitāb fī awqāt ākhiruhā nahār al-Aḥad al-ḥādī min al-ʻushr al-thālith min al-shahr al-sābiʻ ..."

Translation of the colophon of "Minhāj al-karāmah fī maʻrifat al-imāmah": "This is the end of what we intended to record in this introduction. God is He who facilitates to what is correct. The book is completed. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. What was lacking in this book was completed on different times, the last of which was on Sunday, the first of the third tenth of the seventh month ..."

Colophon of "al-Tatimmah fī tawārīkh al-Aʼimmah": "Wa-hādhā muntahá mā qaṣadnāh, wa-ākhir mā aradnāh min jamʻ hādhihi al-tawārīkh. Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taʼlīfihā ẓuhr yawm al-Aḥad, ākhir Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-iḥdá wa-ʻishrīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. ʻAlá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilá raḥmatih, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn Yūnus, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah, wa-li-jamīʻ al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt. Ākhir kalāmihi, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-risālah nahār al-Aḥad, ākhir Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat ithnayn wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf Hijrīyah, ʻalá musharrifihā al-salām. Tammat. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn, ṣalawāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn."

Translation of the colophon of "al-Tatimmah fī tawārīkh al-Aʼimmah": "This is the end of what we intended, and the last of what we wanted, from compiling these histories. They were completed on the noon of Sunday, the end of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1121 [9 June 1709]. Praise be to God alone. Copied by the hand of the poorest of the servants of God, and the neediest to His mercy, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn Yūnus, may God forgive him and his parents, those who invoke forgiveness for them, and for all believers, men and women. These were his last words; may God have mercy upon him. This epistle was copied on Sunday, the end of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1122 of the Hijrah of the Noble Prophet [29 May 1710], peace be upon Him. It is completed. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and his pure family. May the prayers of God be upon all of them."

Colophon of "Mulḥah" (Anecdote) transmitted from Jaʻfar al-Ṣādiq: No colophon. Text ends as follows: "... Wa-idhā kāna al-Muḥarram al-Jumʻah yakūnu al-shitāʼ qalīl al-bard wa-qalīl al-maṭar fī al-awdīyah wa-taʻlū [wa-taqillu] al-ghallāt fī al-jibāl wa-taʻlū al-asʻār bi-hā, wa-turā [wa-turá] bi-nawāḥī al-Maghrib, wa-yakūnu al-qaḥṭ wa-al-ghalāʼ bi-nawāḥī al-Mashriq wa-Khurasān, wa-yaḥduthu bi-al-nās awjāʻ sawdāyah [sawdāwīyah] wa-al-awjāʻ al-ḥārrah al-yābisah, wa-yakūnu al-khawf, wa-tuṣābu [wa-tuṣību] al-ashjār bi-arḍ Baghdād āfah, wa-yakūnu lil-Rūm wuthūb ʻalá al-Sulṭān, wa-yakūnu al-ghalab lil-Sulṭān ʻalayhim, wa-yaqtulu baynahum khalq kathīr wa-yaghtammūn, wa-yakūnu al-dāʼ ʻalayhim. Tammat."

Colophon of "A Shīʻī anecdote/quotation from "al-Tahdhīb" of al-Ṭūsī": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... fa-hashama Allāh min hādhā khayshūmahu wa-qaṭaʻa minhu ḥayzūmahu, wa-ammā ṣāḥib al-nafaqah wa-al-ʻamal fa-huwa kathīr al-khawf wa-al-bukāʼ, ṭawīl ..."

record.title: 880-03 Rawḍ al-akhyār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Amāsī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Rawḍ al-akhyār: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Rawḍah al-ūlá: Fī al-dīn wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hi min al-ʻibādāt. ʻAn al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāla ʻalá al-minbar: Ashʻar kalimah qālathā al-ʻArab, kalimat Labīd: Alā kullu shayʼin mā khalā Allāha bāṭilu ..."
Secundo folio: rabbaka, fa-qāl: Anā ʻabd mā lā ará.

Incipit of al-Ḥawāshī (The commentaries): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wulida bi-Makkah ʻĀma al-Fīl, laylat al-Ithnayn, al-thāniyah min Rabīʻ al-Awwal, wa-fī al-arbaʻīn buʻitha rasūlan, wa-fī al-rābiʻah wa-al-khamsīn hājara ilá al-Madīnah, wa-tuwuffiya bi-hā, wa-ʻumruhu thalāth wa-sittūn, wa-dufina fī ḥujrat ʻĀʼishah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhā ..."
Secundo folio of al-Ḥawāshī (The commentaries): nuqila ʻanhā annahā idhā arādat an tasjuda lil-ṣanam.
11 x 16 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14 cm; 12-19 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mimmā manna bi-hi al-Mawlá ʻalayya. Innanī taḥaṣṣaltu ʻalá hādhihi al-dhakhīrah al-yatīmah, wa-hiya muḥarrarah bi-khaṭṭ al-Imām Muḥammad ibn al-Khaṭīb Qāsim, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá."
At the head of folio 1a: A reader's/owner's statement, in the name of Ḥannālī Zādah and a signature.
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations in poetry and prose, in Arabic and Persian.

On folio 1b: Miscellaneous biographical quotations from "Kitāb al-Laṭāʼif al-sanīyah fī al-tawārīkh al-Islāmīyah, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Fakhr al-Dīn ʻUthmān ibn ʻImād al-Dīn Ismāʻīl, al-maʻrūf bi-al-ʻAdūlī al-Ḥimṣī, raḥimahu Allāh."
On folios 2a-3a: A detailed index of contents of the first part of the book: "Fihrist Kitāb al-Rawḍah li-Ibn Khaṭīb Qāsim."
On folios 3b-4b: A detailed index of contents of the second part "al-Ḥawāshī" (The commentaries): "Fihris Ḥawāshī 'Rawḍ al-akhyār', li-ṣāḥibihā Ibn al-Khaṭīb Qāsim."
On folio 4b: Miscellaneous biographical quotations.

On folio 5a: Biographical information about the author of Rawḍ al-akhyār "al-Mawlá Muḥyī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-Khaṭīb Qāsim, min al-Shaqāʼiq", quoted from "al-Shaqāʼiq al-Nuʻmānīyah fī ʻulamāʼ al-Dawlah al-ʻUthmānīyah" of Ṭāshkubrīʹzādah (Aḥmad ibn Muṣṭafá, 1495-1561).

On folio 5a: An ownership statement, dated in the year 1280 of the Hijrah (1863/1864), in the name of Ḥasan Rāshid al-Mashhadī ibn al-Sayyid Muṣṭafá Rāshid al-Mashhadī, as follows: "Wa-min bāb al-taḥadduth bi-al-niʻmah: Innanī istaḥwaztu hādhihi al-dhakhīrah al-yatīmah wa-al-kanz al-dafīn al-mamlūʼ jawāhir al-ʻulūm, al-muḥarrar bi-khaṭṭ al-muʼallif nafsih, al-marḥūm al-madhkūr, al-Mawlá Muḥyī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-Khaṭīb, ṣāḥib al-tarjamah, fa-hiya min barakatih wa-khulūṣ nīyatih. Ṣār kull man istaḥwaza ʻalayhā yuḥāfiẓ ʻalayhā ghāyat al-taḥaffuẓ. Wa-hā naḥnu iqtadaynā bi-him, wa-bazalnā [wa-badhalnā] lilladhī kānat ʻindahu mablagh jasīm, ḥattá samaḥat nafsuhu bi-hi, li-ʻilmaihi annanā naḥtafiẓ ʻalá khuṭūṭ al-ʻulamāʼ, wa-law dufiʻa lanā fīhā ʻishrūn Junayhan lā nusallimu fīhā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh yajʻaluhā baʻda wafātinā taḥtyad [taḥta yad] man yakūnu ṭabʻuhu ḥifẓ al-sunnah, wa-lā yatahāwanu bi-hā, fa-hiya ʻind [ʻindī] min sanat 1280 Hilālīyah, wa-anā muḥtafiẓ ʻalayhā ghāyat al-ḥifẓ, laʻalla Allāh yaḥfaẓuhā baʻdanā min īd [yad] al-jahalah. Kātibuhu Ḥasan Rāshid al-Mashhadī ibn al-Sayyid Muṣṭafá Rāshid al-Mashhadī."
On folios 227a-230b: Miscellaneous quotations, mostly in Arabic, some in Persian.

Colophon of the author at the end of "Rawḍ al-akhyār", dating in "Ḥisāb al-jummal" (Alphabetical reckoning) the completion of his treatise: "Qad tamma hādhā al-rawḍu fī faṣl al-Rabīʻ // rāʻa al-zamāna bi-rayʻihi fī faṣlihi. Lammā saʼaltu 'al-ʻAqla' ʻan tārīkhihi // qad jāʼa fī al-tārīkhi bāʼa bi-faḍlihi. Sanat 911.

Translation of the colophon of the author: "This 'Garden' was completed in the Spring // It fascinated time by its beauty in its season. When I inquired of 'Intelect' about its date // She said, for a date: 'It returned with its bounty'. In the year 911 [of the Hijrah = 1505]."
Colophon of al-Ḥawāshī (The commentaries): "Tammat 'Ḥawāshī al-Rawḍah' li-Ibn Khaṭīb Qāsim."
Translation of the colophon of Ḥawāshī al-Rawḍah: "The commentaries on al-Rawḍah of Ibn Khaṭīb Qāsim are completed."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥuqūq ikhwat al-Islām : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, naḥmaduhu wa-nastaʻīnuhu, [wa-]naʻūdhu billāh min shurūr anfusinā wa-min sayyiʼāt aʻmālinā, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, wa-anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, wa-al-ṣalāhxx wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-iʻlam ayyuhā al-ṭālib al-ṣādiq anna lil-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻalá al-ummah ḥuqūqan, wa-anna lil-Muslimīn, baʻḍihim ʻalá baʻḍ, ḥuqūqan; fa-fī muʻāsharat al-ṣadīq maʻa al-ṣadīq, wa-al-ḥabīb maʻa al-ḥabīb, wa-al-khalīl maʻa al-khalīl, wa-al-shaykh maʻa al-murīd, wa-al-murīd maʻa al-shaykh, wa-al-ʻālim maʻa al-mutaʻallim, wa-al-mutaʻallim maʻa al-ʻālim, wa-al-muʻallim maʻa al-ṣabī, wa-al-amīr maʻa al-raʻīyah, wa-al-raʻīyah maʻa al-amīr, wa-al-ghanī maʻa al-faqīr, wa-al-faqīr maʻa al-ghanī, wa-aḥad al-zawjayn maʻa al-ākhar, wa-al-jār maʻa al-jār, wa-al-muḍīf maʻa al-ḍayf, wa-al-wālid maʻa al-walad, wa-al-walad maʻa al-wālid, wa-al-qarīb maʻa al-qarīb, wa-al-sayyid maʻa al-mamlūk, wa-al-mamlūk maʻa al-sayyid, wa-al-Muslim maʻa Muslim ākhar, wa-al-Muslim maʻa al-kāfir al-ḥarbī aw al-dhimmī, wa-al-ṣāliḥ maʻa al-ṭāliḥ wa-maʻa al-mubtadiʻ, ḥuqūq wa-sharāʼiṭ wa-ādāb wa-lawāzim. Wa-naḥnu nubayyinu kull dhālik ʻalá wajh al-ījāz, wa-billāh al-tawfīq ..."
Secundo folio: qāla Allāh taʻālá: Ruḥamāʼ baynahum.
14.5 x 20.6 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 14.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding; dark brown leather on spine and the edges.
In good naskh script, in black ink, headings in red; some corrections and commentaries on the margins; some wormholes on the margins; catchwords.

On the back of the front cover: Ownership statements: 1. "Qad tamallaka hādhā al-kitāb al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilayhi, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, Muṣṭafá ibn Maḥmūd, ʻafá ʻanhumā al-Maʻbūd, wa-nāla al-maqṣūd. Fī 23 Rajab, sanat 116 [1116 of the Hijrah = 21 November, 1704]." 2. "[... ... ...] Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān [... ... ...[ ibn Rajab al-Ḥanbalī. Fī 23 Rajab, sanat 1161 [of the Hijrah = 19 July, 1748]."
On the back of the front cover: Miscellaneous incantations and quotations.
At the head of folio 1a: "Risālah fī ḥuqūq ikhwat al-Islām."
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations in Ottoman Turkish.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-hādhā jawāb ʻan ibtidāʼ al-muwākhāh maʻa al-fāsiq, fa-innahu lam yataqaddam la-hu ḥaqq, fa-in taqaddamat la-hu qarābah fa-lā jaram, lā yanbaghī an tuqāṭiʻ, bal tajāhal, wa-al-dalīl ʻalayhi anna tark al-muwākhāh wa-al-ṣuḥbah ibtidāʼan laysa bi-madhmūm wa-lā makrūh, bal qāla qāʼilūn al-infirād awlá, fa-ammā qaṭʻ al-ukhūwah fī dawāmihā fa-manhī ʻanhu wa-madhmūm fī nafsih, wa-nisbatuhu ilá tarkih ibtidāʼan ka-nisbat al-ṭlāq ilá al-nikāḥ, wa-al-ṭalāq abghaḍ ilá Allāh min tark al-nikāḥ. Qāla ʻA.M. [ʻalayhi al-salām]: Shirār ʻibād Allāh al-mashshāʼun bi-al-namīmah, al-mufarriqūn bayna al-aḥibbah. Wa-qāla baʻḍ al-salaf fī dhillāt al-ikhwān: Wa-al-Shayṭān an yulqiya ʻalá akhīkum mithl hādhā ḥattá tahjurūhu wa-taqṭaʻūhu, fa-mādhā laqītum min maḥabbat ʻadūwikum. Wa-hādhā li-anna al-tafarruq bayna al-aḥbāb min mujāb al-Shayṭān, kamā anna mufāraqat ..."

record.title: 880-03 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Mawlid al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Dardīr : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-faḍl wa-al-inʻām, alladhī anār al-wujūd bi-mawlid Sayyid al-Anām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, imām kull imām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-ahl baytih al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Ibrāhīm al-Bayjūrī dhū al-taqṣīr, ghafara la-hu Mawlāhu al-khabīr al-baṣīr: Qad ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥ Allāh lī wa-la-hu al-ḥāl wa-al-shān, kitābah laṭīfah ʻalá Mawlid al-Bashīr al-Nadhīr, lil-ʻārif bi-Rabbihi, Abī al-Barakāt Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr, nafaʻanī Allāh wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakātih, wa-aʻāda ʻalayya wa-ʻalayhim min ṣāliḥ daʻawātih, fa-ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalab, mutawassilan bi-Sayyid al-ʻAjam wa-al-ʻArab ..."
Secundo folio: li-annahu ʻalam al-dhāt al-wājib al-wujūd.

On folios 45b-46a: Text on the death and burial of al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Saqqā, starts as follows: "Yawm al-Khamīs, arbaʻat ʻashar Jumādá al-Thāniyah sanat 1289 tuwuffiya al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil, Shaykh al-mashāyikh al-ajillāʼ al-fuḍalāʼ, al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Saqqā, wa-dufin yawm al-Jumʻah 15 minhu baʻd al-ẓuhr, wa-rathawhu ʻulamāʼ al-ʻaṣr bi-qaṣāʼid jammah, wa-min ḍimnihā hādhihi al-qaṣīdah lil-ʻālim al-nabīh, al-Shaykh al-Hirrāwī, allatī quriʼat ʻalayhi bi-al-Azhar yawm dafnihi, raḥmat Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhi: Bi-al-Muslimīn al-yawma ḥalla balāʼu // dāʼun ʻaẓīmun mā ilayhi dawāʼu ..." The eulogy poem ends with: "... Mā qāla ahlu al-ʻilmi bal kullu al-wará // bi-al-Muslimīna al-yawma ḥalla balāʼu. Intahat. Abyātuhā ʻadad 35."
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 5 unnumbered quires), wrapped in yellow thick paper.

In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "Mawlid al-Dardīr" preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his saying) in red; markings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On the front of the wrapping paper: Quotations in poetry and prose, including rhetorical play on words, as follows: "Min kalām al-Qāḍī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Arrajānī [1067 or 1068-1149 or 1150]: Uḥibbu al-marʼa ẓāhiruhu jamīlu // li-ṣāḥibihi wa-bāṭinuhu salīm. Mawaddatuhu tadūmu li-kulli hawlin // wa-hal kullun mawaddatuhu tadūmu. al-Bayt al-akhīr yuqraʼu maʻkūsan min ākhirihi ilá awwalih, wa-lā yataghayyaru shayʼ min lafẓihi wa-lā min maʻnāh. Wa-mithluhu qawl al-ʻImād al-Kātib [al-Kātib al-Iṣfahānī, ʻImād al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1125-1201], tilmīdh al-Qāḍī al-madhkūr aʻlāh, ḥīna raʼāhu rākib al-faras Sarfalā: 'Kabā bika al-faras' [Sir fa-lā kabā bika al-faras], wa-qawl al-Qāḍī mujīban la-hu: 'Dāma ʻulā al-ʻImād'."
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyat Shaykh al-Islām al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Bayjūrī ʻalá Mawlid Abī al-Barakāt Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Dardīr, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-himā wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. M."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah fī yawm al-Khamīs, 18 Shawwāl, sanat 1286, ʻalá yad kātibihā al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muqirr bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, al-ghanī billāh, Sālim ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Ḥasan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-ikhwānihi fī Allāh, wa-li-aqāribihi, wa-li-aḥbābihi, wa-li-man ḥaḍara fīhā, wa-li-jamīʻ mashāyikhihi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-li-jamīʻ al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-Huwa ḥasbī, wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-sallam. Subḥāna Rabbika Rabbi al-ʻIzzah ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on Thursday, 18 Shawwāl, 1286 [of the Hijrah = 21January 1870], by the hand of the poor and despised, who admits his shortcoming and inadequacy, the rich in God, Sālim ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Ḥasan, may God forgive him, his parents, his brethren in God, his relatives, his loved ones, those who attend its [recitation], all his masters, all Muslim men and women, and all believers (men and women). Praise be to God Lord of the Universe, He suffices me, He is the best advocate. There is no power nor might except in God, the Most High and the Most Powerful. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the Illiterate Prophet, and on his family and companions and grant them peace. Glory be to God, the Lord of Might, far is He from what they ascribe to Him. May peace be upon the Messengers. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

record.title: M. W. Holley letter, Fort Yamhill, Oregon, to "Dear Hazen", 1857 May 31 : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Accompanied by a typed transcript made by an unidentified transcriber.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Unmūdhaj fī al-naḥw : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Ardabīlī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻArabīyah miftāḥ al-bayān wa-ṣayyarahā ālatan naḥtarizu bi-hā ʻan al-khaṭaʼ fī al-lisān, wa-qawwama bi-sababihā al-manṭiqa alladhī huwa mumayyizu al-insān wa-hayyaʼahā sullaman yurtaqá bi-hā ilá dhirwat ḥaq̄āʼiq al-Qurʼān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-anām, Muḥammad ṣāḥib al-Furqān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih ruʼasāʼ ahl al-īmān ..."
Secundo folio: rūḥahu aʻnī unmūzajahu [unmūdhajahu] fī al-naḥw.
14.7 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 14 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.

In good and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Unmūdhaj fī al-naḥw preceded by the phrase "Yaqūlu" (He says) and the commentary by the phrase "Aqūlu" (I say), both in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Sharḥ al-Unmūzaj [al-Unmūdhaj] lil-ʻAllāmah Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Ardabīlī, raḥimahu Allāh."

On folio 1a: A reader's statement dated in the year 1116 of the Hijrah (1704/1705): "Naẓara fīhi wa-daʻā li-ṣāḥibihi bi-al-maghfirah al-faqīr Sayyid ʻUmar al-Daqqāq, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Fī sanat 1116."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Malakahu min faḍl Rabbihi al-Ṣamad al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Fattāl."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement dated in the year 1134 of the Hijrah (1721/1722): "Malakahu min faḍl al-ʻAlī Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Laṭīf al-ʻUmarī. 1134."
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations in Ottoman Turkish and Arabic poetry.

Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh fī shahr al-Muḥarram, fī yawm ʻishrīn, fī yawm al-Ithnayn, fī waqt al-ʻaṣr, fī al-mawḍiʻ al-mubārak, fī balad al-Miṣr, fī sanat tisʻ ʻishrīn baʻda al-alf. Katabahu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-mudhnib al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Ghaffār, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-aḥsana ilayhimā wa-ilayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Lord Muḥammad and all his family. It was completed during the month of Muḥarram, on the twentieth day, on Monday, in the afternoon, at the blessed place in Egypt, in the year 1029 [of the Hijrah = 27 December, 1619]. Copied by the despised poor, the sinner who is in need for the mercy of his forgiving Lord. May God forgive him and his parents and treat them and him with kindness with all Muslims. Amen. O Lord of the Universe.

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Ājurrūmīyah fī uṣūl ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah : manuscript / Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ghanī, Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī, wa-ajrāhu ʻalá ʻawāʼid birrihi al-ḥafī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ maqām al-muntaṣibīn li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd, al-khāfiḍīn janāḥahum lil-mustafīd, al-jāzimīn bi-anna tashīl al-naḥw ilá al-ʻulūm, mann Allāh taʻālá, min ghayr shakk wa-lā tardīd, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-muʻrib bi-al-lisān al-faṣīḥ ʻammā fī ḍamīrihi min ghayr gharābah wa-lā tanāfur wa-lā taʻqīd, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī al-faṣāḥah wa-al-balāghah wa-al-tajrīd. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Sharḥ laṭīf li-alfāẓ al-Ājurrūmīyah fī uṣūl ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah, li-yanfaʻa [li-yantafiʻa] bi-hā al-mubtadī, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, wa-lā yaḥtāju ilayhi al-muntahī, ʻamiltuhu (allaftuhu) lil-ṣighār fī al-fann wa-al-aṭfāl, lā lil-mārisīn lil-ʻilm min fuḥūl al-rijāl, ḥamalanī ʻalayhi Shaykh al-waqt wa-al-ṭarīqah, wa-maʻdin al-sulūk wa-al-ḥaqīqah, Sayyidī wa-Mawlāy, al-ʻārif bi-Rabbihi al-ʻAlī, Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻAbbās al-Azharī, nafaʻanī Allāh bi-barakātih, wa-aʻāda ʻalayya wa-ʻalá al-Muslimīn min ṣāliḥ daʻawātih, innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr ..."
Secundo folio: al-jāzimīn bi-anna tashīl al-naḥw.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 12 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with spine; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Ājurrūmīyah in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-Shaykh Khālid ʻalá al-Ājurrūmīyah."
At the head of folio 1b: A note by a reader about the nine different ways of parsing the phrase "al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm", according to the three forms of inflection "iʻrāb": al-Jarr, al-rafʻ al-naṣb.

Colophon: "Qāla al-muʼallif: Wa-hādhā ākhir mā aradnā dhikrahu ʻalá hādhihi al-Muqaddimah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi yawm al-Thalāth al-mubārak, iḥdá ʻashar shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1235, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Allāh, al-mudhnib al-ḍaʻīf, Muṣṭafá Ḥasan al-shahīr bi-al-ʻArīf, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi. M."

Translation of the colophon: "The author said: This is the end of what we intended to mention about this Introduction, but God is more knowledgeable of what is correct, to Him is the reference and returning. The copy was completed on blessed Tuesday, 11 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1235 [of the Hijrah = 19 September, 1820], by the hand of the poorest of the servants, the feeble sinner, Muṣṭafá Ḥasan, al-shahīr bi-al-ʻArīf, may God forgive him and his parents. M."

record.title: 880-02 Rashf al-zulāl min al-siḥr al-ḥalāl : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "al-Maqāmah al-musammāh bi-Rashf al-zulāl min al-siḥr al-ḥalāl, fī 12 [21] ʻālim, tazawwaja kull minhum, wa-waṣafa laylatahu, murwiyan bi-alfāẓ fannihi, wa-mā maʻahā, lil-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-ḥabr al-fahhāmah, farīd dahrihi wa-waḥīd ʻaṣrihi al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥaká Abū Dharr Nafīs ibn Abī Idrīs, qāl: Kharajnā yawma ʻīd, ilá masjid baʻīd, wa-naḥnu shabībah mutaqāribūn, wa-ʻuṣbah fī al-sinn mutajādhibūn, fa-lammā quḍiyat al-ṣalāh nuṣiba al-minbar bi-al-falāh, wa-ṣaʻida al-imām, fa-kabbara wa-hallal, wa-ḥamida Allāh wa-bajjal, wa-ṣallá ʻalá Nabīyihi al-mursal ..."
Secundo folio: fa-lammā faragha min ʻiẓatih wa-intahá min khuṭbatih.
13.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 11 x 18 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In dark green cardboard binding.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; no catchwords.
Colophon: No colophon. The manuscript ends with miscellaneous texts on erotica and a mathematical riddle.

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar sīrat al-Rasūl : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb: Iʻlam, raḥimaka Allāh, inna afraḍa mā faraḍa Allāh ʻalayk maʻrifat dīnika alladhī maʻrifatuhu wa-al-ʻamal bi-hi sabab li-dukhūl al-Jannah, wa-al-jahl bi-hi wa-iḍāʻatuhu sabab li-dukhūl al-nār. Wa-min awḍaḥ mā yakūnu li-dhawī al-fahm qiṣaṣ al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn, qiṣaṣ man aṭā̄ʻahu wa-mā faʻala bi-him, wa-qiṣaṣ man ʻaṣāhu wa-mā faʻala bi-him. Fa-man lam yafham dhālik wa-lam yantafiʻ bi-hi, fa-lā ḥīlata fīhi ..."
Secundo folio: wa-Lūṭ wa-qawmihi wa-Mūsá wa-qawmihi.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 17 cm; 20-21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather; cover embossed with central medallion.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi sīrat al-qiṣaṣ, ikhtaṣarahā al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-aʻẓama la-hu al-ajr wa-al-thawāb, wa-adkhalahu al-Jannah bi-ghayr ḥisāb. Āmīn."
The first part of the manuscript ends with: "Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá aʻlam, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran."

On folio 13b: A note by a reader, in a crude hand, at the end of the first part of the manuscript, with a partial date, which does not seem to be authentic, as follows: "Tamma hādhā bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-tawfīqih, ḍuḥá yawm al-Ithnayn, min ḥadā [aḥad (?)] shuhūr sanat khams wa-thamānīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [1185 of the Hijrah = 1771/1772]."

Colophon: "Wāfaqa al-farāgh min naskh hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah yawm al-Sabt, māḍin min Ṣafar yawmayn, sanat 1283 min Hijratihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻalá yad ʻabdihi wa-ibn ʻabdihi Aḥmad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This noble copy was written on Saturday, two days having passed from Ṣafar, of the year 1283 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [16 June, 1866], may God pray on him and grant him peace, by the hand of His servant, the son of His servant, ʻIsá ibn Muḥammad, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims. Amen."
