record.title: 880-01 Muntakhab al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr : manuscript.
record.note: Title of Muntakhab al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr supplied by cataloger.
Title of Sharḥ al-Burdah from folio 29a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Muntakhab al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Huwa al-muʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-lā ʻudwān illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn. Wa-baʻd, yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilayhi, subḥānuhu, al-rājī ʻafwahu wa-iḥsānah: Iṭṭalaʻtu ʻalá kitāb al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr al-mutaḍammin Ḥadīth al-Bashīr al-Nadhīr, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn, qadra mā sahaw [sahā] ʻan dhikrihi al-sāhīn [al-sāhūn], wa-qadra mā dhakarahu al-dhākirīn [al-dhākirūn], fa-intakhabtu minhu ʻalá qadr al-istiṭāʻah li-mā huwa al-iḥtiyāj ilá fahmihi al-mufīd, wa-al-ʻamal bi-ḍimnihi al-sadīd, wa-dhālika nammaqtuhu, wa-lam adhkur fīhi al-riwāyāt limā huwa maʻlūm anna al-naql min al-kitāb al-mafhūm. Wa-nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá ḥusn al-tawfīq wa-al-hidāyah ilá awfaq al-ṭarīq bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn. al-Ḥadīth: Atānī ātin min ʻinda Rabbī, ʻazza wa-jall, fa-qāl: Man ṣallá ʻalayka min ummatika ṣalātan katab Allāh bi-hā ʻashr ḥasanāt wa-maḥá ʻanhu ʻashr sayyiʼāt wa-rafaʻa la-hu ʻashr darajāt wa-radda ʻalayhi mithlahā ..."
Secundo folio of Muntakhab al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr: Ittakhidhū al-sarāwīl fa-innahā astar thiyābikum.

Incipit of Sharḥ al-Burdah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh mustaḥiqq al-ḥamd wa-al-tahlīl wa-al-takbīr wa-al-tasbīḥ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣāḥib al-wajh al-malīḥ wa-al-qadd al-rajīḥ wa-al-lisān al-faṣīḥ, wa-ʻalá ālihi [wa-]aṣḥābih ulī al-iqtibās wa-al-taḍmīn wa-al-ḥall wa-al-ʻaqd wa-al-talmīḥ, yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ghanī Khālid ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Azharī: Qad saʼaltanī, ayyuhā al-akh al-najīḥ, an aḍaʻa sharḥan laṭīfan ʻalá Burdat al-madīḥ, lil-Shaykh al-Imām Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Abūṣīrī, raḥimahu Allāh, mushtamilan ʻalá bayān lughātihā wa-iʻrāb abyātihā wa-īḍāḥ maʻānīhā atamma tawḍīḥ, fa-ajabtuka li-mā saʼalta ʻalá wifq mā ikhtarta, muqtaṣiran ʻalá al-qawl al-ṣaḥīḥ ..."
Secundo folio of Sharḥ al-Burdah: uslūb ākhar mushtamilan ʻalá shayʼayn.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 19 lines per page (Muntakhab al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr); 10.5 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page (Sharḥ al-Burdah).
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; brown leather on spine and flap.
Muntakhab al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr is in fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; few notes and corrections on the margins; some markings in red; catchwords.

Sharḥ al-Burdah is written in a different hand, in fair and thick naskh script; in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; the verses of al-Burdah underlined in red; markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations.
At the head of folio 1a: "al-Burdah lil-Shaykh Khālid."
On folio 28b: An ownership statement: "Thumma intaqala ilá mulk al-faqīr al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-qadīr [... ... ...] Muṣṭafá aghnāhu al-Mawlá [... ... ...] kāna Allāhu la-hu ḥaythu mā kān. Āmīn."
At the head of folio 29a: "Sharḥ al-Burdah, lil-Shaykh Khālid, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Āmīn. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."
On folio 29a: An invocation, titled: "Ḥizb al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī."

On folio 80b: An ownership statement: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Ṣāra fī nawbat al-ʻabd al-faqīr li-Mawlāhu al-ghanī, al-Sharīf Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ḥusāmī [?] al-Mīqātī, bi-tārīkh awāʼil shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, iftitāḥ sanat ithnayn wa-arbaʻīn [?] wa-alf [1042 (?) of the Hijrah = 19 July 1632 (?)]."

Colophon of Muntakhab al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr (folio 28b): "Katabahu bi-yadihi al-fāniyah al-bāliyah al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-mudhnib al-faqīr, rājī ʻafwa man yujību al-dāʻī Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-shahīr bi-al-Junayd al-Rifāʻī, ghafara Allāh taʻālá la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man qaraʼ fīhi wa-daʻā la-hum bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of Muntakhab al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr: "Copied in the perishing and worn out hand of the despised, sinner and poor servant who aspires to the forgiveness of Him who answers who invokes Him, Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-shahīr bi-al-Junayd al-Rifāʻī, may God Almighty forgive him, his parents and him who reads it [the book] and invokes forgiveness for them and for the Muslims. Amen. Amen. Amen. Amen."

Colophon of Sharḥ al-Burdah: "Qāla muʼallifuhu ʻallāmat zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Khālid ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimah Allāh taʻālá: Farightu min taʻlīqihi yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, li-ʻishrīn min Rajab, sanat thalāth wa-tisʻimiʼah min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan aṣḥāb Rasūl Allāh ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of Sharḥ al-Burdah: "Its author, the scholar of his time, the unique in his era and age, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Khālid ibn Abī Bakr al-Azharī al-Shāfiʻī, may God Almighty have mercy upon him, said: I finished writing it on Wednesday, 20 Rajab, of the year 903 of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best prayer and peace be upon him. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions and grant them peace. May God be pleased with the all companions of the Messenger of God. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-03 al-Unmūdhaj fī al-naḥw : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalimah lafẓ mufrad, immā ism ka-rajul, wa-immā fiʻl ka-ḍarab, wa-immā ḥarf ka-qad. al-Kalām muʼallaf immā min ismayn usnida aḥaduhumā ilá al-ākhar, naḥwa Zaydun qāʼimun, aw min fiʻl wa-ism naḥwa ḍaraba Zaydun wa-yusammá kalāman wa-jumlatan ..."
Secundo folio: al-ṣarf li-khiffatihi wa-ʻadam al-ṣarf li-ḥuṣūl al-sababayn.
17 x 25 cm; written surface: 10 x 17 cm; 22 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā matn al-Unmūdhaj fī al-naḥw lil-ʻAllāmah al-Zamakhsharī, raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn."
Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi al-ʻibād. Āmīn Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. M. Āmīn."
Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King. May God benefit by it the servants. Amen. O Lord of the Universe. M. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Hadīyat al-faqīr li-Ḥaḍrat al-Wazīr : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Khayr al-Marḥūmī, al-Azharī, al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Title from Colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Incipit missing. Text starts with: "... huwa khiṭāb yaʻummu al-mukallafīn wa-al-amānāt wa-in nazalat fī ʻUthmān ibn Ṭalḥah ibn ʻAbd al-Dār, wa-kāna sādin al-Kaʻabah [ay khādimahā, ṣaḥḥ], wa-dhālika anna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ḥiyna dakhala Makkah yawm al-fatḥ aghlaqa ʻUthmān bāb al-Kaʻbah wa-ṣaʻida al-saṭḥ, wa-abá an yadfaʻa al-miftāḥ ilayhi, wa-qāl: Law ʻalimtu annahu Rasūl Allāh lam amnaʻhu, fa-lawá ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, yadahu wa-akhadhahu minhu ..."
Secundo folio: wa-fī adāʼ al-ʻibādāt min al-ṣalāh wa-al-ṣawm wa-al-zakāh wa-al-ḥajj.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 8 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good and clear naskh script, in black ink with some red overlines, on white paper; some notes, corrections and commentaries on the margins; some wormholes and stains; catchwords.
On folio 76a: "Ṣūrat al-qiṣṣah al-marfūʻh", a copy of the author's dedication of his book to a certain Minister of Egypt "Ḥaḍrat Wazīr Miṣr al-Muʻaẓẓam wa-walī amrinā al-mufakhkham".
On folio 76b: A reader's statement: "Ṭālaʻahu [...] al-Sharīf Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Azharī al-Shadīdī [?], ghafar Allāh la-hu. Thamāniyah al-Ḥijjah, 1144 [2 June 1732]."
On folio 77a: A reader's statement: "Ṭālaʻahu al-Sharīf Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Azharī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻufya ʻanhu. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Author's colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā yassara bi-hi al-Mawlá al-Qadīr min 'Hadīyat al-faqīr li-Ḥaḍrat al-Wazīr', taʼlīf kātibihi, aḥwaj al-khalq ajmaʻīn, ilá ʻayn ʻināyat al-Ḥaqq al-Mubīn, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Khayr al-Marḥūmī al-Azharī al-Shāfiʻī, jaʻalahā Allāh maqbūlah wa-bi-ʻayn al-qurb mashmūlah, wa-bi-ḥabl al-thawāb mawṣūlah. Wa-asʼalu Allāh al-ʻAẓīm an yajʻalahā nāfiʻah li-man iṭṭalaʻa ʻalayhā, wa-murshidah li-man adhʻana la-hā wa-inqāda ilayhā, lā arjū siwāh wa-lā adʻū illā īyāh. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Karīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Taḥrīran fī yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārak, rābiʻ Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat thamānīn baʻda al-alf min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf. M."

Translation of the colophon: "This is the end of what the Lord Almighty facilitated of 'Hadīyat al-faqīr li-Ḥaḍrat al-Wazīr' [Present of the poor one to His Excellency the Vizier], authored by the neediest of all creatures to the care of the eye of the Obvious Truth [i.e. God], Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Khayr al-Marḥūmī al-Azharī al-Shāfiʻi. May God render it accepted, with the eye of closeness included, and with the rope of reward connected. I implore God Almighty to make it useful for those who read it, and a guide to those who obey it and follow it. I have no hope except in Him and invoke no one besides Him. There is no power nor might except in God the All Powerful the Almighty. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the Noble Prophet, and on his family and all his companions. Peace be unto the messengers. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. Written on blessed Friday, 4 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the Hijrah [2 August 1669] of Him to whom belongs glory and honor. M."

record.title: 880-01 Bahjat Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Badawī wa-dhikr maʼāthirihi wa-aḥwālih : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaʻa ʻalá man ikhtārahu khulaʻ al-wilāyah, wa-qarrabahu wa-adnāh li-nayl al-saʻādah wa-al-siyādah, wa-jaʻalahu sababan lil-futūḥ wa-al-nihāyah. Wa-aḥmaduhu an jaʻalanā min al-muqtafīn li-āthārihim wa-al-muhtadīn bi-hadyihim wa-al-muttabiʻīn lahum ..."
Secundo folio: qalīl ḥattá dakhala al-Ḥajjāj ibn Yūsuf al-Thaqafī.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; few corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Bahjat Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Badawī wa-dhikr maʼāthirihi wa-aḥwālih, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā min barakātihi bi-mannih."

On folios 19a-25b: A long poem (tāʼīyah) attributed to Aḥmad al-Badawī, starts with: Taʻāẓama qadrī fī al-bilādi wa-rifʻatī // ʻalá sāʼir al-aqṭābi ḥuqqat wilāyatī; and ends with: Wa-mā qultu hādhā al-qawla fakhran wa-innamā // innī al-adhallu ḥattá taʻrifūna ḥaqīqatī.
On folio 26a: A statement in Ottoman Turkish, dated 7 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, 1148 (20 March 1736).

Colophon: "Wāfaqa al-farāgh min naskhatihi nahār al-Aḥad, ʻāshir Dhī al-Qaʻdah, min shuhūr sanat 1059, ʻalá yad afqar al-khalq wa-aḥwajihim ilá Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥyī [al-Dīn] ibn Yūnus al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on Sunday, 10 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, 1059 [of the Hijrah = 14 November 1649], by the hand of the poorest of creatures and the neediest to God Almighty, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥyī [al-Dīn] ibn Yūnus al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims. Amen. O Lord of the Universe."

record.note: Title of al-Tajrīd fī kalimat al-tawḥid from the printed versions.
Title of Kāshif al-asrār fī Maṭāliʻ al-anẓār from from folio 31a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Tajrīd fī kalimat al-tawḥid: The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... wa-sulṭānihā ḥārisan yamnaʻu nafsaka wa-hawāka wa-shayṭānaka min al-dukhūl ilá tilka al-nuqṭah, wa-mujarrad qawlika 'Lā ilāha illā Allāh' lā yazinu mithqāla dharrah, wa-lā yaʻdilu janāḥ baʻūḍah, fa-unẓur mā huwa naṣībuka min hādhihi al-kalimah. Fa-in kāna naṣībuka rūḥahā wa-maʻnāhā ulāʼika kataba fī qulūbihim al-īmān wa-ayyadahum bi-rūḥ minhu ..."
Secundo folio of al-Tajrīd fī kalimat al-tawḥid: yuṣnaʻu bi-al-qishr maʻa fiqdān al-lubb.

Incipit of Kāshif al-asrār fī Maṭāliʻ al-anẓār: "Hādhā Kitāb Sharḥ Manẓūmat al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, aqḍá al-quḍāh, Sirāj ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Kāshif al-asrār fī Maṭāliʻ al-anẓār'. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, [Yā] Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, li-man wajaba wujūduhu wa-baqāʼuhu, wa-imtanaʻa ʻadmuhu wa-fanāʼuhu. Dalla ʻalá wujūdihi arḍuhu wa-samāʼuhu, wa-shahida bi-waḥdānīyatihi raḍfat [raṣf (?)] al-ʻālam wa-bināʼuhu, al-ʻĀlīm alladhī yuḥīṭu ʻilmuhu bi-mā lā yatanāhá ʻadduhu wa-iḥṣāʼuhu ..."
Secundo folio of Kāshif al-asrār fī Maṭāliʻ al-anẓār: bi-fatḥ al-alif wa-kasr al-lām wa-fatḥuhu lughatān.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 11 x 15.5 cm; 15-19 lines per page.
Binding: The manuscript is unbound, but contained within a brown marbled paper wrapper.
In good and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; few notes and corrections on the margins; some headings in green and red; catchwords.
A label with notes in English about the second manuscript "Kāshif al-asrār fī Maṭāliʻ al-nawār" is pasted to the back of the front cover.
On folio 31a: "... wa-sammaytuhu Kāshif al-asrār fī Maṭāliʻ al-anẓār ..."
On folio 55a: Fāʼidah (anecdote) about the ten animals that enter al-Jannah (Paradise).
On folio 55b: A sample letter addressed to a certain al-ʻAmm al-Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Karīm.
On folio 55b: An ownership statement: "Mulk al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Ghanī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj Muṣṭafá al-Bishtāwī, fataḥa Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhi wa-ʻafá ʻanhu. Āmīn. M."

Colophon of al-Tajrīd fī kalimat al-tawḥīd (folio 30b): "Tamma al-kitāb 'al-Tajrīd fī ʻilm kalimat al-tawḥīd' bi-ḥamd al-Ḥamīd al-Majīd. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi nahār al-Ithnayn min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat khamsah wa-tisʻīn wa-alf baʻda al-Hijrah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-salām. Katabahu al-faqīr Sulaymān ibn Zaʻbān al-Tadmurī al-Anṣārī li-nafsihi. Ghafara Allāh li-man qaraʼa fīhi wa-istafād, wa-qaraʼa li-kātibihi al-Fātiḥah wa-daʻá la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon of al-Tajrīd fī kalimat al-tawḥīd: "The book 'al-Tajrīd fī ʻilm kalimat al-tawḥīd' was completed by the praise of the Praiseworthy and Glorious One. God is more knowledgeable of what is correct, to Him is the reference and returning. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. The copy was completed on Monday, in the month of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, the year 1095 after the Hijrah (of the Prophet) [20 March 1684], may the best prayer and most perfect peace be upon him. Copied by the poor Sulaymān ibn Zaʻbān al-Tadmurī al-Anṣārī for himself. May God forgive whoever reads it [the book] and benefits from it. Let him read 'al-Fātiḥah' and invoke God's forgiveness for its author. Amen. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

Colophon of Kāshif al-asrār fī Maṭāliʻ al-anẓār (folio 55a; in a later hand): "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama wa-sharrafa wa-karram."

Translation of the colophon of Kāshif al-asrār fī Maṭāliʻ al-anẓār: "The book is completed by the praise of God and His help. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the Illiterate Prophet, his family and his companions, grant peace, honor and exalt them."

record.title: 880-02 al-Mafākhir al-ʻalīyah fī al-maʼāthir al-Shādhilīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAyyād al-Shāfiʻī.
record.note: Title of al-Mafākhir al-ʻalīyah fī al-maʼāthir al-Shādhilīyah from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 1b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī man iʻtaṣama bi-hi najjāh, wa-man aṭāʻahu bi-faḍlihi kāfāh, wa-man saʼalahu min birrihi aʻṭāh, wa-man daʻāhu samiʻa nidāhu wa-labbāh, wa-man ʻalat himmatuhu ilayhi jaʻalahu ʻalī al-qadr bayna awliyāʼihi wa-ijtabāh, wa-man shadda la-hu bi-al-ʻibādah wa-al-maḥabbah qarrabahu ilayhi wa-adnāh wa-afradahu wa-tawallāh ..."
Secundo folio: al-ghawth al-fard al-jāmiʻ Abī al-Ḥasan.
17 x 22 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In paper wrapper, in 16 numbered quires.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Mafākhir al-ʻalīyah fī maʼāthir al-Sādah al-Shādhilīyah, taʼlīf al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Jawwād Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAyyād bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Āmīn."
On the upper left corner of folio 1a: "ʻAdad karārīsih 16."
On folio 1a: "Qaṣīdat afṣaḥ al-bulaghāʼ Sharaf al-Dīn al-Abūṣīrī, ʻāraḍ fīhā qaṣīdat Sayyidinā Kaʻb ibn Zuhayr rawīyan wa-qāfiyah, awwaluhā: Ilá matá anta bi-al-ladhdhāti mashghūlu, ilakh."

On folio 2a: "... fa-ajabtuhu mustaʻīnan billāh taʻālá, wa-akhdhtu altaqiṭu dhālik min kutub al-Sādah al-Shādhilīyah ka-kitāb Durrat al-asrār lil-Ustādh Ibn al-Ṣabbāgh wa-kitāb Laṭāʼif al-minan lil-Ustādh Tāj al-Dīn Ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī wa-ghayrihimā. Wa-raʼaytu Kitāb Durrat al-asrār qad jamaʻa ghālib al-maqṣūd, wa-minhu akhadhtu akthar mā fī hādhā al-kitāb, illā annī zidtu min ghayrihi mā yūfī bi-suʼāl al-sāʼil mimmā laysa mawjūdan fī Durrat al-asrār, fa-akhadhtu dhālika min al-kutub al-muʻtamadah ..."
On folio 2b: "... wa-sammaytuhu al-Mafākhir al-ʻalīyah fī al-maʼāthir al-Shādhilīyah."

The "Lāmiyah" of al-Būṣīrī starts (folio 155b) with: "Wa-min kalām al-Imām Sharaf al-Dīn Abū Ṣīrī, raḥimahu Allāh: Ilá matá anta bi-al-ladhdhāti mashghūlu // wa-anta ʻan kulli mā qaddamta masʼūlu ..." It ends with (folio 159a): "... Lam antaḥilhā wa-lam aghṣib maʻāniyahā // wa-ghayru madḥika maghṣūbun wa-manḥūlu."
Colophon (folio 155a): "Tamma yawm al-Khamīs, thāmin Rajab al-fard al-ḥarām, sanat 1209, tisʻah wa-miʼatayn wa-alf, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ʻAlī al-Sharnaqāsī [?]. Ghufira la-hu. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on Thursday, 8 Rajab al-fard al-ḥarām, the year 1209 [of the Hijrah = 29 January 1795], by the hand of the poor ʻAlī al-Sharnaqāsī [?]. May he be forgiven. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 al-Nafaḥāt al-aqdasīyah fī sharḥ al-ṣalawāt al-Aḥmadīyah al-Idrīsīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-Bīṭār al-Shāmī al-Maydānī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Author's name from reference sources and the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 1b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma, yā man ṣallá ʻalá Muḥammad bi-fayḍ dhātih, wa-kān mujlá la-hu fī jamīʻ tajalliyātih, fa-huwa rūḥ Allāh al-manfūkh fī ṣūrat Ādam, wa-ṭāmmat al-ḥaqāʼiq al-kubrá li-sāʼir al-ʻālam, fa-lā yaṣil wāṣil illā ilayh, wa-lā yahtadī ḥāʼir illā bi-hi fīhi ʻalayhi, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, wa-lā mawjūd fī hādhā al-wujūd illā īyāh, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, insān ʻayn dhātih wa-sirr imdādatih ..."
Secundo folio: ghayr dhawī al-ilmām min jumlat al-khafīyāt.
18.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 13 x 19 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with dark red leather on spine.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On a label pasted to the back of the front cover are handwritten notes in English about the book and its author.
On folio 1b: "... fa-qad amaranī ... Sayyidī wa-Ustādhī ... al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Dandarāwī an ashraḥa al-Ṣalawāt al-Aḥmadīyah al-Idrīsīyah ..."
On folio 2a: "... wa-sammaytuhu al-Nafaḥāt al-aqdasīyah fī sharḥ al-ṣalawāt al-Aḥmadīyah al-Idrīsīyah ..."

Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tamām, wa-nasʼaluhu, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ḥusn al-khitām. Katabahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn Ḥasan ʻUyūn al-Nābulusī, khādim Ṭarīqah [al-Ṭarīqah] al-Rashīdīyah / 8 Ṣafar, sanat 324 [1324], wa-20 Māris, sanat 322 [?]."

Translation of the colophon: "Praise be to God on the completion. We ask Him, may He be praised and glorified, to grant us a favorable end. Copied by the poor Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn Ḥasan ʻUyūn al-Nabulusī, servant of the Rashīdīyah Order, on 8 Ṣafar, the year 324 [1324 of the Hijrah = 3 April 1906], and 20 March 322 [?]."

record.title: 880-01 Ḥadīth al-Miʻrāj : manuscript.
record.note: Title of Ḥadīth al-Miʻrāj from folio 1b.
Title of Qiṣṣat Maryam wa-ṣiyāḥat (siyāḥat) ʻĪsá from folio 1b.
Title of Qiṣṣat Yūsuf from folio 40a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Ḥadīth al-Miʻrāj: The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... aqbala ilayhi wa-sallama ʻalayhi, fa-ḥaddathtuhu fa-qultu yā ʻammī: Uktum hādhihi al-umūr. Fa-qāla ʻAbbās: Wa-ḥaqq man baʻthaka bi-al-ḥaqq nabī mā aktum hādhihi al-umūr wa-ʻilm Banī Quraysh, fa-inna lanā fī dhālika fakhr ʻaẓīm. Thumma wathaba al-ʻAbbās wa-ḥaddatha Banī Quraysh, fa-waṣala al-ḥadīth ilá Abū Jahl laʻanahu Allāh ..."
Secundo folio of Ḥadīth al-Miʻrāj: No secundo folio.

Incipit of Qiṣṣat Maryam wa-ṣiyāḥat (siyāḥat) ʻĪsá: "Wa-hādhā Qiṣṣat Maryam wa-ṣiyāḥat (changed to siyāḥat) ʻĪsá ʻalayhi al-salām. Qāla al-rāwī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi: Lammā balaghat Maryam min ʻumrihā shahrayn intabahat ummuhā dhāt laylah, fa-maddat yadahā ilá mahdihā, fa-lam tajidhā. Qālat: Yā ʻImrān, mā lī lā ará waladī wa-qurrat ʻaynī fī mahdihā. Qāla ʻImarān: Wa-man dhahaba fī waladinā, yā laytanī kuntu faqadtu rūḥī qabla an faquda waladī ..."
Secundo folio of Qiṣṣat Maryam wa-ṣiyāḥat (siyāḥat) ʻĪsá: fī nāḥiyah min al-bayt wa-hiya sājidah wa-rākiʻah.

Incipit of Qiṣṣat Yūsuf: "Wa-hādhā Qiṣṣat Yūsuf, ṣalawāt Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallām, Khulafāʼ al-Mufassirīn, Imām [al-Imām] al-ʼʻẓam [al-aʻẓam], raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi, fī qawlihi taʻālá: 'Alif Lām Rāʼ. Tilka āyāt al-Kitāb al-Mubīn'. Sammāhu Allāh Mubīnan, wa-sammāhu Qurʼānan, wa-Kitāban, wa-Muhayminan, wa-Ḥakīman, wa-Nūran, wa-Raḥmatan, wa-Hudan ..."
Secundo folio of Qiṣṣat Yūsuf: ʻibādah. Wa-idhā qāla Subḥāna al-Khallāq al-ʻAẓīm.
15 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 17 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding.
In good and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the text is fully vocalized; headings in red; no notes or corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On a label pasted to the back of the front cover: Handwritten notes in English about the contents of the codex.
At the head of folio 40a: "Qiṣṣat Yūsuf."

On folio 12b: A text from the second manuscript beautifully calligraphed and covering the whole page: "... wa-Qāla: Ashhadu annaka nabī karīm, wa-lā yaʻrifu hādhihi al-aḥruf illā nabī mursal. Fa-lammā kāna waqt al-ʻaṣr atat Maryam ..."
Colophon of Ḥadīth al-Miʻrāj: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min 'Ḥadīth al-Miʻrāj' bil-tamām [bi-al-tamām] wa-al-kamāl, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ʻĪsá."
Translation of the colophon of Ḥadīth al-Miʻrāj: "This is what reached us of 'Ḥadīth al-Miʻrāj' (Account of the Miʻrāj), completely and perfectly, by the hand of the poor ʻĪsá."

Colophon of Qiṣṣat Maryam wa-ṣiyāḥat (siyāḥat) ʻĪsá: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min Qiṣṣat Maryam wa-mawlūd [wa-mawlid] Sayyidinā ʻĪsá ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamām [wa-al-kamāl], wa-naʻūdh billāh min al-ziyād wa-al-nuqṣān."

Translation of the colophon of Qiṣṣat Maryam wa-ṣiyāḥat (siyāḥat) ʻĪsá: "This is what reached us of the Story of Maryam (Mary) and the birth of our Master ʻĪsá (Jesus), completely and perfectly. In God we seek refuge from increase and decrease."

Colophon of Qiṣṣat Yūsuf: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Qāla Khalaf al-Mufassirīn: Thumma inna Mālik kibir wa-shākh wa-ḍiʻif fī ṭalab Yūsuf, wa-qāl: Lāʼufāriq [Lā ufāriq] ṭalab ʻalá kull ḥāl ḥattá ablugha al-ṭalab. Qāla al-rāwī: Fa-lammā kān baʻd al-khamsīn sanat qāla al-malik li-ghilmānih: Ayyah man yubashshirnī bi-hādhā al-ghulām alladhī jiʼtu fī ṭalabih uʻṭīhi niṣf mā amlukuhu. Qāla al-rāwī: Kāna fī dhālik al-zamān ṣāfar [sāfara] al-malik ilá al-Shām, fa-lammā wiṣil al-malik ilá arḍ Kanʻān raʼa [raʼá] ṭuyūran yaṭīr ḥawla al-bīr yaṭūfūna bi-hi kamā yaṭūfu al-ḥujjāj Bayt Allāh al-Ḥarām, fa-kānat hādhihi al-ṭuyūr malāʼikah arsalahu Allāh taʻālá ikrāman li-Yūsuf, fa-ẓanna al-malik annahum ṭuyūr wa-lam yaʻlam annahum ..."

record.title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Nabī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī baʻatha fīnā Rasūlahu al-aʻẓam, wa-Nabīyahu al-akmal al-afkham, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama wa-sharrafa wa-karrama wa-ʻaẓẓam. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna aṣdaq al-ḥadīth Kitā [Kitāb] Allāh, wa-khayr al-hady hudá Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-qad qāla taʻālá fī Kitābihi al-mubīn, wa-Huwa aṣdaq al-qāʼilīn: Laqad jāʼakum rasūlun min anfisikum, ʻazīzun ʻalayhi mā ʻanittum, ḥarīṣun ʻalaykum, bi-al-muʼminīna raʼūfun raḥīm. Fa-in tawallaw fa-qul ḥasbiya Allāhu, lā ilāh illā Huwa, ʻalayhi tawakkaltu, wa-Huwa Rabbu al-ʻArsh al-ʻAẓīm ..."
Secundo folio: al-mustaqīmah, wa-al-faḍāʼil allatī lā tuḥṣá.
16 x 20 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the flyleaf (in Arabic script): "Margharīt Dūlitil - Ṭarābulus al-Shām. 1921."
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Mawlid al-Nabī, ilá al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Ibn Ḥajar, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. M. M. M. M."
On folio 1a: "Fī nabwat [nawbat] ʻUmar al-Barbīr, wa-huwa kātibuhu. Sanat 1263."

Colophon: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi <wa-sallam>. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-Mawlid al-Sharīf nahār al-Arbiʻāʼ, min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, fī 16, sanat 1263 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm. Wa-huwa bi-qalam afqar al-ʻibād ilá Rabbihi al-Qadīr al-Sayyid ʻUmar ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad al-Barbīr."

Translation of the colophon: "Praise be to God, Lord of the Universe. Prayer and peace be upon our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and his companions. Henceforth, this Noble Mawlid was completed on Wednesday, 16 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1263 [4 March, 1847] of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may prayer and most perfect peace be upon Him. Copied by the pen of the poorest of worshipers to his Almighty Lord, al-Sayyid ʻUmar ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad al-Barbīr."

record.title: 880-02 al-Shudhūr al-dhahabīyah wa-al-qiṭaʻ al-Aḥmadīyah fī al-lughah al-Turkīyah : manuscript / Ibn Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ.
record.note: Name of the author: "Ibn Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ" from folio 2a.
Title from (folio 3a): "... wa-tarjamtuhā bi-al-Shudhūr al-dhahabīyah wa-al-qiṭaʻ al-Aḥmadīyah fī al-lughah al-Turkīyah ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa al-insān wa-zayyanahu bi-al-nuṭq wa-al-lisān, wa-karramahu ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt, wa-faḍḍala man shāʼa min ʻibādihi bi-al-faṣāḥah wa-al-ihtidāʼ ilá tamyyuz al-lughāt. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan tuḥaqqiqu li-qāʼilihā al-tamassuk bi-al-awāmir, wa-al-ijtināb ʻan al-manhīyāt. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā wa-Nabīyanā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth ilá sāʼir al-umam, Sayyid al-ʻUrb wa-al-ʻAjam, afṣaḥ man naṭaqa bi-al-Ḍād ..."
Secundo folio: bi-ḥurūf al-suyūf min kalimāt al-bāṭil.
14 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather; cover tooled with broad golden frame.
The translation of this work into modern Turkish "Eş-şüzûr-üz-zehebiyye vel-kıtaiʼl-Ahmediyye fil-lûgat-it-Türkiyye", was published in Istanbul, in 1949.
The name of the author and the title of the work is mentioned in Brockelmann (S II:632:13).
On folios 48b and 50a: Texts in Ottoman Turkish in a different hand.
Folio 49 is blank.
In beautiful and large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the Ottoman Turkish terms are written beneath the Arabic terms in red; catchword.
Colophon (folio 48a): "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Tammat wa-bi-al-khayr kamulat."
Translation of the colophon: "Praise be to God alone. It is completed and well concluded."

record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Beginning missing; starts with: "... lammā nazalat, qāla, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: idhan lā arḍá, wa-wāḥidun min ummatī fī al-nār. Wa-qad jamaʻa, quddisa sirruhu, fī al-ibtidāʼ bayna al-Basmalah wa-al-Ḥamdalah ʻamalan bi-al-wārid fī dhālika. Fa-fī riwāyah ʻanhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Kull amr lā yubdaʼu fīhi bi-al-ḥamd fa-huwa ajzam, wa-fī ukhrá fa-huwa aqṭaʻ, wa-fī ukhrá fa-huwa abtar, ay nāqiṣ sharʻan ..."
Secundo folio: ayy bi-tafriqah ʻasīrah.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15 cm; 22 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; few corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 18b (under the colophon, in red): "Wa-in tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // tabqá ʻinda al-nāsi fī ʻayni al-malā. Lā tuʻāyir man bi-hi ʻayban [ʻaybun] wa-qul // Jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon: "Intahá. Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu, aʻlam, wa-ilayhi al-muntahá, wa-la-hu al-ḥamd, idh min faḍlihi ḥusn al-khitām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá muẓhir al-ḥaqīqah bi-al-fatḥ wa-al-khitām, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá man ʻalá [ʻalā] minhā ḥubbuhu. Wa-al-salām. Āmīn. M."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed. God, May He be praised, is more knowledgeable, to Him is the conclusion, and to Him is the praise, because the good conclusion comes from Him. May prayer be on the revealer of truth, from beginning to end, our Master Muḥammad, whose love for it [truth] is the highest. Peace. Amen. M."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-qulūb wa-man yadullu ʻalá al-maḥbūb : manuscript / Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn ibn Ṣāliḥ al-Muzanī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lam tazal qudratuhu ʻalaynā [lam yazal fī qudratihi ʻalīyan}, wa-fī fardānīyatihi sarmadīyan, wa-fī sulṭānihi jabbāran qawīyan. In ʻāmaltahu wajadtahu malīyan, wa-in rajawta raḥmatahu raḥimaka bi-hā mayyitan wa-ḥayyan. Sabaqat irādatuhu fī khalqihi ʻabdan wa-shaqīyan, fa-al-jannah li-man aṭāʻahu wa-law kāna ʻabdan shaqīyan, wa-al-nār li-man ʻaṣāhu wa-law kāna sharīfan Qurashīyan ..."
Secundo folio: [ṣallá] Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 13 x 20 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Cover missing; spine in dark brown leather.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; notes and corrections on the margins; some inserts; no catchwords.
On folio 1a (in pencil): "Nuzhat al-qulūb wa-man yadullu ʻalá al-maḥbūb li-Ibn al-ʻArabī. Qaraʼahu ʻAlī Jaʻfar [... ... ...]. Sanat 310 [1310 (?) of the Hijrah = 1892/1893]."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Qāla arsalat ilá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wasallm, bintuhu, inna ibnī qad iḥtuḍira, fa-ashhidnā. Fa-arsala yuqrī al-salām, yaqūlu: Inna lillāh mā akhadha, wa-la-hu mā aʻṭá, wa-kull shayʼ ʻindahu bi-ajal musammá, fa-li-yataṣabbar wa-li-yaḥtasib. Fa-arsalat ilayhi tuqsimu ʻalayhi li-yaʼtiyannahā. Fa-qāma wa-maʻahu Saʻd ibn ʻUbādah, wa-Muʻādh ibn Jabal, wa-Ubayy ibn Kaʻb, wa-Zayd ibn Thābit, wa-rijāl, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum. Fa-rufiʻa ilá Rasūl Allāh al-ṣabī, fa-aqʻadahu fī ḥujrihi, wa-nafsuhu tuqaʻqiʻu, fa-fāḍat ʻaynāhu. Fa-qāla Saʻd: Yā Rasūl Allāh, Mā hādhā. Qāl: Hādhihi raḥmatun jaʻalahā Allāh ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ghunyah ʻan al-Munyah fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān : manuscript / Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
record.note: Title of the first copy of al-Ghunyah ʻan al-Munyah fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān from folio 1a.
Title of the second copy of al-Ghunyah ʻan al-Munyah fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān from folio 39a.
Title of Shurūṭ al-ṣalāh from folio 69a.
Title of Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh from reference sources.
