Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ʻAlī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qad aḥāṭa bi-kull shayʼ ʻilaman, wa-aʻtaqa man shāʼa min al-nār bi-faḍlihi wa-jūdihi karaman wa-ḥilman, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām al-akmalān al-dāʼimān ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, jadhr al-ʻawālim kullihā, wa-uss jamīʻ al-kāʼināt wa-rūḥihā wa-ḥayātihā wa-aṣlihā ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān ... an ashraḥa la-hu 'Masʼalat al-ʻitq al-manhajīyah al-mukhrajah bi-al-ṭarīqah al-jabrīyah', fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik ..."
Secundo folio of manuscript 1 "Sharḥ masʼalat al-ʻitq al-manhajīyah al-mukhrajah bi-al-ṭarīqah al-jabrīyah": wa-in tamakhkhaḍat ghayra ʻitq.

Incipit of manuscript 2 "Taqyīd ʻalá kalām Shaykh al-Islām wa-ʻalam al-aʻlām fī sharḥ manhajihi ʻalá taqdīr al-khamsah al-awsuq bi-al-niṣāb": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Aḥmad al-Mullawī al-Mujīrī al-Shāfiʻī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh musahhil al-ḥisāb wa-mudhallil al-ṣiʻāb, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī rafaʻa lanā ʻan al-mushkilāt al-ḥijāb, wa-ayqaẓanā ilá sulūk ṭuruq al-ṣawāb. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā 'Taqyīd ʻalá kalām Shaykh al-Islām wa-ʻalam al-aʻlām fī sharḥ manhajihi ʻalá taqdīr al-khamsah al-awsuq bi-al-niṣāb', jaʻaltuhu tadhkirah lī wa-li-man yuṭāliʻuhu min al-ṭullāb, li-kawnihi qad yataʻassaru fahmuhu, li-mā fīhi min kathrat al-aʻmāl allatī lā yafhamuhā al-mubtadī ..."
Secundo folio of manuscript 2 "Taqyīd ʻalá kalām Shaykh al-Islām wa-ʻalam al-aʻlām fī sharḥ manhajihi ʻalá taqdīr al-khamsah al-awsuq bi-al-niṣāb": Ijmaʻ al-ḥawāṣil tablugh miʼatay alf dirham.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some commentaries, corrections, and mathematical calculations on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Sharḥ masʼalat al-ʻitq al-manhajīyah al-mukhrajah bi-al-ṭarīqah al-jabrīyah lil-Shihāb al-Mullawī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, al-mutawaffá sanat 1181, fī Rabīʻ al-Awwal."

Colophon of manuscript 1 "Sharḥ masʼalat al-ʻitq al-manhajīyah al-mukhrajah bi-al-ṭarīqah al-jabrīyah": "Tammat al-risālah allatī li-Shaykhinā al-humām al-ustādh al-qawī, al-Shihāb al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Mullawī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi." At the left of the colophon: "Tuwuffiyá Ustādhunā al-Mullawī fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, li-ithnatay ʻashar laylah khalat minhu, sanat 1181, wa-dufina bi-Jāmiʻ al-Imām al-Ḥusayn, raḍiya [crossed over], sibṭ Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of manuscript 1: "Sharḥ masʼalat al-ʻitq al-manhajīyah al-mukhrajah bi-al-ṭarīqah al-jabrīyah": "The epistle of our gallant Shaykh and robust scholar, al-Shihāb al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Mullawī, may God Almighty have mercy upon him and benefit us by him, is completed." At the left of the colophon: "Our scholar al-Mullawī died in the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, twelve nights having passed from it, in the year 1181 [of the Hijrah = 8 August 1767], and was buried at Jāmiʻ al-Imām al-Ḥusayn, may [God] be 'pleased' [with him], the grandson of the Messenger of God, may God pray on him and grant him peace. Amen."

Colophon of manuscript 2: "Taqyīd ʻalá kalām Shaykh al-Islām wa-ʻalam al-aʻlām fī sharḥ manhajihi ʻalá taqdīr al-khamsah al-awsuq bi-al-niṣāb": "Wa-Allāh aʻlam, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of manuscript 2 "Taqyīd ʻalá kalām Shaykh al-Islām wa-ʻalam al-aʻlām fī sharḥ manhajihi ʻalá taqdīr al-khamsah al-awsuq bi-al-niṣāb": "But God is more knowledgeable. May God pray on our Master and Leader Muḥammad, and on his family and companions and grant them peace. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Zubdat al-Mukhtaṣarayn fī Mawlid Afḍal al-Thaqalayn : manuscript / Maḥmūd al-Ḥanafī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b): "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Zubdat al-Mukhtaṣarayn fī Mawlid Afḍal al-Thaqalayn ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, qayyūm al-samāwāt wa-al-araḍīn, mudabbir al-khalāʼiq ajmaʻīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla ʻabdun min [ʻabīd] Allāh taʻālá al-muwaḥḥidīn min Ahl al-Sunnah : Lammā kānat qirāʼt al-Mawlid al-Sharīf fī awāʼil shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal min aʻẓam al-qurbāt ilá Allāh taʻālá, aradtu qirāʼatahā li-baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-mubtadiʼīn mithlī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-lāḥiqīn, ṣāḥib al-liwāʼ al-maʻqūd.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 5.7 x 16.3 cm; 49 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).

In small and closely written naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the original "Mawlid" of al-Madābighī and of al-Ghayṭī in red, markings in red; many commentaries and some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Zubdat al-Mukhtaṣarayn fī Mawlid Afḍal al-Thaqalayn, lil-muftaqir ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-wadūd, ʻabduhu Maḥmūd al-Ḥanafī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-khayr. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: Two defaced ownership statements, and a legible transfer of ownership statement, as follows: "Thumma nuqila fī mulk Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Najjārī."

On folio 1a: A "samāʻ" (audition) and a "sanad" (chain of transmission), by an unnamed owner, as follows: "Talaqqaytu hādhā 'al-Mawlid' ʻan Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-ʻAlīm al-Fayyūmī, ʻan Shaykhihi al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Ṣaʻīdī, ʻan al-muʼallif. Wa-al-muʼallif talaqqá al-aṣl ʻan al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Bābillī, wa-huwa ʻan Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Ujhūrī, wa-huwa ʻan Sayyidī Sālim al-Sanhūrī, wa-huwa ʻan al-Najm al-Ghayṭī. Wa-akhadhtuhu ayḍan ʻan Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Zawādī [or, al-Zawāwī?], ʻan al-Shaykh al-Ṣaʻīdī."

Author's colophon: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ṣāḥib al-maqām al-maḥmūd, bāṭinan wa-ẓāhiran. Hādhā ākhir mā tayassara lī fī jamʻ mā ʻalayhi al-mukhtaṣarayn, ay, Mukhtaṣar al-Ghayṭī wa-Mukhtaṣar al-Madābighī (al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Madābighī al-Shāfiʻī, ṣaḥḥ), raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá, fī Mawlid Afḍal al-Thaqalayn, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-kānā jamʻuhumā fī thānī shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1170."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Praise be to God in the beginning and at the end. May prayer and peace be upon Him of the praiseworthy status [Prophet Muḥammad], implicitly and explicitly. This is the end of the culling/compilation, facilitated for me, of the two Abridgments, i.e., the Abridgment of al-Ghayṭī, and the Abridgment of al-Madābīghī (al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Madābighī al-Shāfiʻī, correct) -- may God Almighty have mercy upon both of them -- about the 'Mawlid' (birth) of the 'Best of the Thaqalayn' [i.e., humans and jinn], may God pray on him and grant peace to him, to his family, and to all his companions. The culling/compilation from the two [Abridgements, i.e., of al-Ghayṭī and al-Madābighī] was completed on the second day of the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1170 [of the Hijrah = 25 December 1756]."
Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah fī 15 shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1174, ʻalá yad jāmiʻihi. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. M."

Translation of the copyist colophon: "This copy was completed on the 15th of the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1174 [of the Hijrah = 24 November 1760], by the hand of its compiler. But God is more knowledgeable."

record.title: 880-02 Alghāz : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām.
record.note: Title of manuscript 1 "Algāz" from reference sources.
Title of manuscript 2 "Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān" from folio 7b: "... wa-sammaytuhu 'Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of manuscript 1 "Alghāz": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi Yassir. Yā Karīm, wa-lā tuʻassir Yā Ḥalīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh musbigh al-ʻaṭāʼ, musbil al-ghiṭāʼ, muḍfī al-niʻam wa-al-ālāʼ, al-maḥmūd ʻalá al-sarrāʼ wa-al-ḍarrāʼ, al-mashkūr fī al-shiddah wa-al-rakhāʼ, aḥmaduhu, wa-lā maḥmūd ʻalá al-ḥaqīqah siwāh, wa-ashkuruhu shukran lā yaʼbāh wa-lā yansāh, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Nabīyih alladhī min khayr al-ʻanāṣir iṣṭafāh ..."
Secundo folio of manuscript 1 "Alghāz": nabbaha bi-qawlihi inna min āmani al-nās ʻalayya.

Incipit of manuscript 2 "Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-ʻalayhi muttakalī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-awḥad, ḥujjat al-ʻArab wa-tarjumān al-adab, Jamāl al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī al-Naḥwī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh, al-fātiḥ ʻinda al-iʻwāz, al-māniḥ bi-al-ījāz, jāʻil ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah fī al-ʻulūm ka[...], fa-bi-hi tuftaḥ muqfalāt al-alghāz, wa-yattaḍiḥu mā fī al-Tanzīl min al-ījāz ..."
Secundo folio of manuscript 2 "Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān": bi-mā yakūnu al-ḥukm fīhi ẓāhiran.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of poetry in red; markings in red; some commentaries on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "al-Lafẓ al-mustaṭāb fī īḍāḥ mā ulghiza min al-iʻrāb, taʼlīf baʻḍ al-ʻulamāʼ, raḍiya [Allāh] taʻālá ʻanhu wa-arḍāh. Wa-yalīhi ayḍan kitāb Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān, taʼlīf Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, ḥujjat al-ʻArab wa-tarjumān al-adab, Jamāl al-Dīn Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Hishām al-Anṣārī al-Naḥwī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanhu."

On folio 1a: Seven verses of poetry, by an unnamed poet, eulogizing Ibn Hishām: "Qāla baʻḍuhum yarthī al-Shaykh Jamāl al-Dīn ibn Hishām: Ayyu ʻilmi bi-mawti jismika mātā // wa-ghadā baʻda jamʻihi ashtātā. Kāna wirdan lanā falammā tuwuffī // fātanā al-riyyu mithlahu ḥīna fātā ... Raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá raḥmatan wāsiʻah, wa-amṭara ʻalayhimā shaʼābīb raḥmatihi al-hāṭilah al-hāmiʻah, wa-nafaʻanā bi-himā fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah."

On folio 1a: Statements by two readers (a great grandfather and his great grandson), as follows: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Naẓara fīhi al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Rabbihi al-Qādir, Sulaymān ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir, ḥāmidan muṣallīyan." "Fī sanat 1085 [of the Hijrah = 1674/1675]. Ḥasbiya Allāh. Thumma naẓara fīhi ayḍan al-ḥaqīr ʻAbd al-Ra[ḥmān] ibn ibn ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-madhkūr, ghafara Allāh lahum ajmaʻīn."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement, dated 21 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, 1050 of the Hijrah (18th March 1675): "Mulk al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-Ghanī [... ... ...] al-Ḥanafī, fī 21 al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1050."
On folio 1a: A reader and owner statement: "Naẓara fī hādhā al-kitāb al-faqīr ʻAbd Allāh Afandī al-Mudarris, wa-intaqala fī mulkīyatihi bi-al-Rūm [... ... ...]."
On folio 1a: A defaced and partially legible ownership statement: "Mimmā anʻama Allāh taʻālá bi-hi ʻalá ʻabdihi al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn [... ... ...]."
On folio 1a: An address to "Kubaykij" (the legendary paper protector): "Yā Kubaykij. Yā Kubaykij. Yā Kubaykij."

Colophon of manuscript 1 "Alghāz" (folio 7a): "Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, thālith shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, sanat thamāniyah wa-thalāthīn wa-alf, wa-dhālika ʻalá yad aḍʻaf ʻibād Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Waddānī, ʻufiya ʻanhu."

Translation of the colophon of manuscript 1 "Alghāz": "But God Almighty and All Powerful is more knowledgeable. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, and on his family and companions and grant them abundant peace. The copy was completed on blessed Monday, the third day of the sacred month of Dhū al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1038 of the Hijrah [24 July, 1629], by the hand of the feeblest of the servants of God Almighty, Muḥammad Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Waddānī, may he be pardoned."

Author's colophon of manuscript 2 "Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān": "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā awradnāhu fī hādhihi al-awrāq, wa-al-ʻudhr fī ikhtiṣārihi qad sabaq, wa-al-wafāʼ bi-mā sharaṭnāhu min al-ikhtiṣār aḥaqq. Wa-lillāh al-ḥamd. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

Translation of the author's colophon of manuscript 2 "Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān": "This is the end of what we introduced in these leaflets. The excuse for its abbreviation has already been stated but fulfilling what we have stipulated of shortening it is more deserving. Praise be to God. God is more knowledgeable."

Copyist's colophon of manuscript 2 "Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān": "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Arbaʻ al-mubārak, rābiʻ shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, sanat thamāniyah wa-thalāthīn wa-alf, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻālamīn, Muḥammad Nāṣir al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Waddānī al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-ʻIrsī nasaban. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran."

Translation of the copyist's colophon of manuscript 2 "Mūqid al-adhhān wa-mūqiẓ al-wasnān": "The copy was completed on blessed Wednesday, the fourth day of the month of Dhū al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1038 [of the Hijrah = 25 July, 1629], by the hand of the poorest of mankind, Muḥammad Nāṣir al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥaqq ibn Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Waddānī al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-ʻIrsī nasaban. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and on his family and companions and grant them abundant peace."

record.title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... mabāḥithihi wa-ashraf maqāṣidihi. Wa-qad kānat al-awāʼil min al-ṣaḥābah wa-al-tābiʻīn, ruḍwān Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, li-ṣafāʼ ʻaqāʼidihim wa-barakat ṣuḥbat al-Nabī ʻalayhi [ʻalayhim], wa-qurb al-ʻahd bi-zamānihi, wa-li-qillat al-ikhtilāfāt, wa-tamakkunihim min al-murājaʻah ilá al-thiqāt [al-thiqāh] mustaghnīn ʻan tadwīn al-ʻilmayn wa-tartībihimā abwāban wa-fuṣūlan, wa-taqdīr maqāṣidihimā, furūʻn wa-uṣūlan, ilá an ḥadathat al-fitan bayna al-Muslimīn wa-al-baghy ʻalá aʼimmat al-dīn ..."
Secundo folio: al-adillah ijmālan fī ifādatihā al-aḥkām.
14 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 11.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In fair and naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah" in red; headings and markings in red; extensive commentaries on the margins and interlinear; many inserts; catchwords.
On folio 90b: An ownership statement: "al-Ṣāḥib [Ṣāḥib] al-kitāb ʻUmar ibn Ḥājjī Jumʻah ibn Maḥmūd."

Colophon: No colophon; text ends with: "... wa-al-jawāb: Inna al-Naṣārá istaʻẓamū al-Masīḥ, bi-ḥaythu yataraffaʻu an yakūna ʻabdan min ʻibād Allāh, bal yanbaghī an yakūna ibnan la-hu, li-annahu mujarrad lā ab la-hu. Wa-qāla [Wa-qālū]: Yubriʼu al-akmah wa-al-abraṣ wa-yuḥyī al-mawtá bi-khilāf sāʼir ʻibād Allāh min banī Ādam. Fa-rudda ʻalayhim bi-annahu lā yastankifu min dhālika al-Masīḥ, wa-lā man huwa aʻlá minhu fī hādhā al-maʻná, wa-hum al-malāʼikah, alladhīna lā aba lahum wa-lā umm, wa-yaqdirūna bi-idhn Allāh taʻālá ʻalá afʻāl aqwá wa-aʻjab min ibrāʼ al-akmah wa-al-abraṣ wa-iḥyāʼ al-mawtá fī al-taraqqī wa-al-ʻulw, innamā huwa <huwa> fī amr al-tajarrud wa-iẓhār al-āthār al-qawīyah, lā muṭlaq al-sharaf wa-al-kamāl, fa-lā dalālah ʻalá afḍalīyat al-malāʼikah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Tammat."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar al-Ḥifẓ wa-al-nisyān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Fīrūzābādī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-khalq wa-anʻam, wa-ʻallama al-insān mā lam yaʻlam, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan tajlū mā aẓlam, wa-taḥullu [mā] inbaham. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā wa-Nabīyanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-Rasūluhu wa-ḥabībuhu alladhī iṣṭafāhu ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Mukhtaṣar al-Ḥifẓ wa-al-nisyān li-Ibn Ṭāhir, [ikhtaṣarahu] Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Fīrūzābādī, aṣlaḥ Allāh taʻālá shaʼnahu ..."
Secundo folio: ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Nisyān al-Qurʼān.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 9 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In good large naskh script, in black ink, on white thick paper; headings in red; few notes on the margins; catchwords. Inserted in the codex a slip (in pencil) in English, describing the book, its author and the author of the original from which it was abridged.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Mukhtaṣar al-Ḥifẓ wa-al-nisyān, li-Ibn Ṭāhir Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Būyah, intakhabahu Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Fīrūzābādī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa lillāh taʻālá hādhā al-kitāb Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Najjārī."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Fī nawbat al-faqīr ilá ʻafw al-Bārī ʻabduhu Muḥammad Aḥmad ʻAlī Zahrān, al-mashhūr bi-al-Najjārī, nisbatuhu ilá jaddihi Sayyidī Tāj al-Dīn ibn al-Sayyid [... ...] Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Badawī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Anṭākī ibn Sayyidī Aḥmad ʻam Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Badawī, ʻammatnā wa-jamīʻ al-aḥyāʼ barakātuhu wa-barakāt ajdādihi."

Colophon: "Intahá talkhīṣ kitāb Ibn Būyah, ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Ḥusayn ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAṭṭār ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Jīzī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn bi-mannihi wa-karamih wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Yā Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ḥurrira fī 18 shahr al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1173."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of the abridgment of the book of Ibn Būyah was completed by the hand of the poor to God Almighty, Ḥusayn ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAṭṭār ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Jīzī al-Shāfiʻī, may God forgive all of them and the Muslims by His benevolence and generosity. Amen. O Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, and on his family and companions and grant them abundant peace until Judgment Day. Copied on the 18th of the month of al-Ḥijjah, of the year 1173 [of the Hijrah = 1 August 1760]."

record.title: 880-01 Majmūʻ mubārak ʻalá al-ayyām al-sabʻah wa-mā fīhā min al-sāʻāt saʻdīyah wa-naḥsīyah : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad ikhtaṣarū hādhā al-majmūʻ al-mubārak, mustaqirr ʻalá al-ayyām al-sabʻah wa-jumlatuhā, wa-mā ṭubiʻa ʻalayhi al-yawm, wa-māh [wa-mā] la-hu min al-kawākib wa-al-burūj, wa-mā la-hu min al-awfāq, wa-mā la-hu min al-midād wa-al-bakhūrāt, wa-mā la-hu min al-nawāḥī, wa-mā la-hu min al-ayyām, wa-mā la-hu min al-azminah wa-al-fuṣūl, wa-mā la-hu min al-shuhūr al-ʻArabīyah wa-al-Qibṭīyah w-al-Suryānīyah wa-al-Yūnānīyah wa-al-Fārisīyah, wa-mā la-hu min al-manāzil, wa-mā la-hu min al-ḥurūf al-nūrānīyah, wa-mā la-hu min al-Asmāʼ al-Ḥusná wa-al-bakhūrāt wa-al-bilād, wa-mā la-hu min badan al-insān wa-al-aʻḍāʼ, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl ..."
Secundo folio: al-khayl kull jawād ashqar.
15.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 13 x 19 cm; 18-27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on thick white paper; some underlined phrases; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Majmūʻ mubārak ʻalá al-ayyām al-sabʻah wa-mā fīhā min al-sāʻāt saʻīdīyah wa-naḥsīyah, raḥima Allāh muʼallifahā, wa-nāqilahā, wa-li-man naẓara ilayhā wa-daʻá la-hu bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-ruḍwān. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Tammat wa-kamulat. Nuqilat min nuskhah qablahā. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhā yawm al-Arbaʻ, 10, ʻashar Ṣafar, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1226, ʻalá yad ṣāḥibihā wa-kātibihā al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muqirr bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Shāhīn ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad Qaṭqāṭ, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-lil-Muslimīn, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-khayr. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "But God is more knowledgeable. Completed and concluded. Transcribed from a previous copy. Copied on Wednesday, the 10th of the month of Ṣafar, of the year 1225 [of the Hijrah = 6 March 1811], by the hand of its owner and copyist, the poor, who admits his incapacity and in adequacy, Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Shāhīn ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad Qaṭqāṭ, may God forgive him, his parents, the Muslims, and those who invoke goodness for him. Amen. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kifāyah bi-sharḥ al-Ghāyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
record.note: Title from incipit folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī laysa li-kamālātihi nihāyah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī laysa li-sharafihi ghāyah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi alladhīna sabaqat lahum min Allāh taʻālá al-ʻināyah, wa-raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻan al-tābiʻīn, wa-tābiʻīhim alladhīna lahum fī istikhrāj al-aḥkām mazīd al-iʻtināʼ wa-al-riʻāyah. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī fī al-fiqh, yakūnu bi-hi li-ḥall alfāẓihi wa-maʻānīhi al-dirāyah. Wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Kifāyah bi-sharḥ al-Ghāyah'. Wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá al-iʻānah wa-al-tashīl, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: al-mujtahid al-muṭlaq al-Shāfiʻī.
13 x 22 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the text of "al-Ghāyah" in red; catchwords.
On folio 15b: A magic square "wafq" (numerical harmony) in 9 x 9 squares, titled "Jadwal al-sabʻat layāl" (Diagram of the seven nights).

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá aʻlam. Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Karīm al-Wahhāb, ʻalá yad al-muftaqir li-raḥmat al-ʻAlī, Ḥafīd al-Shaykh Aḥmad Khafājī al-Shiblanjī ʻAlī, satara Allāh ʻuyūbahumā. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥ[bihi] wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "God, the Almighty and the All Powerful, is more knowledgeable. The book was completed by the help of the Generous and Abundant Giving, by the hand of him who needs the mercy of the Supreme God, ʻAli, the grandson of al-Shaykh Aḥmad Khafājī al-Shiblanji, may God cover the blemishes of both of them. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, on his family and companions, and grant them peace."

record.title: 880-02 al-Nafaḥāt al-ʻanbarīyah fī niʻāl Khayr al-Barīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maqqarī.
record.note: Title from folio 3b: "... sammaytuhā ... bi-al-Nafaḥāt al-ʻanbarīyah fī niʻāl Khayr al-Barīyah ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Allāh taʻālá, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maqqarī al-Maghribī al-Mālikī, akhadha Allāh bi-yadihi fī al-dārayn. Āmīn: Naḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá an jaʻaltanā min ummat khayr man mashá bi-al-naʻlayn, wa-samá ʻalá ahl al-arḍ wa-al-samāʼ al-aʻlayn, wa-sharraftanā bi-ittibāʻ Sayyid al-Kawnayn wa-al-thaqalayn, tafaḍḍulan minka wa-imtinānan, wa-ʻarraftanā min aḥwālihi al-jamīlah wa-aqwālihi al-jalīlah maḥāsin al-Sharīʻah, fa-sarraḥnā al-nawāẓir fī riyāḍihā al-nawāḍir al-muʼniqah al-marīʻah ..."
Secundo folio: in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá fī al-Firdaws.
24.5 x 34 cm; written surface: 14 x 24.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two quires).
In good naskh/taʻlīq script, in black ink, on white paper; one correction on the margin of folio 7b; catchwords.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... fa-al-ūlá qawl al-Tirmidhī al-ḥakīm: al-Yamīn maḥbūb Allāh wa-mukhtāruhu min al-ashyāʼ, fa-ahl al-Jannah ʻan yamīn al-ʻArsh yawm al-qiyāmah, wa-ahl al-saʻādah yuʻṭawna kutubahum bi-aymānihim, wa-kātib al-ḥasanāt min nāḥiyat al-yamīn, wa-kaffat al-ḥasanāt min al-mīzān ʻan al-yamīn. Wa-idhā kāna al-ḥaqq fī al-taqdīm lil-yamīn ukhkhira fī al-nazʻ li-yabqá dhālika al-ḥaqq la-hu, fa-juʻila ākhir al-amrayn kay yabqá la-hu dhā al-ḥaqq akthar. Ih. Wa-qawluhu: Fa-li-takun al-yamīn awwalahumā, dhukkira bi-taʼwīl al-ʻuḍw, wa-huwa mutaʻalliq bi-tunʻal alladhī huwa khabar yakun, aw, mubtadaʼ khabaruhu tunʻalu, wa-al-jumlah khabar, qālahu ..."

record.title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Nabī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Munayyir al-Samannūdī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anār al-wujūd bi-mawlid khayr al-anām, wa-abraza shams wujūdihi fī Rabīʻ al-Awwal, saʻd al-suʻūd, fa-nukkisat lidhālik al-aṣnām, wa-khalaqa nūrahu qabla ījād al-khalq, fa-kāna dhālika al-nūr yadūru bi-al-qudrah ḥaythu shāʼa al-Malik al-ʻAllām ..."
Secundo folio: tunjī qāʼilahā min al-kurūb al-ʻiẓām.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 12 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one numbered quire).
In good large naskh script, in black ink, on thick white paper; markings in red; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Mawlid al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, lil-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-Shaykh al-Munayyirī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Tamm."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly, as follows: "... wa-kāna Hāshim jadd al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, lā yamurru bi-ḥajar wa-lā madar wa-lā shajar, illā wa-yukhāṭibuhu wa-yaqūlu la-hu: Abshir Yā Hāshim, fa-innahu sa-yaẓharu min ẓahrika nabīyun yakūnu khātim al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn. Qāl: fa-lammā ..."

record.title: 880-03 Qaṣīdat al-Burdah : manuscript / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Amin tadhakkuri jīrānin bi-Dhī Salami // mazajta damʻan jará min muqlatin bi-dami. Am habbati al-rīḥu min tilqāʼ Kāẓimatin // wa-awmaḍ al-barqu fī al-ẓalmāʼi min Iḍami ..."
Secundo folio: Lawlā al-hawá lam turiq damʻan ʻalá ṭalalin.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 17 cm; 10 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In calligraphic large naskh script, in black ink, on thick white paper; text fully vocalized; markings in purple; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Qaṣīdat al-Burdah fī madḥ al-Muṣṭafá, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, taʼlīf Sayyidī Muḥammad al-Dilāṣī al-Būṣīrī, qaddasa Allāh taʻālá sirrahu, wa-aʻadda la-hu fī farādīs al-jinān aʻlá al-asirrah, wa-naḥnu maʻahu. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: Two verses of poetry by an unnamed poet, praising the Prophet, as follows: "Qāla baʻḍuhum: Ará kulla madḥin fī al-Nabīyi muqaṣṣiran // wa-in bālagha al-muthnī ʻalayhi wa-aktharā. Idhā Allāhu athná bi-mā huwa ahluhu // ʻalayhi fa-mā miqdāru mā tamdaḥu al-wará."
On folio 1a: The copyist's statement: "Bi-yad al-faqīr Ibrāhīm Rājiḥ, yassara Allāh la-hu jamīʻ al-maṣāliḥ."
At the head of folio 1b: A drawing in purple of three tents with three palm trees.
On folio 17b: An ownership statement by Amīn Ibrāhīm Rājiḥ, the son of the copyist Ibrāhīm Rājiḥ: "Mulk Amīn Ibrāhīm Rājiḥ."
al-Burdah of al-Būṣīrī ends with: "... Mā rannaḥat ʻadhabāti al-bāni rīḥu ṣabā // wa-aṭraba al-ʻīsa ḥādī al-ʻīsi bi-al-naghami."
Colophon of al-Burdah of al-Būṣīrī: "Tammat wa-bi-al-misk ʻammat."
Translation of the colophon of al-Burdah of al-Būṣīrī: "It is completed and with musk it is saturated."

The panegyrical poem by the unknown poet starts (folio 18a) with: ʻAdhala al-ʻādhilūna fīka wa-lāmū // kull yawmin ʻalá al-muḥibbi ḥarāmu. It ends abruptly (folio 18b) with: Wa-taqaddamta lil-ṣalāti fa-ṣallá // kullu man fī al-samāʼi wa-anta al-imāmu. Ṣallá ...

record.title: 880-02 al-Taysīr : naẓm Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Yaḥyá ibn Mūsá al-ʻAmrīṭī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qad ḥarrarā // kitābahu munaqqaḥan muyassarā. Yushīru bil-mubīni ilá al-lubābi // fa-yafqahu al-maʻná ulū al-albābi ... Wa-min ajalli kutbihi alladhī ikhtaṣar // Taḥrīru Tanqīḥi al-Lubābi al-muʻtabar ... Naẓamtuhu mulakhkhiṣan li-lafẓihi // musahhilan li-fahmihi wa-ḥifẓihi ... Fa-jāʼa mithla al-sharḥi lil-Taḥrīri // sammaytuhu idh dhāka bi-al-Taysīri ..."
Secundo folio: aqsāmuhā arbaʻatun sa-taʻlamu.
17.5 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 17.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, headings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with "Bāb al-Iqrār" (Chapter on cofessing), as follows: "... Iqrāruhu bi-mulzimin la-hu yulzimu // illā bi-tafsīrin li-dhāka al-mubhami. Wa-in yaqul ʻindī la-hu darāhimu // aw zāda lafẓa ʻiddatin fa-lāzimu. Wa-yadfaʻu al-muqirru fī al-ḥālayni // wāzinatan minhā bi-ghārimayni. Aw, ʻiddatan min baldatin ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Muqaddimah al-ʻAshmāwīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Bārī al-ʻAshmāwī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah ʻAbd al-Bārī al-ʻAshmāwī al-Rifāʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aṣdiqāʼ an aʻmala muqaddimah fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām Mālik ibn Anas, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik, rājiyan lil-thawāb. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Bāb 'Nawāqiḍ al-wuḍūʼ' ..."
Secundo folio: al-dubur, wa-humā al-ghāʼiṭ wa-al-rīḥ.
11.5 x 17 cm; written surface: 7 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two unnumbered quires).
In large clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, headings in red; catchwords.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-qiyām Ramaḍān mustaḥabb murghab fīhi. Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Man qāma Ramaḍān īmānan wa-iḥtisāban ghufira la-hu mā taqaddama min dhanbihi, wa-fī riwāyah, wa-mā taʼakhkhar. Wa-yustaḥabbu al-infirād bi-hi, idhā lam tuʻaṭṭal al-masājid. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

record.title: 880-02 Mulḥat al-iʻrāb : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm abtadiʼu. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn: Mulḥat al-iʻrāb. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Aqūlu min baʻdi iftitāḥi al-qawli // bi-ḥamdi Dhī al-Ṭawli shadīdi al-ḥawli. Wa-baʻdahu fa-afḍalu al-salāmi // ʻalá al-Nabīyi Sayyidi al-anāmi ..."
Secundo folio: Bāb al-ḥarf. Wa-al-ḥarfu mā lays la-hu ʻalāmah.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire)
In large clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Mulḥat al-iʻrāb fī ʻilm al-naḥw, lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī <al-Ḥarīrī> al-Baṣrī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih. Āmīn. Yā Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl."

Colophon: "Tammat 'Mulḥat al-iʻrāb' lil-ʻAllāmah al-Ḥarīrī bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, ʻalá yad kātibihā, al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Karīm, Khalīl ibn Ibrāhīm, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-kāffat al-Muslimīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihā yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, fī waqt al-ẓuhr, ghāyat shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1299 Hijrīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-salām wa-atamm al-taḥīyah."

Translation of the colophon: "Mulḥat al-iʻrāb of the learned scholar al-Ḥarīrī is completed, thoroughly and perfectly, by the hand of its copyist, the poor to his Generous Lord, Khalīl ibn Ibrāhīm, may God forgive him, his parents, his shaykhs and all Muslims. It was completed on blessed Saturday, at noontime, at the end of the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, of the year 1299 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [19 February, 1882], may the best peace and the most perfect salutation be upon him."

record.title: 880-02 Bughyat al-irādāt fī sharḥ al-maqūlāt : manuscript / Khalīl Abū al-Murshid ibn Muḥammad al-Mālikī al-Maghribī.
record.note: Title from folio reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā man tanazzahta ʻan al-kamm wa-al-ayn wa-al-mithāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man takayyafa bi-maḥāsin al-afʻāl wa-farāyid al-aqwāl, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-atbāʻih al-mustakhrijīn farāʼid al-fawāʼid min majāz al-maqāl. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá ʻafw al-Ghanī, Khalīl Abū al-Murshid ibn Muḥammad al-Mālikī al-Maghribī, tawwajahu Allāh wa-ikhwānahu bi-nayl al-saʻādah, wa-khatama la-hu wa-lahum wa-li-wālidayhi bi-al-ḥusná wa-ziyādah: Qad saʼalanī aʻazz al-ikhwān an adhkura la-hu taʻlīqan yasīran ʻalá baytayn li-baʻḍ al-fuḍalāʼ fī al-maqūlāt ... wa-sammaytuhu: Bughyat al-irādāt li-sharḥ al-maqūlāt ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa bināʼun ʻalá anna kullan minhā.
15.8 x 22 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In a folded wrapper sheet (15 x 21 cm)
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Bughyat al-irādāt bi-sharḥ al-maqūlāt, lil-Shaykh Khalīl, Khalīl al-Maghribī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá amwāt al-Muslimīn, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Āmīn."

At the head of folio 1a: Part of the colophon of a previous manuscript (missing from this codex), in the same hand: "... wa-al-maʼāb, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā walī qablahu, wa-lā nabī baʻdahu, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-aḥbāb. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihā yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, al-ḥādī wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wāḥid wa-thamānīn [21 Muḥarram, 1181 of the Hijrah = 19 June 1767], bi-al-tamām. Āmīn. M."

On page 3 of the wrapper: Two ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Mulk al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá al-Zaynī Manṣūr ibn Abī al-Naṣr al-Maghribī, al-qāṭin yawmidhin bi-Samhūd ʻafā Allāh ʻannā wa-ʻanhu, wa-ʻan jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Shiʻr. Katabtu wa-qad ayqantu lā shakka annanī // amūtu wa-annī bi-al-fiʻāli muḥāsabu. Wa-ayqantu fī dhihnī wa-ḥaqqaqtu annanī // satablá yamīnī wa-al-ḥurūfu rawātibu. Raʻā Allāhu qawman shāhadū fa-taraḥḥamū // ʻalayya fa-innī fī al-duʻāʼi la-rāghibu. ʻAfā Allāhu ʻan qawmin raʼaw fa-taṣaddaqū // ʻalá man li-hādhā al-khaṭṭi bi-al-kaffi kātibu." 2. "Wa-baʻdahu malakahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Aḥmad ibn al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad ibn ... Muḥammad ibn ... Tuwayj ibn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ... ʻAbd al-Dāyim ibn ... ʻUbayd ibn ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ... Aḥmad ibn ... Muḥammad ibn ... Ḥamzah ibn ʻAlī al-mujāhid bi-Bāb al-Baḥr bi-thaghr Iskandarīyah ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Rabāḥ ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Idrīs al-Aṣghar ibn Idrīs al-Akbar ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Maḥḍ ibn al-Imām Jaʻfar ibn Abī Ṭālib ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib al-Hāshimī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Author's colophon: "... Wa-hādhihi ishārah ijmālīyah ilá hādhihi 'al-maqūlāt', kutibat ʻalá sabīl al-ʻajalah. Wa-ammā taḥqīq mabāḥithihā wa-tafṣīluhā fa-li-yuṭlab min al-muṭawwalāt. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the author's colophon: "... This is a general reference to these 'categories', written as a matter of urgency. As for thorough investigation and details, they should be requested from the extended references. Praise be to God in all circumstances. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, and on his family and companions, and grant them abundant peace until Judgment Day. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-02 al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

The beginning of the present treatise is not present in this volume; text starts with: "... yakun huwa al-matbūʻ. Ammā idhā kāna huwa al-matbūʻ wa-al-muqtadá bi-hi fa-ḥīnaʼidhin yanbaghī an lā yuṭawwila ʻalayhim al-intiẓār idhā ishraʼabbū lil-akl wa-ijtamaʻū la-hū. Wa-[in] kāna hunāka man yastaḥiqqu al-taqdīm li-kibar sinn aw ziyādat faḍl nadaba lil-qawm an yumsikū ḥattá yabtadiʼ. Wa-qad warada fī dhālika [Ḥadīth] mursal, w-huwa maʻmūl bi-hi fī al-faḍāʼil, fa-rawá Ibn ʻAsākir ʻan Abī Idrīs al-Khawlānī anna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: 'Idhā wuḍiʻa al-ṭaʻām fa-li-yabdaʼ amīr al-qawm, aw, ṣāḥib al-ṭaʻām, aw, khayr al-qawm'. al-Khāmisah an lā yuqaddima raʼsahu lil-qaṣʻah ʻinda waḍʻ al-luqmah fī fīhi ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-ṣāliḥīn fī al-aṭʻimah wa-ghayrihā.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of the poem and markings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
The excerpt of "al-Risālah al-Qushayrīyah", Hartford Seminary's MSS 808, was not received with the collection.
On folio 126b: A date at the lower margin of the leaf: "Intahá sanat 945 Hijrīyah, tisʻimiʼah khamsah wa-arbaʻūn [1538/1539]."

The commentary starts on folio 90b with the following verses: Wa-in atawka bi-anwāʻi al-ṭaʻāmi fa-mil // ilá ikhtibārika lil-majʻūli bi-al-ʻasali. Fa-sunnatu al-Muṣṭfá ḥubbu al-ḥalāwati lā // tabghi al-ʻudūla li-akli al-thūmi wa-al-baṣali. Wa-wāfiqi al-qawma ḥattá yaktafū shabaʻan // wa-lā taqum qablahum tufḍī ilá khajali.

Colophon: No colophon. The text ends abruptly with information about the author al-Aqfahsī, as follows: "... wa-Aqfahs baldah bi-Ṣaʻīd Miṣr al-Adná, maʻrūfah mashhūrah. Māta sanat thamān wa-thamānimiʼah, wa-ʻayyanahu al-Maqrīzī bi-Aḥad al-Jumādayn. Wa-Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá aʻlam ..."
