Translation of the author's colophon: "May God seal us with an amicable end, and enable us to attain the splendid treasure, by the noble status of our Master Muḥammad, and his family, and his honorable companions. Praise be God Lord of the Universe. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, his family, and his companions, and grant them peace.

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min raqm hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Thulāth al-mubārak, ʻāshir Jumād al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat wāḥid wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, 1191, min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilá raḥmat Rabbihi, ʻAlī al-Jaddāwī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn, bi-jāh Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on blessed Tuesday, the tenth of the month of Jumādá al-Thānī, of the year 1191 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [16 July 1777], may the best prayer and peace be upon Him, by the hand of the poorest of the servants, and the neediest to the mercy of his Lord, ʻAlī al-Jaddāwī, may God forgive him, his parents, and all Muslims, by the noble status of Sayyid al-Mursalīn [Prophet Muḥammad], may God pray on him, on his family, and on his companions, and grant them abundant peace."

record.title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. Kitāb al-Yaqīn. Huwa lughatan muqābalat shayʼ bi-shayʼ. Qāla al-shāʻir: Mā biʻtukum muhjatī illā bi-waṣlikumu // wa-lā usallimuhā illā yadan bi-yadi. Wa-sharʻan ʻaqdun yataḍammanu muqābalata mālin bi-māl bi-sharṭihi al-ātī li-istifādat mulk ʻayn aw manfaʻah muʼabbadah, wa-huwa al-murād bi-al-tarjamah hunā, bi-qism yuṭlaqu ʻalá qism al-shirāʼ, fa-yuḥaddu bi-annahu naql mulk bi-thaman ʻalá wajh makhṣūṣ ..."
Secundo folio: akhdhahu in kāna bāqiyan.
20 x 30 cm; written surface: 13.5 x 22.5 cm; 33 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; brown leather on the edges and spine; part of the spine is torn out.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Minhāj in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.
At the head of folio 1a (in red): "ʻIlm al-yaqīn fī bayʻ ʻImād al-Dīn."

On folio 1a: "ʻIlm al-yaqīn fī al-bayʻ, lil-Imām al-baḥr al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah [...] Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Ikhbārī [?] al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih, wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakātih fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman kathīran ilá yawm al-dīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. M."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Intaqala ilá mulk al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Qādir Abū al-Faḍl al-Shāfiʻī Yaḥyā [?], ghafara Allāh [la-hu]."

Author's colophon: "Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb [wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ] wa-al-maʼāb, wa-la-hu al-ḥamd ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan, awwalan wa-ākhiran. Wa-qad tamma al-muṣa[nnaf], hādhā al-kitāb, ʻIlm al-yaqīn, ʻalá yad muʼallifihi, ghafara Allāh dhanbahu wa-satara ʻaybahu, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad [... ...] al-Shāfiʻī, ḥāmidan, wa-muṣalliyan, wa-musalliman, wa-muḥasbilan, wa-muḥawqilan, fī thāmin ʻashar Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn wa-tisʻimiʼah. Wa-asʼaluhu al-iʻānah ʻalá al-itmām, bi-jāh Muḥammad, sayyid al-anām wa-miṣbāḥ al-ẓalām. Wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the author's colophon: "God Almighty is more knowledgeable of what is correct. To Him is the reference and returning. To Him belongs praise, explicitly and implicitly, in the beginning and at the end. The codex, i.e., this book, ʻIlm al-yaqīn, was completed by the hand of its author, may God forgive his shortcoming and cover his blemish, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad [... ...] al-Shāfiʻī, as he says the phrases of "Ḥamdalah", "Taṣliyah", "Taslīm", "Ḥasbalah", and "Ḥawqalah", on the eighteenth of Jumādá al-Ākhir, of the year 967 of the Hijrah [26 March 1560]. I ask Him to grant help for the completion, by the high status of Muḥammad, leader of mankind and lamp of darkness. He suffices me. He is the best advocate. There is no power nor might except in God the Almighty the All Powerful. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and his companions, and grant them abundant and perpetual peace until Judgment Day. Amen. Amen."

Copyist's colophon: "ʻAlá yad kātibihi wa-mālikihi al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Allāh taʻālá wa-ʻafwihi wa-karamih, Aḥmad ibn al-marḥūm al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Ḥasīb al-Nasīb, al-mutawaffá ilá raḥmat Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid al-Sharīf Aḥmad, ibn al-Sayyid al-Sharīf Muḥammad Abū al-Faḍl al-Ḥasanī al-Samhūdī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-jamīʻ salafihi wa-khalafihi ajmaʻīn, wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-muḥibbīhi wa-shīʻatihi wa-ḥizbihi. Āmīn. Wa-dhālika bi-tārīkh rābiʻ Jumādá al-Ūlá, min shuhūr sanat 967, sanat 967, tisʻimiʼah sabʻah wa-sittūn, 1570 Ifrankīyah. Tammat. M." On the left side of the colophon (in blue) six cryptic symbols.

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "By the hand of its copyist and owner, the servant who needs the mercy of God Almighty, His forgiveness, and His benevolence, Aḥmad ibn al-marḥūm al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Ḥasīb al-Nasīb, al-mutawaffá ilá raḥmat Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid al-Sharīf Aḥmad, ibn al-Sayyid al-Sharīf Muḥammad Abū al-Faḍl al-Ḥasanī al-Samhūdī, may God forgive him, his predecessors and successors, his shaykhs, his beloved ones, his group, and his party. Amen. Dated on the fourth of Jumādá al-Ūlá, of the year 967 [of the Hijrah = 11 February 1560], and 1570 Ifrankīyah "Western". It is completed." On the left side of the colophon (in blue) six cryptic symbols.

record.title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Salam. Wa-yuqālu la-hu al-salaf. Summiya salaman li-taslīm raʼs al-māl fī al-majlis, wa-salafan li-taqdīmih. Wa-al-aṣl fīhi qabla al-ijmāʻ, illā mā shadhdha bi-hi Ibn al-Musayyab. Āyat al-dayn, fassarahā Ibn ʻAbbās bi-al-salam al-ṣaḥīḥayn man aslama fī shayʼ fa-li-yaslam fī kaylin maʻlūm wa-waznin mawzūn ilá ajalin maʻlūm ka-al-shafaq wa-al-fajr, aw wasaṭ al-sanah, bi-al-qiyās ʻalá al-thaman ..."
Secundo folio: qabla qabḍ raʼs al-māl.
20.5 x 30 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 21.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather; cover embossed with central medallion and decorations on the corners.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Minhāj in red; catchwords.

The text ends abruptly with: "... wa-li-anna al-zakāh lā minnata fīhā, wa-rajjaḥa al-thānī ākharūn, wa-lam yurajjiḥ fī al-Rawḍah wāḥidan minhā. Thumma qāla ʻaqiba dhālika al-Ghazzālī, wa-al-ṣawāb annahu yakhtalifu bi-al-ashkhāṣ. Fa-in ʻaraḍa la-hu shibhah fī istiḥqāqih lam yaʼkhudh al-zakāh, wa-in qaṭaʻa bi-hi. Fa-in kāna lil-taṣadduq lam yuʼkhadh hādhā minhu, lā yataṣaddaq, fa-li-yaʼkhudhhā, fa-inna ikhrāj al-zakāh lā budda minhu, wa-in kāna lā budda min ikhrājihā, wa-lam yuḍayyiq bi-al-zakāh takhayyur, wa-akhdhuhā ashadd fī kasr al-nafs. Intahá. Ay fa-huwa Ḥ afḍal [... ... ...]."
Colophon: "[...] Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat thalāth wa-sittīn wa-alf. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon: "[...] Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1063 [of the Hijrah = March/April 1653]. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and on his companions, and grant them peace. It is completed."

record.title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing; text starts with"... fīmā yaẓharu, fa-lā qawad, bal, wa-lā ḍamān ḥaythu kāna ḥaddan, li-annahu lam yaḥduth fīhi ṣunʻan fī al-awwal, wa-huwa al-qātil li-nafsihi fī al-baqīyah. Qāla al-Qawrānī: Wa-kadhā law amkanahu al-harab bilā mukhāṭarah fa-tarakahu. Ammā al-raqīq fa-yaḍmanuhu bi-al-yad. Wa-akhdh al-adhʻar ḥayy min qawlihim, li-annahu lam yaḥduth fīhi ṣunʻan bi-annahu qaḍīyatuhu law aghlaqa ʻalayhi baytan huwa jālis fīhi ḥattá māta jūʻan lam yaḍmanhu, wa-fīhi naẓar mamtūʻ, li-annahu fī akhdh al-ṭaʻām minhu mutamakkin min akhdh shayʼ bi-khilāfihi fī al-ḥabs, bal hiya dākhilah fī kalāmihi ..."
Secundo folio: fa-ʻalayhi diyat shubh ʻamd.
20 x 30.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 23 cm; 33 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather with flap; cover embossed with central medallion and decorated corner; flap embossed with central medallion; back cover missing.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Minhāj in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

Colophon: "Wa-nakhtumu al-kitāb bi-mā badaʼnāhu bi-hi min ḥamd Allāh alladhī baydad [yubdī] wa-yuʻīd. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-makhṣūṣ bi-ʻumūm al-shafāʻah yawm al-waʻīd, wa-naʻūdhu bi-hi min al-ḥawr baʻda al-dawr wa-fitnat al-amal al-baʻīd, wa-nasʼaluhu al-fawz yawm al-qiyāmah, yawma yuqālu fulānun shaqī wa-fulānun saʻīd. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh [al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm] ..."

Translation of the colophon: "We conclude the book by what we started it with, by praising God who starts and repeats. May prayer and peace be upon His Prophet Muḥammad, who is assigned for total intercession on the Day of Judgment. We take refuge in him from failure after success, and from the delusion of unattainable hope. We ask Him victory in the day of resurrection, the day when it is to be said: So and so is wretched and so and so is lucky. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and on his companions, and grant them abundant peace until Judgment Day. There is no power nor [might] except in God [the Almighty the All Powerful] ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Minhāj al-ṭālibīn : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Kitāb al-Qaḍāʼ, ay, al-ḥukm bayan al-nās. Huwa farḍ kifāyah fī ḥaqq al-ṣāliḥīn la-hu fī al-nāḥiyah, fa-yuwallī al-imām fīhā aḥadahum li-yaqūma bi-hi. Fa-in taʻayyana la-hu fīhā wāḥidun bi-an lam yaṣluḥ ghayruhu lazamahu ṭalabuhu wa-qabūluhu idhā waliyahu, wa-illā, ay, wa-in lam yataʻayyan la-hu wāḥid fī al-nāḥiyah bi-an kāna maʻahu ghayruhu, fa-in kāna ghayruhu aṣlaḥ, wa-kāna, ay, al-aṣlaḥ yatawallāhu, ay yarḍá bi-tawliyatihi, fa-lil-mafḍūl, wa-huwa ghayr al-aṣlaḥ al-qabūl, wa-qīla lā, wa-yuḥram ṭalabuhu wa-tawliyatuhu, wa-ʻalá al-awwal yukrahu ṭalabuhu, wa-qīla yuḥram ..."
Secundo folio: istakhlif ʻan nafsika aw aṭliq la-hu al-istikhlāf.
21 x 30.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 22.5 cm; 33 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather with flap; cover embossed with central medallion; many wormholes on cover and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; the phrases of al-Minhāj in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
At the head of folio 1a: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Kitāb al-Qaḍāʼ min kull muḥarram wa-muḥallal wa-yubayyinu al-Sharīʻah al-Muḥammadīyah. Wa-awwaluhu al-Ḥukm."

On folio 366a: An ownership statement: "Milk al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥsin ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn ʻAlī ibn Sulaymān al-Tarbazlī al-Tarkhūṭī baladan wa-mawṭinan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī muʻtaqadan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-muʼminīn yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisāb. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
At the lower left corner of folio 366a: A magic square.

Author's colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih. Qāla muʼallifuhu, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Faraghtu min taʼlīfihi thālith Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat sittīn wa-thamānimiʼah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman kathīran dāʼiman abadan ilá Yawm al-Dīn, wa-fī Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

Translation of the author's colophon: "The book was completed by the praise of God and His help. Its author, may God Almighty have mercy upon him, said: I completed it on the third day of Rabīʻ al-ākhir, of the year 860 [of the Hijrah = 20 March 1456]. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and on his companions, and grant them abundant, continuous, and perpetual peace, until Judgment Day and on Judgment Day. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. There is no power nor might except in God the Almighty the All Powerful."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kutiba dhālika bi-rasm khizānat Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Shaykh [al-Shaykh] al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah [...] al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-mrḥūmī [al-marḥūm] al-Tuhāmī Aḥmad, al-mulaqqab bi-al-Qawābilī, al-Shāfiʻī al-hawá, fasaḥ Allāh fī muddatih, wa-aqāla [ʻathratah (?)], wa-ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Āmīn. Wa-in tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā. Wa-dhālika ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, al-rājī raḥmata Rabbihi al-Mannān, al-faqīr Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad al-Khuḍayrī ibn Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad ibn Zayn al-Dīn ibn Aṣīl al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Nuʻmān, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man naẓara fīhi wa-daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Sanat 1062, ithnayn wa-sittīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "The copy was written for the library of Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Shaykh [al-Shaykh] the learned and erudite Imām, [...] al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-mrḥūmī [al-marḥūm] al-Tuhāmī Aḥmad, nicknamed 'al-Qawābilī', of the Shafiite inclination, may God extend his appointed time, and set him up from [his stumble (?)]. May God forgive him and his parents, by Muḥammad and his family. Amen. If you were to find a blemish close the gap // Mighty and Sublime is the One in whom no blemish exists. Copied by the hand of the poor servant who admits his inability and his insufficiency, who aspires for the mercy of his Munificent Lord, the poor Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad al-Khuḍayrī ibn Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad ibn Zayn al-Dīn ibn Aṣīl al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Nuʻmān, may God forgive him and his parents, and him who looks into it [the book] and invokes forgiveness for them. Amen. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. Dated in the year 1062 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [1651/1652], may the best prayer and peace be upon Him."

record.title: William Rees sermons : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Minhāj al-ṭālibīn : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālih. Kitāb al-Bayʻ. Huwa ka-qawlika biʻtuka hādhā bi-kadhā, fa-yaqūlu ishtaraytuhu bi-hi, fa-yataḥaqqaqu bi-al-ʻāqid wa-al-maʻqūd ʻalayhi, wa-lahumā shurūṭ taʼtī, wa-al-ṣīghah allatī bihā yuʻqad, wa-badaʼa bihā ka-ghayrihi, li-annahā ahamm, lil-khilāf fīhā, wa-ʻabbara ʻanhā bi-al-shurūṭ, khilāf taʻbīrihi fī Sharḥ al-Muhadhdhab, ka-al-Ghazzālī ʻan al-thalāthah bi-arkān al-bayʻ, fa-qāla sharṭuhu al-ījāb, ka-biʻtuka wa-mallaktuka, wa-al-qabūl, ka-ishtaraytu wa-tamallaktu wa-qabiltu, ay, lā yaṣiḥḥu al-bayʻ bidūnihimā, li-annahu manūṭ bi-al-riḍá ..."
Secundo folio: yaqbal ʻalá wafq al-ījāb.
20 x 27.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 19.5 cm; 29 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In clear medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Minhāj in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes on cover; catchwords.

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Ṣāra hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak jārī fī milk ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad Jād al-Fiqī, bi-Masjid al-Ustādh Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī, fī shahr Rajab sanat 1211 [December 1796/January 1797], ʻammat barakātuh."
Colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min tamām hādhā al-rubʻ al-mubārak yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, sābiʻ ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1029, tisʻah wa-ʻishrīn wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon: "This blessed quarter was completed on blessed Sunday, 17 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1029 [of the Hijrah = 22 March 1620]."

record.title: Miscellaneous Islamic treatises : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of "Naẓm Qalāʼid al-ʻiqyān fī mūrithāt al-faqr wa-al-nisyān" supplied by Hartford Seminary (partly from incipit).
2. Title of "Naẓm al-Kabāʼir wa-al-ṣaghāʼir" from incipit (folio 3a).
3. Title of "Manāqib ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīli" from incipit (folio 4a).
4. Title of "Aḥādīth min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn" from incipit (folio 11a).
5. Title of "Faṣl 'Mā yurādu minka ilá al-ākhirah'" from the caption (folios 19b).
6. Title of "Waṣīyat al-Nabī lil-Imām ʻAlī" from folio 21b.
7. Title of "Rawḍat al-ʻulamāʼ" from incipit (folio 26a).
8. Title of "al-Kalām ʻalá suwar min Mazāmīr al-Nabī Dāwūd" from incipit (folio 27a).
9. Title of "Munājāt Mūsá" from incipit (folio 31a).
10. Title of "Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes, etc." supplied by the cataloger.
11. Title of "Risālat al-akhyār fīman manaʻ al-nawm fī al-masājid min al-ashrār" from incipit (folio 60b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of "Naẓm Qalāʼid al-ʻiqyān fī mūrithāt al-faqr wa-al-nisyān": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi kamā ʻāfānā // mina al-balā mithla mā hadānā. Naḥmaduhu ʻalá mazīdi niʻamih // wa-zaydi faḍlihi wa-fayḍi karamih. Thumma al-ṣalātu wa-al-salām al-jammah // ʻalá Nabīyin mursalin lil-ummah ... Wa-samahu Qalāʼid al-ʻiqyāni // fī mūrithāt al-faqr wa-al-nisyāni ..."
1. Secundo folio of "Naẓm Qalāʼid al-ʻiqyān fī mūrithāt al-faqr wa-al-nisyān": al-Faṣl al-thānī fīmā yūrithu al-nisyān faqaṭ.

2. Incipit of "Naẓm al-kabāʼir wa-al-ṣaghāʼir": "Naẓm al-kabāʼir wa-al-ṣaghāʼir lil-Shaykh Najm al-Dīn al-Ghazzī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabbi al-Wāsiʻ al-Barri // al-ghāfiri al-sayyiʼāti al-wāsiʻi al-birri. Thumma al-ṣalātu maʻa al-taslīmi minhu ʻalá // Muḥammadin al-Muṣṭafá maʻa ālihi al-ghurri ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Naẓm al-kabāʼir wa-al-ṣaghāʼir": No secundo folio.

3. Incipit of "Manāqib ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlī": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rawá al-muṣannif bi-sanadihi ʻan Abī Muḥammad Rajab ibn Manṣūr al-Dārī, wa-Abī Zayd ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Sālim al-Qurashī, wa-ʻan Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻUbādah al-Anṣārī bi-al-Qāhirah, sanat iḥdá wa-sabʻīn wa-sittimiʼah, qālū: Anbaʼanā al-Shaykh al-qudwah Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī al-Qurashī bi-Jabal Qāsiyūn, sanat thamāni ʻashar wa-sittimiʼah qāl: Kuntu anā wa-al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Haythamī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, ʻinda al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, bi-madrasatihi sanat sabʻ wa-arbaʻīn wa-khamsimiʼah, fa-jāʼahu Abū Ghālib Faḍl Allāh ibn Ismāʻīl al-tājir, fa-qāla la-hu: Yā Sayyidī, qāla jadduka Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāhu ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Man duʻiya fa-li-yujib ..."
3. Secundo folio of "Manāqib ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlī": wa-nazalū wādiyan yaqtasimūna amwālanā.

4. Incipit of "Aḥādīth min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhihi al-Aḥādīth min kalām Sayyidī [Sayyid] al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ukhrijat min Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī wa-Muslim, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. ʻAn Jābir ibn ʻAbd Allāh, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, annahu qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: al-Muslim man salama al-Muslimūn min lisānih. Wa-qāla, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Lā yuʼminu aḥadukum ḥattá yuḥibba li-akhīhi mā yuḥibbu li-nafsihi ..."
4. Secundo folio of "Aḥādīth min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn": Ruwiya anna Allāh ʻazza wa-jall qāla li-Mūsá.

5. Incipit of "Faṣl 'Mā yurādu minka ilá al-ākhirah'": "Faṣl 'Mā yurādu minka ilá al-ākhirah'. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hadīyat Allāh taʻālá, ʻazza wa-jall, arbaʻah: al-Amr bi-al-maʻrūf, wa-al-nahy ʻan al-munkar, wa-al-tawṣiyah lil-khalq bi-al-khayr, wa-al-raḥmah. Hadīyah al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, arbaʻah: Ḥubbuhu fī qalbika wa-al-ittibāʻ li-sunnatih, wa-ḥubbu ahl baytih, wa-ḥubbu aṣḥābih, ruḍwān Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn ..."
5. Secundo folio of "Faṣl 'Mā yurādu minka ilá al-ākhirah'": wa-dhālika min ʻalāmāt al-mutawakkilīn.

6. Incipit of "Waṣīyat al-Nabī lil-Imām ʻAlī": "Hādhihi 'Waṣīyat al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, lil-Imām ʻAlī', karrama Allāh wajhahu wa-raḍiya ʻanhu. Ḥaddathanā al-Shaykh Abū Isḥāq ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Aḥmad ibn Sulaymān al-Ṭabarī al-Ṣūfī, qāl: Ḥadathanā al-Qāḍī Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Azdawī bi-Makkah, Qāl: Ḥaddathanā Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Baghdādī al-Kātib, Qāl: ... ʻan ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, qāl: Daʻānī Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-qāla lī: Yā ʻAlī anta minnī bi-manzilat Hārūn wa-Mūsá, ʻalayhimā al-salām, li-annahu lā nabī baʻdī wa-anā ūṣīka bi-waṣīyah ..."
6. Secundo folio of "Waṣīyat al-Nabī lil-Imām ʻAlī": wa-al-tafrīṭ fī al-ṣalāh, Yā ʻAlī.

7. Incipit of "Rawḍat al-ʻulamāʼ": "Manqūl min 'Rawḍat al-ʻulamāʼ'. ʻAn al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāl li-ʻAlī, karrama Allāh wajhahu wa-raḍiya ʻanhu: Yā ʻAlī, idhā aradta an tanāma fa-taṣaddaq bi-ʻashrat ālāf dirham, wa-ikhtim al-Qurʼān, wa-arḍī al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt ʻanka, aḥyāʼahum wa-amwātahum, min Ādam ilá Yawm al-Qiyāmah. Fa-qāla: Wa-kayfa dhālika Yā Rasūla Allāh? Fa-qāla, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Iqraʼ 'Fātiḥat al-Kitāb' qabla an tanām, fa-inna Allāh yaktubu laka min al-ajr kaman taṣaddaqa bi-ʻashrat ālāf dirham ..."
7. Secundo folio of "Rawḍat al-ʻulamāʼ": No secundo folio (the treatise is one leaf only, folio 26a-26b).

8. Incipit of "al-Kalām ʻalá suwar min Mazāmīr al-Nabī Dāwūd": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalām ʻalá suwar min Mazāmīr al-Nabī Dāwūd, ʻalayhi al-salām. al-Mawʻiẓah al-ūlá. Yaqūlu Allāh taʻālá: ʻAjibtu li-man ayqana bi-al-mawt, kayfa yafraḥ; wa-ʻajibtu li-man ayqana bi-al-ḥisāb, kayfa yajmaʻ; wa-ʻajibtu li-man ayqana bi-al-qabr, kayfa yaḍḥak; wa-ʻajibtu li-man ayqana bi-al-ākhirah, kayfa yastarīḥ ..."
8. Secundo folio of "al-Kalām ʻalá suwar min Mazāmīr al-Nabī Dāwūd": wa-kullukum hālik illā man najjaytu.

9. Incipit of "Munājāt Mūsá": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Munājāt [Munājāh] Mūsá, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Awḥá Allāh taʻālá ilá Mūsá ibn ʻImrān, ʻalayhi al-salām: Yā Mūsá, ṣum lī, wa-iṣʻad al-jabal usmiʻka ḥalāwat kalāmī. Fa-ṣāma Mūsá shahran, wa-ṣaʻada al-jabal. Fa-awḥá Allāh taʻālá: Yā Mūsá, sal mā shiʼt. Qāla Mūsá: Yā Rabb, fa-mā li-man qāla: 'Lā ilāha illā Allāh'. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Yā Mūsá, aktubu la-hu ʻashr ḥasanāt. Qāla Mūsá: Yā Rabb, fa-mā li-man ṣabara ʻalá bard al-māʼ ʻinda al-ṭuhūr. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Aktubu la-hu bi-kull qaṭrat yuqṭiru ʻalá badanihi ḥasanah, wa-amḥī ʻanhu sayyiʼah, wa-ubāriku fī arzāqih ..."
9. Secundo folio of "Munājāt Mūsá": Mūsá: Yā Rabb, fa-ayy ʻibādika aqrab.

10. Incipit of "Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes, etc.": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, khātim al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, ṣalawāt Allāh wa-salāmuhu ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn, ruḍwān Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, qāla ahl al-ʻilm: al-ʻAql jawhar muḍīʼ, khalaqahu Allāh taʻālá fī al-dimāgh, wa-jaʻla nūrahu fī al-qalb, yudriku al-ghāʼibāt bi-al-wasāʼiṭ, wa-al-maḥsūsāt bi-al-mushāhadah. Wa-fī al-Ḥadīth: al-ʻAql nūrun fī al-qalb, yufarriqu bayna al-ḥaqq wa-al-bāṭil ..."
10. Secundo folio of "Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes, etc.": wa-al-futūwah wa-al-qunūʻ wa-al-riḍā wa-al-taslīm.

11. Incipit of "Risālat al-akhyār fīman manaʻ al-nawm fī al-masājid min al-ashrār": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-nawm rāḥatan lil-ajsād, wa-abāḥahu fī al-masājid wa-sāʼir al-mawāṭin min al-bilād, faḍlan minhu wa-karaman wa-minnah, wa-in manaʻa min dhālika ahl al-jahl wa-al-ḥasad wa-al-ʻinād, wa-jaʻala al-ruʼyā juzʼan min al-nubūwah wa-waḥyan ilá al-ʻibād, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr li-raḥmat Rabbihi al-qarīb, Muḥammad al-Sawāʼī thumma al-Shafūnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Khaṭīb: Fa-hādhihi 'Risālah fī al-radd ʻalá man iʻtaqada anna al-nawm fī al-masājid ḥarām', ḍāmman ilá dhālika min al-fawāʼid al-mustajiddāt, wa-sammaytuhā 'Risālat al-akhyār fīman manaʻa al-nawm fī al-masājid min al-ashrār'. Wa-Allāh al-karīm asʼaluhu al-tawfīq wa-al-iʻānah wa-taysīr mā aqṣuduhu min al-khayrāt an yanfaʻa bi-hā, wa-yūṣila asbāb al-khayr bi-sababihā ..."
11. Secundo folio of "Risālat al-akhyār fīman manaʻ al-nawm fī al-masājid min al-ashrār": istayaqaẓa min al-nawm.
15.5 x 22 cm; written surface 9.5 x 17 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in five unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Qaṣīdat Shaykhinā wa-Sayyidinā al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlī, Qaddasa [Allāh] sirrahu, wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu, wa-amaddanā min madadih, wa-lāḥaẓanā bi-barakat anfāsih wa-asrārih. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."

1. Colophon of "Naẓm Qalāʼid al-ʻiqyān fī mūrithāt al-faqr wa-al-nisyān": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāhi ʻalá naʻmāʼihi // wa-al-shukru lillāhi ʻalá ālāʼihi. Thumma al-ṣalātu wa-al-salāmu al-sarmad // ʻalá al-Nabīyi al-Hāshimīyī Muḥammad. Wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-akhyāri // mā nasakha al-laylu ḍiyā al-nahāri. Naẓamtuhā fī fardi yawmin wa-laqad // ṣaḥibanī fī dhāka tawfīqu al-Ṣamad."

2. Colophon of "Naẓm al-kabāʼir wa-al-ṣaghāʼir": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāhi Rabbi al-ʻĀlamīna ʻalá // iḥsānihi al-shāmili al-sāmī ʻani al-ḥaṣri. Thumma al-ṣalātu maʻa al-taslīmi minhu ʻalá // Khayri al-anāmi shafīʻi al-khalqi fī al-ḥashri. Wa-baʻdahu al-ṣāḥibu al-Ṣiddīqu maʻ ʻUmarin // ʻUthmānu thumma ʻAlīyun ṣāḥibu al-fakhri. Wa-al-ālu wa-al-ṣaḥbu wa-al-azwāju kulluhumu // wa-ḥasbunā Allāhu hādhā muntahá shiʻrī. Tamm."

3. Colophon of "Manāqib ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlī": No colophon. Text ends with: "... fa-raʼaytu shakhṣan ʻaynāhu mashqūqatān ṭūlan, fa-ẓanant annahu jinnī, fa-qāla lī: Anā al-ṣillah allatī raʼaytahā fī al-laylah al-māḍiyah, wa-laqad ikhtabartu kathīran min al-awliyāʼ bi-mā ikhtabartuka bi-hi, fa-lam yathbut aḥad minhum lī ka-thabātika, wa-kāna minhum man yaḍṭaribu ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan, wa-minhum man iḍṭarab bāṭinan wa-thabat ẓāhiran, wa-raʼaytuka lam taḍṭarib, lā bāṭinan wa-lā ẓāhiran. Wa-saʼalatnī an tatūba ʻalá yadī, fa-tūwibat. Wa-karāmatuhu lā tuḥṣaru, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

4. Colophon of "Aḥādīth min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Wa-qāla, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Rufiʻat al-barakah min thalāth, min al-ḥārr ḥattá yabrud, wa-min al-ghālī ḥattá yarkhuṣ, wa-mimmā lam yudhkar ism Allāh ʻalayhi. Ṣadaqa Rasūlu Allāh, wa-ṣadaqa Ḥabīb Allāh. Tamma bi-ʻawn Allāh [It was completed by the help of God].

5. Colophon of "Faṣl 'Mā yurādu minka ilá al-ākhirah'": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Fāʼidah. Qāla Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Maghribī: Raʼaytu al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī al-manām, fa-qultu: Yā Nabī Allāh, lī ḥājah ilá Allāh taʻālá, fa-bi-mādhā atawassal. Qāla, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Man kānat la-hu ḥājah ilá Allāh taʻālá, fa-li-yasjud sajdatayn, wa-li-yaqūl fī sujūdihi arbaʻīn marrah 'Lā ilāha illā ant, subḥānaka, innī kuntu min al-ẓālimīn'. Wa-fī al-Ḥadīth: Lā yaqūluhā makrūb illā farraja Allāh ʻanhu. Wa-fī Ḥadīth ākhar: Fa-innahu lam yadʻu bi-hā rajul Muslim fī shayʼ qaṭṭ illā istajāba Allāh la-hu."

6. Colophon of "Waṣīyat al-Nabī lil-Imām ʻAlī": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Yā ʻAlī, ilzam al-ṣamt, fa-inna al-balāʼ muwakkal bi-al-nuṭq, wa-man ṣamata najā, wa-ʻalayka bi-qawl: 'Lā ilāha illā Allāh', fa-innahā tahdim al-dhunūb hadman. Yā ʻAlī, laḥm al-baqar dāʼ wa-samnuhā dawāʼ wa-labanuhā shifāʼ, wa-ʻalayka bi-qirāʼat al-Qurʼān, fa-inna li-kull ḥarf ʻishrīn ḥasanah, wa-lil-mustaghfirīn mithl dhālik. Ṣadaqa Rasūl Allāh, wa-ṣadaqa Ḥabīb Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman kathīran. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

7. Colophon of "Rawḍat al-ʻulamāʼ": No colophon. Text ends with and invocation, as follows: "... wa-ikhtim lanā minka bi-khayr ajmaʻīn, bi-raḥmatika, Yā Arḥam al-Rāḥimīn. Allāhumma ighfir lanā wa-li-wālidaynā, wa-li-man ʻallamanā, wa-li-man samiʻanā, wa-li-man ḥaḍaranā, wa-li-man ghāba ʻannā, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Subḥāna Rabbika Rabbi al-ʻIzzati ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn."

8. Colophon of "al-Kalām ʻalá suwar min Mazāmīr al-Nabī Dāwūd": No colophon. Text ends with "al-Mawʻiẓah al-rābiʻah wa-al-ʻishrūn" (the Twenty-fourth sermon), as follows: "... Yā Ibna Ādam, lisānuka asaduka in aṭlaqtahu qatalaka, fa-halākuka fī iṭlāq lisānik. Yā Ibna Ādam, mā ʻamilatahu min khayr fa-huwa nafʻun laka ghadan. Yā Ibna Ādam, akthir min al-istighfār ānāʼ al-layl wa-aṭrāf al-nahār, wa-ṣallī ʻalá al-Nabī Muḥammad al-mukhtār aqīka sharra al-nār wa-udkhilka maʻa al-abrār. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm."

9. The text of "Munājāt Mūsá" ends with: "... Qāla Mūsá: Yā Rabb, innī ajidu fī al-Tawrāt ummatan yatafaqqahūn fī al-dunyā wa-yuḥsharūn fī zumrat al-anbiyāʼ, fa-ajʻaluhum ummatī. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Tilka ummat Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."
Colophon of "Munājāt Mūsá": "Tammat 'al-Munājāh', bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."
9. Translation of the colophon of "Munājāt Mūsá": "The 'Soliloquy' was completed by the help of God Almighty, and His abundant benevolence. It is completed. It is completed. It is completed."

10. Colophon of "Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes, etc.": No colophon. Text ends with the following anecdotes: "... Wa-ḥukiya annahu qīla li-ʻUmar ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz: Law kharajta ilá al-Madīnah wa-mutta hunāk qubirta maʻa Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-Abī Bakr wa-ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā. Qāl: Li-yumazziq al-kalb jildī aḥabbu ilayya min an yuqāla lī innahu raʼá nafsahu li-dhālika ahlan. Wa-qīla li-Abī al-Qāsim al-Naṣrābādī: Inna baʻḍ al-nās yujālisu al-nisāʼ wa-yaqūl: Anā maʻṣūm fī ruʼyatihin, fa-qāl: Mā dāmat al-ashbāḥ bāqiyah wa-al-nafs qāʼimah, fa-inna al-amr wa-al-nahy bāqī. Wa-ḥukiya anna wāḥidan raʼá wāḥidan fī al-hawá, fa-qāla la-hu: Bi-mā balaghta hādhihi al-darajah, fa-qāl: Bi-tarkī lil-hawāʼ. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, khātim al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

11. Colophon of "Risālat al-akhyār fīman manaʻ al-nawm fī al-masājid min al-ashrār": "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻināyat al-Malik al-Tawwāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Ghafara Allāh li-ṣāḥibih, wa-li-kātibihi, wa-li-qārīhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Tamm. [in red] Fī 17 shahr Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat 1105, nahār al-Jumʻah."

11. Translation of the colophon of "Risālat al-akhyār fīman manaʻ al-nawm fī al-masājid min al-ashrār": "The book was completed by the providence of the Merciful King. May God pray on our Master and our leader Muḥammad, on his family and on his companions, and grant them peace. God Suffices us. He is the best advocate. There in no power nor might except in God the Almighty, the All Powerful. May God forgive its owner, its notable, its reader, and all Muslims. Amen. It is completed. [In red] On Friday, the 17th of the month of Jumādá al-Ākhir, of the year 1105 [of the Hijrah = 13 February 1694]."

record.title: 880-02 Natāʼij al-afkār : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Ḥamzah al-Aṭahʹlī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Texts starts with: "... wa-huwa mā, ay, al-kalimah bi-qarīnah. Jaʻalahu qisman minhā, dalla ʻalá maʻnan waḍʻan, idh al-mutabādar min al-dalālah allatī waṣafa bi-hā al-kalimah mā yukawwinu al-kalimah kalimah bi-iʻtibārihā, wa-hiya al-dalālah al-waḍʻīyah, aw, iktafá bi-mā dhakarahu fī taʻrīf al-fiʻl. Wa-lammā kāna kawn al-maʻná fī nafsihi, aw, fī nafs al-kalimah rājiʻan ilá kawnihi maustaqillan bi-al-mafhūmīyah ..."
Secundo folio: wa-qad ʻarafta anna dhālika maʻlūm bi-al-istiqrāʼ.
15.8 x 21 cm; written surface: 7 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white laid paper; markings in red; many commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

Author's colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taswīd 'Sharḥ al-Iẓhār [Iẓhār] al-asrār', bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Ghaffār, ʻalá yad aḍʻaf al-wará, al-Shaykh al-Muṣṭafá, fī al-ḍaḥwá al-kubrá min yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, al-sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min Ramaḍān al-mubārak, min sanat khams wa-thamānīn wa-alf."

Translation of the author's colophon: "The draft copy of 'Sharḥ Iẓhār al-asrār' was completed by the help of God the Merciful Milk, by the hand of the feeblest of mankind, al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá, on the morning of Wednesday, the 27th of blessed Ramaḍān, of the year 1085 [of the Hijrah = 25 December 1674]."

Copyist's colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah al-jamīl bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Jalīl, min yad afqar al-ʻibād, Muṣṭafá ibn al-Ḥājj Ismāʻīl, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahumā, al-kathīr wa-al-qalīl, sanat iḥdá wa-khamsīn wa-miʼah wa-alf." To the right of the colophon, the copyist wrote two verses of poetry, as follows: "Katabtu kitābī bi-khaṭṭin jamīl // wa-juhdin kathīrin wa-ʻumrin ṭawīl. Akhāf min al-mawti idhā jāʼanī // yubāʻu kitābī bi-shayʼin qalīl."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This beautiful copy was completed by the help of God, the Glorious King, by the hand of the poorest of the servants, Muṣṭafá ibn al-Ḥājj Ismāʻīl, may God forgive the shortcomings of both of them, the many and the little, in the year 1151 [of the Hijrah = 1738/1739]." To the right of the colophon, the copyist wrote two verses of poetry, as follows: "I wrote my book in beautiful script // laboriously over a long time. I am afraid if I were to die // my book will be sold cheaply."

record.title: 880-02 Muntahá al-ishārāt bi-tawḍīḥ al-Waraqāt : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Nūbī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bāb al-wuṣūl li-uṣūl al-sharīʻah, wa-sharaḥ al-ṣudūr li-ijtināʼ thamarāt furūʻihā al-badīʻah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-muṣṭafá min aʻẓam aṣl wa-aʻlá jurthūmah sāmiyah rafīʻah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna bayyanū lanā minhāj al-sadād wa-sabīl al-rashād, wa-waḍḍaḥū taʼṣīlahu wa-furūʻahu. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥqar al-khamlūqāt [al-makhlūqāt], Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Nūbī, ghafara Allāh la-hu al-dhunūb wa-al-zallāt: Inna ashraf al-ʻulūm wa-ajall al-maʻlūmāt ʻilm uṣūl al-fiqh ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Muntahá al-ishārāt bi-tawḍīḥ al-Waraqāt' ..."
Secundo folio: al-taraddud fī wujūd shayʼ wa-ʻadamih.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 14 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair medium naskh script, in black ink on thick paper; the phrases of "al-Waraqāt" in red; few corrections on the margins; catchwords. Some leaves seem to be missing between folios 1 and 2.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Muntahá al-ishārāt bi-tawḍīḥ al-Waraqāt, bi-khaṭṭ muʼallifihi al-fāḍil Aḥmad al-Nūbī."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Min man manna bi-hi ʻalá al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr Ibrāhīm al-Suwayfī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Wa-al-taʻajjub, naḥwa: Unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāl. Wa-al-takdhīb, naḥwa: Qul fa-iʼtū bi-al-Tawrāt fa-atlūhā in kuntum ṣādiqīn. Wa-al-mashūrah, naḥwa: Fa-unẓur mādhā tará. Wa-al-iʻtibār, naḥwa: Unẓurū ilá thamarihi idhā athmar. Wa-ṣīghatuhu al-dāllah ʻalayhi afʻal. Wa-qad ittafaqa al-ʻulamāʼ ʻalá annahā laysat ḥaqīqah fī jamīʻ al-maʻānī al-mutaqaddimah, li-anna al-taswiyah wa-naḥwahā innamā istafadnāhā min al-qarāʼin, wa-innamā waqaʻa al-khilāf fī ..."

record.title: 880-02 Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... fī al-arḍ wa-yatafassaḥu fīhā. Wa-akhraja [Ibn] Abī Shaybah fī al-Muṣannaf, ʻan ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAmr, qāl: al-Dunyā sijn al-muʼmin, fa-idhā māt yukhlī sirbahu, yasraḥu ḥaythu shāʼ. Wa-akhraja Ibn Abī Shaybah wa-al-Ṭabarānī ʻan Ibn Masʻūd, qāl: al-Mawt tuḥfah li-kull Muslim. Wa-akhraja Abū Naʻīm [wa-]al-Bayhaqī fī al-Shaʻb wa-al-Khaṭīb, wa-ṣaḥḥaḥahu Ibn al-ʻArabī, qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: al-Mawt kaffārah li-kull Muslim ..."
Secundo folio: bika wa-khawfī min al-nās.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 14 cm; 18 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on thick laid paper; headings and markings in red; some leaves smudged with an unknown substance; catchwords.

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb 'Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb', lil-ʻAllāmah Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī. Yatlūhu kitāb 'Ṭulūʻ al-Thurayyā bi-iẓhār mā kāna khafīyan' lil-Ḥāfiẓ al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī ayḍan, raḥimahu Allāh."

Translation of the colophon: "The book 'Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb' of the learned scholar Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī is completed. It will be followed by the book ''Ṭulūʻ al-Thurayyā bi-iẓhār mā kāna khafīyan', also by al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī, may God have mercy upon him."

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from folio incipit (folio 3b): "... wa-sammaytu hādhā al-kitāb, ʻalá lisān hātif, bi-kitāb 'al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar' ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq. Aqūlu, wa-anā al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Shaʻrāwī al-Anṣārī: Aḥmadu Allāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-uṣallī wa-uusallimu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihim wa-ṣaḥbihim ajmaʻīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi jawāhir min al-maʻārif al-Rabbānīyah, istakhrajtuhā, wa-durar min al-ʻulūm al-Ladunīyah iltaqaṭtuhā ḥīna ghaṭastu fī baḥr ʻulūm ahl Allāh taʻālá, maʻa jumlat man ghaṭasa fīhi min kummal al-ʻārifīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-kadhālika lā yanbaghī la-hu an yadhkura.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... fa-inna al-rasūl yaʼkhudhu al-ʻilm dufʻatan wāḥidah, li-anna jibillatahu mafṭūratun ʻalayhi, lā taqtaḍī al-muhlah allatī hiya lil-taʻammul, wa-al-rusul lā tataʻammal lil-irsāl, bi-khilāf al-awliyāʼ qad yastaʻmilūn li-iktisāb al-ʻulūm, wa-yashhadūn man arsalahum shayʼan fa-shayʼan. Wa-li-hādhā kānū yaṭṭaliʻūn ʻalá tafḍīl mā nazala ʻalá al-rusul mujmalan, wa-hādhā maʻná qawl Abī Yazīd, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Khuḍtu baḥran waqafa al-anbiyāʼ ʻalá sāḥilih, ay, faṣṣaltu mā ajmalahu al-anbiyāʼ, li-kawnī istamaddaytu ʻilmī shayʼan fa-shayʼan. Wa-lam najid fī al-ḥaqīqah qaṭṭu ʻilman yukhālif mā jāʼat bi-hi al-rusul abadan, fa-ʻilm al-awliyāʼ kulluhu ʻalá namaṭ al-sharīʻah ..."

record.title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-aḥdāq fī nawādir al-ṭalāq : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 38b: "... wataqddama ayna sammaytu hādhihi al-maẓūmah 'Nuzhat al-aḥdāq fī nawādir al-ṭalāq' ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh [Rabbī (?)] bāʻithi al-rusuli // thumma al-ṣalātu ʻalá al-mukhtāri fī al-azali ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ibtadaʼtu bi-al-ḥamdi ayḍan.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 4 numbered quires).
In large clear naskh script, in black ink, on laid paper; the verses of the "manẓūmah" in red; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Nuzhat al-aḥdāq" (in pencil).

Colophon: No colophon; text ends abruptly with the commentary on verse "Bi-jāhi khayr al-wará al-hādī al-shafīʻi idhā // ḍāqa al-khunāq wa-ṣāra al-nāsu fī wajali", as follows: "... thumma yaftaḥu Allāh ʻalayya wa-yulhimunī min maḥāmidihi wa-ḥusn al-thanāʼ ʻalayhi mā lam yaftaḥhu li-aḥad ghayrī. Thumma yaqūlu: Yā Muḥammad, irfaʻ raʼsaka wa-sal tuʻṭa, wa-ishfaʻ tushfaʻ, fa-arfaʻu raʼsī, fa-aqūlu: Yā Rabb, ummatī, fa-yaqūlu: Yā Muḥammad, adkhil al-Jannah min ummatika man lā ḥisāba ʻalayhi min al-bāb al-ayman min abwāb al-Jannah, [...?] hum shurakāʼ al-nās fīmā siwá dhālika min al-abwāb. Wa-alladhī nafs Muḥammad bi-yadih ..."

record.title: 880-01 Ḥall Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá niʻmatih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ʻayn ʻināyatih wa-raḥmatih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-ʻāmilīn bi-sharʻihi wa-sunnatih. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'Ḥall Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ', akhadhtuhu min al-ḥawāshī wa-al-shurrāḥ. Qāla al-muṣa[nnif]: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā anʻam, ay, ʻalá inʻāmih ..."
Secundo folio: ʻilman bayyinan man yukhāṭab bi-hi.
15.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 10.5 cm; 25-31 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 5 numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; the phrases of the original text in purple; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
Text folios 1b-45a; folios 45b-48a are blank.
On folio 48b: An invocation.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-lam yuqaddar, ay, wa-lam yulāḥaẓ al-taqdīr, aw, lam yujaz al-taqdīr, wa-law quddirra bi-al-fiʻl jahlan bi-al-qawāʻid, naḥwa Zaydun qāma, fa-innahu lā yajūzu, inna aṣlahu qāma Zaydun, fa-quddima, li-annahu yakūnu idhā ukhkhira fāʻilan lafẓan lā maʻnan, fa-yalzamu ʻalá kawn aṣlihi Zaydun qāma, qāma Zaydun, taqdīm al-fāʻil al-lafẓī, wa-huwa lā yajūz."

record.title: 880-02 al-Sirr al-maṣūn wa-al-jawhar al-maknūn : manuscript / Aḥmad al-Bujayrī.
record.note: Title from folio incipit (folio 2a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-karīm al-wahhāb, al-ʻālim bi-mā taḥt tukhūm al-arḍ wa-mā fawqa al-saḥāb, fa-lā yaghrubu ʻanhu mithqāl dharrah fī al-samāwāt wa-lā fī al-arḍ, wa-lā aṣghar min dhālika wa-lā akbar, illā fī kitāb mubīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Aḥmad al-Bujayrī: Innī iṭṭalaʻtu ʻalá ḥizb Shaykhinā ... ḥujjat al-Ṣūfīyah wa-Imām al-Sādah al-Naqshabandīyah, Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Bayyūmī, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Damirdāshī firqatan, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan ... fa-aḥbabtu an aʻmala mukhtaṣaran fīhi ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-'al-Sirr al-maṣūn wa-al-jawhar al-maknūn' ..."
Secundo folio: quṭb dāʼirat al-wujūd wa-ʻayn naẓar al-shuhūd.
12.5 x 17.7 cm; written surface: 9 x 12.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.

Text ends with the following verses: "... Wa-kam min ṣaghīrin ṣādafathu ʻināyatun // mina Allāhi fa-iḥtājat ilayhi al-akābiru. Tawaqqaw nufūsan shubbiʻat [baʻda] jawʻatin // fa-lā shabiʻat fa-al-jūʻu fīhā muʼaththiru. Wa-ḥayyū nufūsan juwwiʻat baʻda shabʻatin // fa-law jūwiʻat fa-al-ṭabʻu lā tataghayyaru."
Colophon: "Tamma bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the help of God and His abundant benevolence. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Tajrīd : manuscript / Ḥabīb Allāh Mīrzā Jān al-Shīrāzī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Sh. Lā shakka fī wujūd mawjūd. Ah. Qīla ʻalayhi: Hādhā al-tardīd qabīḥ, idh al-mawjūd al-ghayr al-mashkūk fīhi mumkin bilā shubhah, fa-lā yaḥtamilu an yakūna wājiban kamā qīla wājib, bi-annahu kamā lā shakka fī wujūd mumkin lā shakka fī wujūd mūjidihi, idh mūjid al-mawjūd mawjūd badīhatan, wa-ʻalayhi madār jamīʻ al-barāhīn, wa-mūjiduhu yaḥtamilu an yakūna wājiban bi-lā shubhah ..."
Secundo folio: jaʻala al-tardīd fī ṭabīʻat al-mawjūd.
13 x 18.7 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13.5 cm; 14 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on laid paper; some commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the front edge: "Ḥāshiyat Mullā Mīrzājān Sharḥ Tajrīd."
At the head of the flyleaf: "Ḥāshiyat Mullā Mīrzā Shīrāzī ʻalá Ḥāshiyat Tajrīd."
On the flyleaf: "Ilāhīyāt. Samʻ."
On the flyleaf: "Ḥāshiyah-i Mullā Mīrzā Khān bar Sharḥ-i Tajrīd."
On the flyleaf (in purple): "al-Tawḥīd = Allāh. Qudrah = Irādah. Ghiná = Samʻ, Baṣar, Wujūd, Ṣifāh [Ṣifāt]."
On the flyleaf: An ownership statement: "Āqā ʻAlī mālikuhu Muḥammad Bahān."

On the flyleaf a gift statement, dated in the year 1335 of the Hijrah (1916/1917), as follows: "Hadīyat mukhliṣ li-mukhliṣ fī Allāh (Tawḥīd wa-awwaluhu) Ḥāshiyat Mullā Mīrzā Khān bi-Sharḥ al-Tajrīd, bi-khaṭṭ ʻAlī ibn Mālik ibn Bahān al-Hindī al-Ḥanafī ʻām 1189 Hijrīyah [1775/1776]. Katabahu khādim al-ʻilm al-sharīf Shiḥātah Salām al-Sharqāwī al-Ḥanafī. Murjib al-gharaḍ. 1335 Hijrīyah."
On the flyleaf: A registration number (in purple): "Musajjal, numrah musl 833 = T .. H .."

At the head of folio 133b: A gift statement (in purple), as follows: "Hadīyah min Muḥammad Afandī Ḥusayn Shaltūt ilá Muḥammad Shiḥātah, fī 23 Rajab, ʻām 1335, al-Thulāthāʼ [Tuesday, 15th May 1917]. Muḥarrar fī 18 Rajab, sanat 1189 [14 September 1775], ṭibq al-tārīkh al-mumazzaq, ʻafwan. Kā[tibuhu] Muḥammad Shiḥātah Salām."
On folio 134a: Names of two readers/owners: "Min Ḥusayn muwaẓẓaf bi-al-Dākhilīyah. Muḥammad Shiḥātah muwaẓẓaf bi-Dāʼirat al-Taʻlīm al-Ṣināʻī wa-al-Tijārī."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-al-ḥāl innahu maʻdūm, lā wujūd la-hu aṣlan, aw, yaqūlu bi-thubūt la-hu ʻalá naḥwin min al-anḥāʼ, fī mawṭin min al-mawāṭin, min tilqāʼ nafsih bi-dūn ilqāʼ aḥad min ahl al-waswasah qarīb min al-mukābarah, wa-laʻalla hādhā al-madhhab aslam, wa-fīhi al-khalāṣ min mafāsid al-ʻilm al-ijmālī, wa-thubūt al-maʻdūmāt, wa-mā fī al-madhāhib al-maʼthūrah min asāṭīn al-ḥikmah min qiyām al-ṣuwar al-ʻilmīyah bi-dhātihi taʻālá, aw, bi-jawhar mujarrad, huwa al-mubdiʻ al-awwal la-hu, taʻālá, mimmā sabaqa tafṣīluhu, wa-kak [wa-kadhālika] mā sa-yajīʼu min ḥuḍūr al-ashyāʼ bi-aʻyānihā. Tam. Tam. Tam. Tam."

record.title: 880-02 al-Tanbīh wa-al-irshād : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Mūsá al-Kalbī.
record.note: Title from inside the front cover.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... Bayna anna al-kulla ṣunʻu al-Maliki // jalla ʻani al-andād wa-al-mushāriki. Wa-shahid al-Nabīyu bi-al-ʻadālati // li-man yuqīmu al-ḥaqqa bi-al-dalālati. Yanfūna ʻan dīni al-Nabīyi al-Mursali // taʼwīla kulla jāhilin wa-mubṭili. Wa-nashaʼat baʻda al-Nabīyi firaqun // zādat ʻalá al-sabʻīna ḍallū fa-shaqaw ..."
Secundo folio: wa-dhāka anna kulla ʻilmin maʻrifah.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 11-12.5 x 18-19.5 cm; 15-19 lines per page.
Binding: In light green cardboard; red cloth on spine.
In clear large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; some leaves seem to be missing between folios 10 and 11; catchwords.
Inside the front cover: "al-Ḥajjājīyah, wa-ismuhā 'al-Tanbīh wa-al-irshād', wa-hiya lil-Imām Abī al-Ḥajjāj, fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd."
Endowment statements on folios: 11a, 27a, 40a: "Waqf lillāh taʻālá."
Collation statements on the lower left margin of folios 23a, 27a, 29a, and 44a: "Balaghat muqābalatan bi-ḥamd Allāh", or, "Balaghat muqābalatan."
On the lower left margin of folio 45a: "Tammat wa-bi-[al-khayr] ʻammat. Hādhā ākhir [...] al-mubārak."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with the following verses: "... Wa-khayru mā yuḥfaẓu fī dhā al-ʻilmi // li-jamʻihi wa-ḥusnihi fī al-naẓmi. Risālat al-Shaykhi Abī al-Ḥajjāji // idh shāḥanat bi-al-ʻilmi bi-iḥtijāji. Wa-fī uṣūli al-fiqh ʻayn al-nājibi // aʻnī bi-hi Mukhtaṣaru Ibni al-Ḥājibi. Thumma Khulāṣatu al-Imām al-Māliki // wa-baʻdu al-talkhīṣu [wa-baʻduhu Talkhīṣu] Nahji al-sāliki ..."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Dīwān Ibn al-Fāriḍ : manuscript / al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-Būrīnī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣaddun ḥamá ẓamaʼī lamāka limādhā // wa-hawāka qalbī ṣāra minhu jadhādhā. al-Ṣadd maṣdar. Ṣadda fulānan ʻan kadhā manaʻahu. Wa-ḥamá bi-maʻná manaʻa. Wa-al-lamá muthallath al-lām, sumrah al-shifah, wa-al-murād hunā mā yujāwiruhu min al-rīq, bi-qarīnat al-ẓamā. Wa-al-jadhādh muthallath al-jīm, ism maṣdar min jadhdha bi-maʻná qaṭaʻa qaṭʻan mustaʼṣilan. Wa-al-ṣadd mubtadaʼ, wa-tankīr al-taʻẓīm fīhi, maʻa kawn al-maqām lil-shikāyah ..."
Secundo folio: al-ṣabābah al-shawq aw riqqatuh.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 10-22 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine, flap, and the edges of the cover.

In fair naskh script; in black ink, on laid paper; some leaves written in different hands; some of the verses of the "Dīwān" in red; few notes on the margins; some wormholes with loss of text; catchwords.
On the label pasted to the spine (in red): "Sharḥ Dīwān al-Sayyid ʻUmar. Kitāb awwal. Khaṭṭ."
On folio 1a: "Sharḥ Dīwān Sayyid ʻUmar." "Qīmat 112."
Text folios 1b-131b.
On folio 232a: Two pieces of poetry (three and two verses respectively).
Folios 232b-233a are blank.
On folio 233b: Nine verses of didactic poetry.
Folio 234 is blank.

Colophon: "Intahá sharḥ shiʻr al-Shaykh al-Ustādh al-Fāriḍī Sharaf al-Dīn ʻUmar, raḥimahu Allāh raḥmatan wāsiʻah, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá al-Muslimīn min barakātih, wa-nafaʻanā bi-ṣāliḥ daʻawātih. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah baʻda al-ʻishā al-akhīrah, min laylatin yusfiru ṣabāḥuhā ʻan nahār al-Khamīs al-mubārak, al-khāmis min shahr Shawwāl, min shuhūr sanat khams wa-arbaʻīn wa-alf, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-fānī ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥulwānī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-ikhwānihi wa-muḥibbīhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn wa-sallam. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm. Wa-lillāh al-ḥamd wa-al-minnah."

Translation of the colophon: "The commentary on the poetry of al-Shaykh al-Ustādh al-Fāriḍī Sharaf al-Dīn ʻUmar is completed. May God have abundant mercy upon him, bestow upon us and the Muslims of his blessings, and benefit us of his righteous benedictions. This blessed copy was completed after the last evening prayer, of the night whose morning is blessed Thursday, the fifth of the moth of Sahawwal̄, of the year 1045 [of the Hijrah = 13 March 1636], by the hand of the perishing servant ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥulwānī, may God forgive him, his parents, his shaykhs, his brethren, his loved ones, and all Muslims. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, on his family and all his companions, and grant them peace. It is finished. It is finished. It is finished. Praise and gratitude be to God."

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad Mullā Ḥanafī.
record.note: 1. Title of al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah from reference sources.
2. Title of Ḥāshiyat Jād al-Mawlá supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Laka al-ḥamd. Jaʻala Allāh taʻālá mukhāṭaban, tanbīhan ʻalá al-qurb, wa-li-anna al-lāʼiq bi-ḥāl al-ḥāmid an yulāḥiẓ al-maḥmūd awwalan, ḥāḍiran wa-mushāhadan, thumma yaḥmaduhu, wa-istabān minhu wajh taqdīm qawlihi 'laka' ʻalá 'al-ḥamd', wa-in kāna al-muqām, li-kawnihi muqām al-ḥamd, yaqtaḍī taqdīmahu, wa-yaṣiḥḥu an yakūna al-taqdīm lil-taʻẓīm wa-al-sharaf, wa-an yakūna li-taʼkīd al-ikhtiṣāṣ ..."
Secundo folio of al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah: bi-al-mann madfūʻ bi-anna al-manhī ʻanhu.

2. Incipit of Ḥāshiyat Jād al-Mawlá: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitābatuhā bi-al-midād al-aswad, yufīdu annahā basmalah. al-Shr[ḥ], fa-yakūnu qad ḥadhafa basmalat al-muṣa[nnif], li-ʻadam takallumihi ʻalayhā dawman lil-ikhtiṣār, wa-li-anna gharaḍahu al-iqtiṣār ʻalá al-basmalah. Fa-law atá bi-basmalat al-muṣa[nnif] la-kānat ʻaqiba basmalatihi, li-ʻadam al-fāṣil baynahumā bi-al-ḥamd wa-mā fuqid, maʻa anna hādhā laysa shaʼn al-muṣannifīn, wa-innamā iqtaṣara ʻalá al-basmalah, wa-lam yaʼti bi-khuṭbah mushtamilah ʻalá mā marra, kamā huwa shaʼn al-muṣannifīn ..."
Secundo folio of Ḥāshiyat Jād al-Mawlá: yutaṣawwaru taʻadduduhu bi-al-nisbah ilayhimā.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface for the first manuscript: 6 x 12 cm; 17 lines per page. Written surface for the second manuscript: 11 x 17 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; black cloth on spine and flap. The first manuscript is in one quire; the second manuscript is in three numbered quires.

The first manuscript is in fair naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; the phrases of "al-ʻAḍudīyah" in purple; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords. The second manuscript is in fair naskh script, in black ink on thick laid paper; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On the first inserted card: "[al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah]. Incip. Laka al-ḥamd. Jaʻala Allāh taʻālá mukhāṭaban tanbīhan ʻalạ al-qurb ..." (typewritten in Arabic script), and in Roman script (in pencil): "[Al-Risālah al-Hanafīyah]. M. al-Tibrīzī al-Hanafī, d. 900/1494. cmt. on Risāalah fī Ādāb al-BaḥT, by al-Ījī, d. 756/1355. GAL II 267 (no. 2) marginal glosses dat. 1290 H (11-40)."
On the second inserted card (in pencil): "Second part unidentified", and handwritten in Arabic script: "Jād al-Mawlá."
On folio 1a: "Hādhā sharḥ ʻalá Munlā Ḥanafī ʻalá Ādāb al-baḥth lil-ʻIṣām."
On folio 1a: Four pieces of poetry (in 2, 3, 2, and 2 verses respectively) the first piece is on studying and acquiring knowledge, the last three are "ghazal" (love poetry).

On folio 11a: "Ḥāshiyat al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá, Sayyidī wa-Mawlāy, al-Shaykh Jād al-Mawlá, razaqahu al-saʻādah wa-al-ḥusná wa-ziyādah. Āmīn. Bi-jāh Sayyid al-Mursalīn. M." And in pencil: "Taʼlīf Mawlānā al-Shaykh Jād al-Mawlá, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn." And in pencil also: "al-Hāshimī al-Ḥanafī al-Zahrī [probably al-Azharī, al-massāḥ [?] bi-al-Azhar al-Sharīf, wa-mudarris al-funūn al-ʻArabīyah."
al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah ends with: "... fa-kayfa yakūnu al-ʻaqlī malzūman, wa-al-naqlī ghayr malzūm. Wa-bi-al-jumlah, al-farq laysa ʻalá mā yanbaghī."
Author's colophon of al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah: "Wa-li-nakhtim al-kalām ʻalá hādhā al-qadr liallā yanjarra ilá al-imlāl."
Translation of the author's colophon of al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah: "Let us conclude our discourse with this amount lest it is driven into boredom."

Copyist's colophon of al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. M. Tamma bi-ʻawn Allāh ʻalá yad Aḥmad Yūsuf, ākhir Yawm al-Sabt, al-muwāfiq 2 J, sanat 1290."

Translation of the copyist's colophon of al-Risālah al-Ḥanafīyah: "Praise be to God alone. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and on his companions, and grant them abundant peace. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. M. It was completed by the help of God, by the hand of Aḥmad Yūsuf, at the end of Saturday, of 2 J [Jumādá al-Thāniyah], of the year 1290 [of the Hijrah = 26 July 1873]."

Ḥāshiyat Jād al-Mawlá ends with: "... Wa-li-nakhtim bināʼan ʻalá al-mashhūr ʻinda al-nuḥāh min jawāz ʻaṭf al-inshāʼ ʻalá al-khabar wa-ʻaksihi, lā ʻalá madhhab al-bayānīyīn al-māniʻīn la-hu, fīmā lā maḥalla la-hu min al-iʻrāb, kamā hunā. Wa-ʻalá madhhabihim yuḥmalu al-awwal ʻalá al-ikhbār majāzan, aw, al-thānī ʻalá al-inshāʼ kadhālika, aw, najʻalu al-wāw ḥālīyah, aw, li-ʻaṭf al-qiṣṣah ʻalá al-qiṣṣah, min ghayr iʻtibār al-ikhbārīyah wa-al-inshāʼīyah. Li-hādhihi, mutaʻalliq bi-maḥdhūf ṣifah, ay, al-kāʼinah li-hādhihi al-risālah. Limā lāḥaẓtahā, ay, taʼammaltahā. Quddisa sirruhu, ay, ṭuhhira maḥall sirrihi, wa-huwa al-qalb majāzan mursalan, min iṭlāq al-ḥāl wa-irādat al-maḥall. Tammat. Tammat. Tammat."

Colophon of Ḥāshiyat Jād al-Mawlá: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naqlihā min musawwadat al-muʼallif al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Jād al-Mawlá, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi, yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, min awākhir Ṣafar, sanat 1257 min Hijrat al-Muṣṭafá, Ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻaẓẓam. wa-sharraf, wa-majjad. wa-karram. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi, kullamā dhakarak al-dhākirūn, wa-ghafala ʻan dhikrihi al-ghāfilūn."

Translation of the colophon of Ḥāshiyat Jād al-Mawlá: "The transcription of [the copy] from the rough draft of the author, the learned Shaykh Jād al-Mawlá, may God Almighty have mercy upon him and benefit us by him, was completed on blessed Sunday, at the end of Ṣafar, of the year 1257 of the Hijrah of al-Muṣṭafá [18 April 1841], may God pray on him, grant him peace, glorify, honor, extol, and exalt Him. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the Illiterate Prophet, and on his family, whenever You [God] are mentioned by those who remember, and whenever the heedless forget to mention Him [Prophet Muḥammad]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Shamsīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of volume 1: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi <ālihi> wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Khayr mā yuqaddamu bi-al-wujūb min al-kalām fī al-ḥāfirah, wa-barr mā yutawassalu bi-hi ilá istinjāḥ al-marām fī al-mughābarah ḥamd man taḥayyarat al-ʻuqūl fī idrāk huwīyatih, wa-iʻtarafat al-manhá [al-nuhá] bi-ʻajz al-ʻirfān bi-kāmil ulūhīyatih, wa-Huwa alladhī lā yataṣawwaruhu wahm wa-lā khayāl, wa-lā yaḥṣuruhu ḥadd wa-lā mithāl, fa-naḥmaduhu ʻalá mā jaʻalanā mimman yahtadī bi-al-fikr al-shahīm ilá istiṭlāʻ ṭāliʻ al-maʻlūm wa-al-taḥqīqāt, wa-istikshāf al-astār ʻan wujūh al-taʻmīmāt wa-al-tadqīqāt ..."
Secundo folio of volume 1: al-raʼy al-thābit ʻalá mā qīl.

Incipit of volume 2: Text starts with: "... min baʻḍihā ilá baʻḍ, wa-bi-mulāḥaẓatihā ʻalá dhālika al-wajh tatarattabu ṣuwaruhā fī al-dhihn, fa-yuʼaddī tilka al-mulāḥaẓah ilá mulāḥaẓat maʻlūm ākhar wa-ḥuṣūl ṣūratihi fīhi, fa-al-mulāḥaẓah bi-al-dhāt Ḥ huwa al-maʻlūmāt wa-ṣuwaruhā ālat al-mulāḥaẓah ..."
Secundo folio of volume 2: al-iʻtiqād al-jāzim al-muṭābiq al-thābit wa-huwa al-ʻilm al-yaqīnī.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.5 cm; 14-18 lines per page.
Binding: The two volumes are unbound. Volume one is in four quires (numbered 1, 2, 4, 6). Volume two is in 26 quires (numbered 7-34. Quires 27 and 33 are missing).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on laid paper; the phrases of "Sharḥ al-Shamsīyah" in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a of volume 1: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Quṭb ʻalá al-Shamsīyah, raḥimahu Allāh, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."
On folio 1a of volume 1: "Karārīs hādhā al-kitāb ʻadad 34."

On folio 1a of volume 1: An ownership statement: "Milk [... ... ...] al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá [...] Aḥmad al-Hāshimī al-Ḥanafī al-Azharī [... ... ...] ṭālib al-ʻilm bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azhar [... ... ...] ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi. wa-li-man [...] la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

The author seems to have written his treatise for the benefit of a high dignitary: "Muṣṭafá Chalabī ibn Ibrāhīm, al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Imām, jaʻala Allāh dawlatahu thābitah al-arkān wa-rāsikhat al-bunyān ..."

Colophon of volume 1: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... fa-in qulta: Qāla baʻḍuhum fī taʻrīf al-fikr, huwa tartīb ʻulūm, wa-al-ẓāhir min kalām al-sharḥ anna al-murattab maʻlūm, qultu: Lā shakka anna al-gharaḍ lā yaḥṣulu illā bi-kawn al-tartīb fī al-ʻulūm, fa-innaka [in] fattashta ḥālaka fī al-naẓar wajadta annka fī tilka al-ḥālah tulāḥiẓu al-umūr al-maʻlūmah ʻalá tartīb muʻayyan, wa-tantaqil min baʻḍihā ..."

Colophon of volume 2: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-istiʻmāl al-alfāẓ al-majāzīyah ardá min istiʻmāl al-alfāẓ al-mushtarakah H li-tabādur al-dhihn fī al-awwal ilá ghayr al-maʻānī al-maqṣūdah lawlā al-qarīnah bi-khilāf al-thānī, fa-inna fīhi taraddud bayna al-maqṣūd H wa-ghayrihi, fa-huwa ardá min istiʻmāl al-alfāẓ, idh lā yufhamu minhā shayʼ aṣlan, fa-al-khilāfīyah thubūt al-iḥtiyāj ilá al-istifsār, fa-yaṭūlu al-masāfah bi-lā ṭāʼil. Wa-Allāh taʻālá al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Minhāj al-ṭālibīn : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... taṭwīluhā kamā qāla Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ. Thabata fī al-Ṣaḥīḥayn, fī ṣalātihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, li-kusūf al-Shams, min Ḥadīth Abī Mūsá wa-lafẓihi, fa-ṣallá bi-aṭwal qiyām wa-rukūʻ wa-sujūd mā raʼaytuhu qaṭṭ yafʻaluhu fī ṣalātihi. Wa-min Ḥadīth ʻĀʼishah wa-lafẓihā, fī Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī, fī al-rakʻah al-ūlá, fa-sajad sujūdan ṭawīlan, wa-fī al-thāniyah, thumma sajad, wa-huwa dūna al-sujūd al-awwal. Wa-fī Ṣaḥīḥ Muslim: Mā rakaʻtu rukūʻan qaṭṭ, wa-lā sajadtu sujūdan qaṭṭ kāna aṭwala minhu. Wa-dhakara al-Rāfiʻī anna taṭwīl al-sujūd fī Ṣaḥīḥ Muslim. Wa-naṣṣa fī al-Buwayṭī annahu yuṭawwiluhā naḥwa al-rukūʻ qablahā. Wa-Allāh aʻlam ..."
Secundo folio: wa-yukhrijūn al-ṣibyān wa-al-shuyūkh.
21 x 30.5 cm; written surface: 14 x 22 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound, accompanied by a board from another item with embossed central medallion.
In clear medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Minhāj in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with part of Kitāb al-Jiʻālah (Book of wages), as follows: "... fa-law ʻamila al-ʻāmil bilā idhn, aw adhina li-shakhṣ faʻamila ghayrahu, fa-lā shayʼa la-hu. Naʻam, law kāna al-ghayr ʻabd al-maʼdhūn la-hu istaḥaqqa al-maʼadhūn la-hu al-juʻl, li-anna yad ʻabdihi yaduhu. Wa-law qāl man radda abqá fa-la-hu kadhā, fa-raddahu man lam yablughhu badāʼuhu [nidāʼuhu] lam yastaḥiqq shayʼan. Fa-law qāla in raddahu Zaydun fa-la-hu kadhā, fa-raddahu Zaydun ghayra ʻālimin bi-idhnihi, lam yastaḥiqq shayʼan. Wa-law adhina fī al-radd, wa-lam yashriṭ ʻiwaḍan fa-lā shayʼa lil-rādd. Wa-ẓāhirun anna man ..."

record.title: 880-02 Natāʼij al-fikr wa-thamar al-muʼallafāt ʻalá al-Sharḥ al-ṣaghīr li-Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah Aḥmad al-Mullawī ʻalá al-Samarqandīyh fī al-istiʻārāt : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Yūnus al-Khulayfī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi al-tawakkul fī kull al-umūr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣa al-insān bi-maʻrifat al-daqāʼ́iq, wa-aslaka subul al-majāzāt wa-ṭuruq al-ḥaqāʼiq. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-murashshaḥ bi-al-dalāʼil wa-al-āyāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīn ḥāzū aḥsan al-faḍāʼil wa-ashraf al-kamālāt. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu aysar [asīr] al-khaṭāyā wa-al-dhallāt [wa-al-zallāt], Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Yūnus al-Khalīfī al-Shāfiʻī, ḍāʻafa Allāh la-hu al-darajāt: Hādhihi ʻibārāt sharīfah wa-taḥqīqāt munīfah iqtaṭaftuhā min thamar al-muʼallafāt wa-badāʼiʻ al-taḥqīqāt, tūḍiḥu al-khafī bi-adná ishārah, wa-tubayyin al-murād bi-awjaz ʻibārah, wa-sammaytuhā 'Natāʼij al-fikr wa-thamar al-muʼallafāt ʻalá al-Sharḥ al-ṣaghīr li-Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah Aḥmad al-Mullawī ʻalá al-Samarqandīyh fī al-istiʻārāt' ..."
Secundo folio: waṣfān la-hu taʻālá.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: The eight numbered quires are between two pieces of cardboards.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on laid paper; some markings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the front cardboard (in pencil): "Natāʼij al-fikr wa-thamar al-muʼallafāt."
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Aḥmad Yūnus al-Mullawī ʻalá al-Samarqandīyah bi-al-tamām, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl wa-al-salām. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: A washed out page with a remnant of colophon of an unidentified work: "... taḥrīran fī yawm al-thulāth, rābiʻ [probably sādis] shahr Jumād Ākhar, min shuhūr sanat 1198, alf wa-[miʼah] thamāniyah wa-tisʻīn [of the Hijrah = 27 April 1784] ... ... ..."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-istuʻīra ism al-māʼ lil-nabāt alladhī huwa ghidhāʼ al-ḥayawān, bi-jāmiʻ al-nafʻ fī kull, wa-istuʻīra ism al-māʼ lil-nabāt shibh rādif al-māʼ, wa-huwa al-ghawr lil-māʼ fī al-arḍ, ay, dhawabānuhu fīhā bi-rādif al-mushabbah bi-hi, wa-huwa al-balʻ, wa-istuʻīra al-balʻ lil-ghawr, wa-ishtuqqa min al-balʻ iblaʻī, bi-maʻná ghūrī, fa-iblaʻī istiʻārah taṣrīḥīyah, taḥqīqīyah, tabaʻīyah, qarīnah lil-maknīyah [space for one word] al-mufīdah, ay, li-kawn qarīnat al-maknīyah istiʻārah taḥqīqīyah [space for one word] min ḥayth, ilkh hiya ḥaythīyat taʻlīl, ay, shāʻa li-ajl tasmiyatihim ..."

record.title: 880-03 Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh : manuscript / Naṣr ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of the first copy of "Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā kitāb Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb 'Shurūṭ al-ṣalāh', wa-hiya thamāniyah. al-Awwal al-wuḍūʼ bi-al-māʼ al-ṭāhir wa-al-tayamum bi-al-turāb ʻinda ʻadam al-māʼ. Wa-al-thānī ṭahārat [ṭahārah] al-thawb ʻan al-najāsah al-khafīfah wa-al-ghalīẓah. Wa-al-thālith ṭahārat [ṭahārah] al-badan min al-minī wa-al-bawl wa-al-ghāʼiṭ wa-mā ashbahahā ..."
Secundo folio of the first copy of "Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh": wa-al-thālith ʻashr takbīrāt.

Incipit of the second copy of "Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh": "Hādhā kitāb Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-lā ʻudwān illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-Faqīh Abū al-Layth al-thamarqandī [al-Samarqandī], raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Iʻlam bi-anna al-ṣalāt [al-ṣalāh] farīḍah qāʼimah wa-sharīʻah thābitah, ʻurifat farīḍatuhā bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah wa-ijmāʻ al-ummah ..."
Secundo folio of the second copy of "Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh": wa-taʻālá amaranā bi-muḥāfaẓat khams ṣalawāt.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 18-20 cm; 12-15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with a flap; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords in purple; some text vocalized; catchwords.
On folios (56b-62b): Miscellaneous Ḥanafī issues in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish.
On folios (63a-64b): An invocation.

Colophon of the first copy of "Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Bāb 'al-Ghusl' al-masnūn ʻinda Abī Ḥanīfah, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu, arbaʻah: al-Awwal ghusl al-Jumʻah, wa-al-thānī ghusl al-ʻīdayn, wa-al-thālith ghusl al-iḥrām, wa-al-rābiʻ ghusl bi-ʻArafah. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam wa-aḥkam."

Colophon of the second copy of "Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh": "Tammat al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Wa-katabahu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat al-Ḥanafī [al-Ghanī], al-muḥtāj ilá Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, adām Allāh taʻālá wa-baqqāhu ilá al-Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-kāna farāgh Jumād Ukhrá."

Translation of the colophon of the second copy of "Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh": "The book was completed by the praise of God Almighty, His help, and His abundant benevolence. God Almighty is more knowledgeable of what is correct. Copied by the poor to the mercy of the Rich One, he who is in need of God Almighty, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, may God Almighty preserve and protect him until Judgment Day. It was completed in Jumād Ukhrá."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Sayf al-Mulūk wa-Badīʻat al-Jamāl : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Hādhihi Qiṣṣat Sayf al-Mulūk wa-Badīʻat al-Jamāl. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāt [wa-al-ṣalāh] wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, sayyid al-mursalīn wa-imām al-muttaqīn, ṣalātan [ṣalātan] wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna siyar al-awwalīn ṣārat ʻibratan lil-ākharīn, li-kay yará al-insān al-ʻibar allatī jarat li-ghayrihi fa-yaʻtabir, wa-yataʼammal fī ḥadīth al-umam al-sālifah fa-yanzajir ..."
Secundo folio: yaḥkumu ʻalá bilād Khurasān.
12.5 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 14.5 cm; 17-18 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; text within double purple frames; pages also numbered in East Arabic/Indian numerals (1-179); catchwords.
Colophon: "Waqaʻa al-farāgh minhā yawm al-Ithnayn, 14 Rabīʻ Awwal, sanat 1290, bi-qalam ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Yakhnī. Tammat."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed on Monday, 14 Rabīʻ Awwal, of the year 1290 [of the Hijrah = 12 May 1873], by the pen of ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Yakhnī. It is completed."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Ḥasan al-Baṣrī : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qiṣṣat [Qiṣṣah] Ḥasan al-Baṣrī, ʻammā dhukir, wa-hiya hādhihi, in shāʼ Allāh taʻālá: Dhukira, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-ghaybihi wa-aḥkam wa-alṭaf wa-arḥam, fīmā maḍā [maḍá] wa-taqaddam wa-salaf min aḥādīth al-umam bayna al-ʻArab wa-al-ʻAjam wa-al-Nabī al-muḥtasham ṣāḥb al-ḥawẓ [al-ḥawḍ] wa-al-ḥaram wa-al-maqām wa-al-shafāʻah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu kāna fī qadīm al-zamān wa-sālif al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān fī madīnat Khurāsān wa-ʻIrāq al-ʻAjam shābbun min baʻḍ al-shabāb, naqī al-athwāb ..."
Secundo folio: fa-lammā samiʻahu Ḥasan taḥarraka sāyir badanih.
11 x 15 cm; written surface: 9 x 13 cm; 12 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; folio 93 to end seem to be wrongly bound; catchwords.

The text ends with: "... wa-tammat. Wa-hādhihi mā atathā ilaynā min Qiṣṣat Ḥasan al-Baṣrī, bi-tamām [bi-al-tamām] wa-al-kamāl, wa-naʻūdu [wa-naʻūdhu] billāh min al-ziyādah wa-al-nuqṣān wa-al-ghalaṭ wa-al-nisyān. Wa-antum, Yā Siyyād, tumsū bi-al-khayr wa-al-saʻādah."

Colophon (folio 93b): "Wa-tamm, wa-billāh al-tawfīq. Wa-hiya bi-khaṭṭ al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-khāyif al-mustajīr, al-rājī ʻafwa Mawlāhu Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, ʻAlī ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh, wa-li-man qaraʼa wa-taraḥḥama la-hu. Āmīn. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-sīrah laylat al-Tinayn [al-Ithnayn] <fī> min shahr Shaʻbān, min al-ʻushr al-thānī, min sanat [sanah] alf wa-miʼah wa-aḥad ʻashar <sanah>. Wa-tamma dhālik, wa-katabnāhā fī bayt Aḥmad ibn al-Rāṣifīyah, jazā [jazāhu] Allāh ʻannā kull khayr."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed. Success comes from God. In the handwriting of the poor and wretched, the fearful seeking refuge, who aspires to the forgiveness of his Lord, Lord of the Universe, ʻAlī ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan, may God forgive him, his parents, and he who reads and invoke mercy upon him. Amen. Amen. O Lord of the Universe. This tale was completed on Monday night, on the second tenth of the month of Shaʻbān, of the year 1111 [of the Hijrah = 25 January 1700]. It was completed, and we wrote it at the house of Aḥmad ibn al-Rāṣifīyah, may God reward him all the best, on our behalf."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Dīwān Ibn al-Fāriḍ : manuscript / al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-Būrīnī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... ʻalá dīwānihi al-ʻajīb, al-jāmiʻ min ʻuqūd al-balāghah li-kull ʻiqd gharīb, li-kawnihi lam yushraḥ ʻalá sabīl al-ʻumūm, wa-lam yubayyan mā fī ḍimnihi min manṭūq wa-mafhūm, fa-ajabtuhu ilá suʼālihi, raghbatan fī duʻāʼihi al-maqbūl, wa-ṭamaʻan an antaẓima fī silk khidmat al-awliyāʼ al-fuḥūl, wa-anā in kuntu lam aẓfar min waṣfihim miqdār ḥabbah, fa-yakfīnī an udhkara, wa-law ʻalá sabīl al-majāz, min ahl al-maḥabbah ..."
Secundo folio: ramlatan wa-maḥallatan lil-qawm.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 14 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark reddish brown cardboard with flap; light green buckram on spine and flap.
The manuscript is written in different hands, in fair naskh/ruqʻah script; in black ink, on laid paper; the verses of the "Dīwān" in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the front of the flyleaf (in copia pencil): "Sharḥ al-Fāriḍ."
On the back of the flyleaf (in pencil): "[...] 7718 (al-Būrīnī). Lacunae 7/8, 78/79, 89/90, 96/97, 105/106, 129/130."
At the head of folio 1a (in red): "Juzʼ awwal. Kurrās awwal."
At the head of folio 130a (in red): "Juzʼ thānī. Kurrās awwal."
On folio 150a: Stamp of "Bashīr ibn Ḥamdū."
Colophon 1 (folio 279a): "Hādhā ākhir mā wajadtuhu min Sharḥ al-Dīwān min al-musawwadah alltī bi-khaṭṭ al-muʼallif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

Translation of Colophon 1: "This is the end of what I found in the rough draft of the Commentary on the Dīwān, in the handwriting of the author, may God Almighty have mercy upon him. Praise be to God alone."

Colophon 2 (folio 280a): "... alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat wāḥid wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, 1171, ʻalá [yad] kātibihi al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-qarīb al-mujīb, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-marḥūm al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Qammāḥ, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-kāffat al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. M." Under it a request to the reader in two verses of poetry: "Ayā qāriʼan khaṭṭī saʼaltuka daʻwatan // mina Allāhi lil-ʻabdi al-musīʼi bi-fiʻlaihi. Li-yaghfira lī dhanbī wa-yamḥū khaṭīyatī // wa-yarzuqanī rizqan muqīman bi-ahlihi."

Translation of Colophon 2: Translation of Colophon 2: "... the month which is of the year 1171 [of the Hijrah = 1757/1758], by the [hand] of its copyist, the poor wretched, who confesses his shortcoming and insufficiency, who aspires for the forgiveness of his close and answering Lord, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-marḥūm al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Qammāḥ, may God forgive him, his parents, and all Muslims entirely. Amen. Amen. Amen. M." Under it a request to the reader in two verses of poetry: "O reader who reads my handwriting, I request from you an invocation // to God for this servant, the offender in what he does. That He may forgive my shortcoming and erase my sin // and provide me a sustenance with those who deserve it."

Secundo folio: [raḥimakum] Allāh.
11 x 14 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 12 cm; 17-19 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown thin cardboard.

record.title: 880-03 Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrī : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sall. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Raʼīs Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī: Allāhumma innā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā ʻallamta min bayān wa-alhamta min al-tibyān, kamā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā asbaghta min al-ʻaṭāʼ wa-asbalta min al-ghiṭāʼ, wa-nalūdhu bi-ka min shirrat al-lasan wa-fuḍūl al-hadhar, ka-mā naʻūdhu bi-ka min maʻarrat al-lakan wa-fuḍūḥ al-ḥaṣar, wa-nastakfī bi-ka al-iftinān bi-iṭrāʼ al-mādiḥ wa-ighḍāʼ al-musāmiḥ, kamā nastakfī bi-ka al-intiṣāb li-izrāʼ al-qādiḥ wa-hatk al-fāḍiḥ ..."
Secundo folio: al-safāhah fī al-fukāhah.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5 cm; 12 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine, flap, and the edges of the cover.

In clear naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; headings and markings in red; some commentaries on the margins and interlinear; the last leaf seems to be replaced and written in a different hand; the leaves are numbered in East Arabic (Indian) numerals (1-168); some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrī, raḥmat Allāh taʻālá ʻalayh."

On folio 1a: Ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Milk kātibihā al-ḥaqīr Aḥmad ibn Abī [... ... ...]." 2. "Thumma ṣāra fī milk al-faqīr [... ... ...]." 3. "Dakhala fī milk al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi [... ... ...]."
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations in poetry and prose.
On folio 168b: Index of the titles of the fifty Maqamahs.

Author's colophon: "Qāla al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu: Hādhihi ākhir al-maqāmāt allatī anshaʼtuhā bi-al-ightirār, wa-amlaytuhā bi-lisān al-iḍṭirār, wa-qad uljiʼtu ilá an arṣadtuhā lil-istiʻrāḍ, wa-nādaytu ʻalayhā fī sūq al-iʻtirāḍ, hādhā maʻa maʻrifatī bi-annahā min saqṭ al-matāʻ, wa-mimmā yastawjibu an yubāʻ wa-lā yubtāʻ, wa-law ghashiyanī nūr al-tawfīq, wa-naẓartu ilá nafsī naẓara al-shafīq la-satartu ʻūwārī alladhī lam yazal mastūran, wa-lakin kāna dhālika fī al-Kitāb masṭūran. Wa-anā astaghfiru Allāh mimmā awdaʻtuhā min abāṭīl al-laghw wa-aḍālīl al-lahw, wa-astarshiduhu ilá mā yaʻṣimu min al-sahw wa-yaḥẓá bi-al-ʻafw, innahu ahl al-taqwá wa-ahl al-maghfirah wa-walī al-khayrāt fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Tammat wa-bi-al-khayr ʻammat."

Translation of the author's colophon: "al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī, may God Almighty be pleased with him, said: This is the last of the maqāmas which I conceitedly composed, and in the tongue of exigency dictated, as I was coerced to prepare them for display. I called out about them in the market of expostulation, though I knew they are worthless and something to be sold not to be bought. However, if I were to be engulfed in the light of success and look upon myself in the gaze of a compassionate, I should have covered my imperfection which was still hidden, but it was as if written in the Book. I ask God's forgiveness for what I introduced in them of nonsense prattle and falsehoods delusion. I seek His guidance to what protects from distraction and attains forgiveness. He is the source of piety and forgiveness, and the provider of blessings, here and in the Hereafter. It is completed. May it be well widespread."

3. Title of "al-Dalāʼil al-ʻaqlīyah wa-al-naqlīyah ʻalá wujūd Allāh" from folio 6b.
4. Title of "al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah" from reference sources.
5. Title of "Ḥizb al-Rifāʻī" supplied by the cataloger, based on the incipit.
6. Title of "Manāqib al-Rifāʻī" from the incipit (folio 23b)
7. Title of "Risālat al-Sūsī" from folio 29a.
8. Title of "Selections from Kitāb al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-ʻawāʼid " from incipit (folio 43b).
9. Title of "Firdaws al-ḥikmah" from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
