1. Incipit of "Waẓīfah": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Hādhihi 'Waẓīfat" [Waẓīfah] al-Shaykh Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Salām Lasmar [al-Asmar], nafaʻanā Allāh bi-ʻulūmihi. Āmīn. Bi-jāh Sayyid al-Awwalīn wa-al-Ākharīn. Lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, la-hu al-mulk wa-la-hu al-ḥamd, yuḥyī wa-yumīt, wa-Huwa ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr, ʻasharat marrāt ..."
1. Secundo folio of "Waẓīfah": Ashhadu an lā ilāha illā ant.

2. Incipit of Attributes of God, the messengers, and Prophet Muḥammad: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman. Wa-mimmā yajibu fī ḥaqq Mawlānā, jalla wa-ʻazz, ʻishrūn ṣifah, hiya: al-Wujūd wa-al-qidam, wa-al-baqāʼ, wa-al-mukhālafah lil-ḥawādith, wa-al-qiyām bi-al-nafs, wa-al-waḥdānīyah, wa-al-qudrah, wa-al-irādah, wa-al-ʻilm, wa-al-ḥayāh, wa-al-samʻ, wa-al-baṣar, wa-al-kalām ..."
2. Secundo folio of Attributes of God, the messengers, and Prophet Muḥammad: wa-al-bakam ḥaqīqatuhu ʻibārah ʻan nafy al-kalām.

3. Incipit of "al-Dalāʼil al-ʻaqlīyah wa-al-naqlīyah ʻalá wujūd Allāh": "al-Dalāʼil al-ʻaqlīyah wa-al-naqlīyah. al-Dalīl ʻalá wujūd Allāh ḥudūth al-ʻālam. Min al-ʻaql, law lam yakun mawjūdan la-kāna maʻdūman, wa-al-ʻadam ʻalá Allāh muḥāl. Wa-min al-naql: Fa-aynamā tuwallū fa-thamma wajhu Allāh, ay, wujūduhu. Wa-al-dalīl ʻalá anna Allāh qadīm, min al-ʻaql, law lam yakun qadīman la-kāna ḥādithan, wa-al-ḥudūth ʻalá Allāh muḥāl ..."
3. Secundo folio of "al-Dalāʼil al-ʻaqlīyah wa-al-naqlīyah ʻalá wujūd Allāh": wa-al-dalīl ʻalá qudratihi taʻālá.

4. Incipit of "al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-faqīh, al-Īmām [al-Imām], al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil, al-ʻārif, Tāj al-Dīn, Abū al-Faẓl [al-Faḍl] Aḥmad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanhu: Min ʻalāmat al-iʻtimād ʻalá al-ʻamal nuqṣān al-rajāʼ ʻinda wujūd al-zalal. Irādatuka al-tajrīd, maʻa iqāmat Allāh īyāka fī al-asbāb min al-shahwah al-khafīyah, wa-irādatuka al-asbāb maʻa iqāmat Allāh īyāka fī al-tajrīd inḥiṭāṭ ʻan al-himmah al-ʻalīyah ..."
4. Secundo folio of "al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah": al-nufūs, lā taṭlub minhu an yukhrijaka.

5. Incipit of "Ḥizb al-Rifāʻī": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Hādhā Ḥizb al-Shaykh al-ṣāliḥ, al-walī, al-zāhid, al-mukāshif ... al-Shaykh al-kabīr Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Rifāʻī, nafaʻanā Allāh barakātihi [bi-barakātih], wa-fawwaḥanā bi-asrārih, wa-huwa hādhā ..."
5. Secundo folio of Ḥizb al-Rifāʻī": bi-ṭallāʻ sirr shuhūd ẓulumāt al-maʻdūmāt.

6. Incipit of "Manāqib al-Rifāʻī": "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Wa-li-nadhkur manāqib al-Shaykh al-ṣāliḥ, sulṭān al-ʻārifīn, wa-qudwat al-sālikin, wa-shaykh al-muḥaqqiqīn, ṣāḥib al-karāmāt al-bāhirah, wa-al-aḥwāl al-shahīrah al-ṭāhirah ... man dhallat la-hu al-usūd, wa-khaḍaʻat la-hu summ al-afāʻī, shaykh al-mashāyikh, al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Kabīr, Abā al-Ḥasan al-Rifāʻī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātih, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá al-Muslimīn min nafāḥātih [nafaḥātih], wa-fawwaḥanā bi-asrārih. Āmīn ..."
6. Secundo folio of "Manāqib al-Rifāʻī": wa-farash al-sajjādah ʻalá al-māʼ.

7. Incipit of "Risālat al-Sūsī": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-sallam taslīman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-maḥmūd bi-kull jamīl, al-munʻim bi-kull jazīl, al-munazzah ʻan kull shabīh wa-mathīl, al-muqaddas ʻan kull naqṣ wa-tabdīl wa-ḥulūl wa-taʻaddud wa-taʻṭīl, ḥamda muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz ʻan wājib al-thanāʼ wa-al-ḥamd wa-al-qiyām bi-al-shukr, al-ghāyah lil-ḥamd, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá dhī al-aqwāl al-faṣīḥah wa-al-aʻmāl al-ṣaḥīḥah wa-al-aḥwāl al-ṣarīḥah, al-qāʼil al-dīn al-naṣīḥah ..."
7. Secundo folio of "Risālat al-Sūsī": ʻayban an takūna fīhi thalāthah.

8. Incipit of "Selections from Kitāb al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-ʻawāʼid": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Hādhihi baʻḍ min fawāʼid kitāb 'al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-ʻawāʼid' min taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Laṭīf al-Shīrājī al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi. Āmīn ... Naʼkhudhu in shāʼa Allāh, min al-fawāʼid alladhī twāfiqu gharaḍanā, ʻalá qadr al-imkān, wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb. al-Fāʼidah al-thāniyah wa-al-khamsūn ..."
8. Secundo folio of "Selections from Kitāb al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-ʻawāʼid": fīhā fa-innahu yustajābu la-hu.

9. Incipit of "Firdaws al-ḥikmah": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-fāḍil al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil, ʻAlī ibn Zayn, al-muʼallif li-hādhā al-kitāb: Inna madḥ al-khayr wa-al-jūd amran [amrun] tajtamiʻu ʻalayhi al-umam kulluhā, wa-man arāda manāfiʻ al-nās fa-huwa khayyir, wa-man jāda bi-mā ʻindahu fa-huwa jawwād. Wa-lam azal bi-mann Allāh wa-tawfīqih, uḥibbu al-khayr wa-ajūdu bi-maysūrih, wa-tasmū nafsī ilá mā huwa aʻamm lil-nās wa-abqá ʻalá wajh al-dahr mimmā nālathu minhu yadī, idh kāna afḍal al-khayr aʻammahu wa-adwamah ..."
9. Secundo folio of "Firdaws al-ḥikmah": ilá hādhihi al-ṣināʻah wa-ilá maʻrifat al-ṣāniʻ.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.
The first four manuscripts are written in fair Maghribī script, the last five are written in fair naskh script; headings and marking in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the flyleaf: "Ākhiruhu kitāb" (in copia pencil). "Kitāb al-Naṣāʼiḥ." "Muḥammad ibn Salamah ṭalaba khuṭbatahu Ḥanīfah bint Ḥasan min abūhā; Ibrāhīm ibn Zaynab ʻImrānī Āminah."
Folios 7b, 8b, 26a, 27b-28a are blank.
On folio 8a: Quotations in prose and poetry.
On folios 26b-27a: An incantation against the sting and poison of scorpions and snakes.
On folio 28b: Some of "al-Asmāʼ al-Ḥusná" (Beautiful Names of God) repeated in different arrangements, in six lines, and some calculations.
1. Colophon of "Waẓīfah": "Tammat wa-bi-al-khayr ʻammat. Intahá. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-karīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman."

1. Translation of the colophon of "Waẓīfah": "It is completed, may its goodness be well spread. It is completed. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, the noble Prophet, and on his family, and his companions, and grant them abundant peace."

2. Colophon of "Attributes of God, the messengers, and Prophet Muḥammad": "Qad intahat al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashrāf [ashraf] al-mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Fa-hādhā al-qadr yakfīn fī ḍabṭihā, in shāʼa Allāh, wa-al-naṣr min Allāh fī taqsīmihā, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

2. Translation of the colophon of "Attributes of God, the messengers, and Prophet Muḥammad": "The doctrines are completed. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. May God pray and grant peace to the noblest of the messengers, our Master Muḥammad, and to His family and all His companions. This amount is sufficient for me in adjusting it, God willing, victory comes from God in its arrangement. There is no power nor might except in God Almighty the All Powerful."

3. Colophon of "al-Dalāʼil al-ʻaqlīyah wa-al-naqlīyah ʻalá wujūd Allāh": No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-min al-naql, inna Allāh samīʻun baṣīr, wa-al-dalīl ʻalá baṣarihi taʻālá, min al-ʻaql, law lam yakun baṣīran la-kāna aʻmá, wa-al-ʻamá ʻalá Allāh muḥāl, wa-min al-naql mithl al-samʻ. Wa-al-dalīl ʻalá kalāmihi taʻālá, min al-ʻaql, law lam yattaṣif bi-al-kalām la-ittaṣafa bi-al-bakam, wa-al-bakam ʻalá Allāh muḥāl, wa-min al-naql, wa-kallama Allāh Mūsá taklīman."

4. Colophon of "al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah": "Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata [qūwah] illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Allāhumma Yā Rabb. Yāsayyid [Yā Sayyid] al-bashar. Ighfir lil-kātib, wa-al-qāriʼ, wa-man yaqr [yaqraʼ]."

4. Translation of the colophon of "al-Hikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah": "God is the granter of success. From Him I seek help. There is no power nor might except in God Almighty, the All Powerful. O God, O Lord, O Master of mankind, forgive the copyist/author, the reader, and him who reads [it for others]."
5. Colophon of "Ḥizb al-Rifāʻī": "Intahá al-Ḥizb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn ʻawnih ʻalá al-tamām, wa-al-ḥamd wa-al-shukr ʻalá al-Islām."
5. Translation of the colophon of Ḥizb al-Rifāʻī": "The blessed 'Ḥizb' is completed and concluded by the praise of God and His abundant benevolence. Praise and thanksgiving for [belonging] to Islam."

6. Colophon of "Manāqib al-Rifāʻī": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... fa-baynamā anā fī alaylah [al-laylah] al-thāniyah, raʼaytu rajul ṭawīl al-qāmah, ḥasan al-ṣūrah, thiyābuhu khuḍr, wa-lā adrī min ayna atá, fa-sallama ʻalayya wa-qāl: Qum. Fa-nahḍtu sāliman, fa-qāla lī: Anā al-Khiḍr, Yā Walī, ḥakama Allāh ʻalayka an lā takhruja min hādhihi al-baldah wa-tabqá bi-hā. Fa-qāl: Inhaḍ qāʼiman, fa-nahḍtu qāʼiman, fa-akhadhā [... ...] jihat al-mashriq, fa-tabiʻtuhu, fa-dakhala bī ilá dār arḍuhā ḥajar, wa-hiya kharāb, wa-ajsalanī [wa-ajlasanī], wa-qāl: Unẓurnī fī hādhā al-makān, fa-labithtu fīhi thalāthat ayyām aʻbudu Allāh taʻālá fī dhālika al-makān, fa-ʻaṭishtu, fa-qumtu, fa-raʼaytu fī wasaṭihā ḥajar wa-taḥtahu biʼr māʼ jamʻ, fa-lā ziltu ..."

7. Colophon of "Risālat al-Sūsī": No colophon. Text ends with an advice in seven verses of poetry (probably by al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī), as follows: "... Wa-laqad aḥsana al-shāʻir, yaqūlu: Lammā ʻafawtu wa-lam aḥqid ʻalá aḥadin // araḥtu nafsiya min hammi al-ʻadāwāti. Innī uḥayyi ʻadūan ʻinda ruʼyatihi // li-adfaʻa al-sharra ʻannī bi-al-taḥīyāti. Wa-uḥsinu al-bishra lil-insān abghaḍuhu // ka-annahu qad ḥashá qallbī masarrāti. Wa-lastu aslamu mimman lastu aʻrifuhu // fa-kayfa aslamu min ahl al-mawaddāti. al-Nāsu dāʼ́u dawāʼu al-nāsi tarkuhumu // wa-fī al-jafā lahumu qaṭʻu al-ukhūwāti. Fa-khāliqi al-nāsa wa-iṣbir mā baqīta wa-kun // aṣamma abkama aʻmá dhā taqīyāti."

8. Colophon of "Selections from Kitāb al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣalāh wa-al-ʻawāʼid": No colophon. Text end with: "... wa-kadhālika idhā katab hādhihi al-āyah 'Kadhālika yaṭbaʻu Allāh ʻalá qulūb alladhīna lā yaʻlamūn' ʻalá jild thaʻlab madbūghan yawm al-Sabt, fī nuqṣān al-Qamar, wa-jaʻalta al-jild fī al-māʼ alladhī yashrab minhu al-ʻadw, raʼayta al-ʻajab. IH."

9. Colophon of "Firdaws al-ḥikmah": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with part of "al-Maqālah al-rābiʻah, min al-nawʻ al-thānī: Fī tarbiyat al-aṭfāl wa-ḥifẓ al-ṣiḥḥah" (Fourth discourse, the second type: On raising up children and maintaining health), as follows: "... wa-in sāla min udhnihi ruṭūbah wuḍiʻa fīhā ṣūfah maghmūsah bi-al-māʼ wa-al-ʻasal, aw, zaʻfarān masḥūq bi-sharāb. Fa-in qalla labanuhā ughsilat [ightasalat] bi-māʼ ḥārr wa-sharibat bizr al-jarjīr wa-al-anīsūn wa-bizr al-jazar. Wa-in raqqa al-laban wadaʻat badanahā wa-ightadat bi-mā khaffa min al-ghidhāʼ, wa-tajannabat dukhūl al-ḥammām. Wa-in ghaluẓa al-laban sharibat sakanjabīn, wa-atʻabat badanahā, wa-ightadhat bi-ashyāʼ laṭīfah, mithl al-zūfā wa-al-ṣaʻtar al-jabalī wa-al-sharāb al-abyaḍ, fa-inna al-laban al-ghalīẓ rubbamā warratha ..."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī taḥqīq mā jāʼa ʻalá wazn mafʻal aw mifʻal : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
record.note: Title of "Risālah fī taḥqīq mā jāʼa ʻalá wazn mafʻal aw mifʻal" from folio 1a.
Title of "Risālat al-Jurjānī fī al-manṭiq" supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of "Risālah fī taḥqīq mā jāʼa ʻalá wazn mafʻal aw mifʻal": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Mannān, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-satara fī al-dārayn ʻuyūbahu: Hādhihi kalimāt tataʻallaqu bi-'Taḥqīq mā jāʼa ʻalá wazn mafʻal aw mafʻil", aw, naḥwihimā, maṣdaran, aw ism zamān aw makān. Hadānā Allāh ilá sawāʼ al-sabīl, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
1. Secundo folio of "Risālah fī taḥqīq mā jāʼa ʻalá wazn mafʻal aw mifʻal": yaʼrabu, ka-fariḥa, ay ʻaqala.

2. Incipit of "Risālat al-Jurjānī fī al-manṭiq": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Iʻlam inna lil-nafs al-nāṭiqah al-insānīyah, bi-iʻtibār mā yakhuṣṣuhā, qūwatayn, ʻāqilah wa-ʻāmilah, wa-al-ʻāqilah qūwah tantaqishu fīhā ṣuwar al-ashyāʼ ʻalá naḥw mā tanṭabiʻu fī al-mirʼāh, lākinna al-mirʼāh lā yaḥṣulu fīhā illā ṣuwar baʻḍ al-maḥsūsāt, aʻnī al-mubṣarāt, wa-al-qūwah al-mudrikah al-insānīyah tantaqishu fīhā ṣuwar jamīʻ al-ashyāʼ min al-maḥsūsāt wa-al-maʻqūlāt ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Risālat al-Jurjānī fī al-manṭiq": wa-tartīb al-muqaddimatayn ka-qawlinā al-ʻālam mutaghayyir.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 25-28 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script; in black ink, on thick paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālat al-ʻAllāmah al-Ṣabbān 'Fī taḥqīq mā jāʼa ʻalá wazn mafʻal aw mafʻil', aw, naḥwihimā maṣdaran, aw ism zamān aw makān. Wa-yalīhā Risālat al-ʻAllāmah al-Jurjānī fī al-manṭiq, raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bihimā. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
At the head of folio 3b: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

1. Colophon of "Risālah fī taḥqīq mā jāʼa ʻalá wazn mafʻal aw mifʻal": "Qāla muʼallifuhā, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Tammat ʻalá yad jāmiʻihā Muḥammad al-Ṣabbān, li-ʻashr layālin baqīna min Ramaḍān, sanat thamān wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf. Naqalnāhā min khaṭṭ al-fāḍil al-Shaykh al-Anbābī. Qāl: Wa-qad naqaltu hādhihi al-nuskhah min nuskhah manqūlah min nuskhat al-muʼallif, muqābalatan ʻalayhā."

1. Translation of the colophon: "Risālah fī taḥqīq mā jāʼa ʻalá wazn mafʻal aw mifʻal": "Its author, may God Almighty have mercy upon him, said: It was completed by its compiler Muḥammad al-Ṣabbān, ten nights remaining from Ramaḍān, of the year 1178 [of the Hijrah = 13 March 1765]. We copied it from the handwriting of the notable, al-Shaykh al-Anbābī, who said: I copied this copy from a copy transcribed from the copy of the author and collated with it."

2. Colophon of "Risālat al-Jurjānī fī al-manṭiq": "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maghribī al-Rūdānī tuḥfatan li-najl al-Imām al-humām Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Sayyidī Muḥammad ʻUlaysh, dhī al-baḥth wa-al-taftīsh, mattaʻanā Allāh bi-riḍāhu. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. Fī thāmin Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1285."

2. Translation of the colophon of "Risālat al-Jurjānī fī al-manṭiq": "This blessed copy was completed by the hand of the poor to God, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maghribī al-Rūdānī, as a gift to the son of the magnanimous Imām, our Learned Shaykh, the discerning sea, Sayyidī Muḥammad ʻUlaysh, who engages in research and searching, may God make us enjoy his approval. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad. Dated, 8 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, of the year 1285 [of the Hijrah = 29 July 1868]."

record.title: 880-02 Risālat Ithbāt al-wājib : manuscript / Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad al-Dāmād.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Subḥānaka Allāhumma. Yā man tafarrada bi-al-wujūb wa-al-wujūd, wa-ḥudda bi-ifāḍat al-khayr wa-al-jūd. Yā man tanazzaha ʻan mushābahat al-aʻrāḍ wa-al-ajsām, wa-tajarrada ʻan mulābasat al-abdān wa-al-ajrām. Wa-Yā man ḥārat fī kibriyāʼīyatihi daqāʼiq laṭāʼif al-afhām wa-al-khubrah, dūna idrākihi ʻaẓamat ḥaqāʼiq abṣār al-anām ..."
Secundo folio: wa-arshadanā ilá asmāʼika al-ḥusná.
12.3 x 21.4 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 13.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather; dark red leather on spine; cover embossed with purple central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.
In good naskh/taʻlīq script; in black ink, on thin paper; headings and markings in red; numerous inserts; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
At the upper left corner of folio 1a: "Risālat Ithbāt al-wājib, az muṣannafāt-i Mīr Bāqirīdāmād, ʻalayhi al-raḥmah."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-nuqila ʻan al-Muʻallim al-Awwal annahu lā sabīla fī al-Ilāhīyāt ilá al-yaqīn, wa-innamā al-ghāyah al-quṣwá fīhā al-akhdh bi-al-alyaq wa-al-awlá. Wa-iʻlamū innī, wa-in lam ablugh darajat al-taṣnīf, wa-lam yaḥṣul al-kalāmī [li-kalāmī] martabat al-taḥsīn wa-al-taz[yīn], lākin man naẓara fīhi bi-ʻayn al-qabūl wa-al-riḍā sa-yajidu fīhā ishārāt ilá fawāʼid wa-talwīḥāt ilá zawāʼid khalat ʻanhā al-kutub al-mutaʻārafah wa-al-zubur al-mutadāwalah [...] al-ifāḍah wa-ilayhi al-rujūʻ fī al-bidāyah wa-al-nihāyah, wa-minhu al-tawfīq, wa-bi-yadihi azimmat al-taḥqīq. Tamm. Tamm."

record.title: Treatises on Islamic doctrines : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud" from folio 1a.
2. Title of "Nafāis al-ʻanāṣir fī majālis al-Malik al-Nāṣir" from reference sources.
3. Title of "Mā jāʼa fī faḍl al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī" from incipit (folio 84a)
4. Title of "On Hell and Paradise" supplied by the cataloger.
5. Title of "Miscellaneous anecdotes" supplied by the cataloger.
6. Title of "Ṭarīq al-taqwá" from folio 99a.
7. Title of "Selections from the Ḥadīth" supplied by the cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā Fattāḥ. Yā ʻAlīm. Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam wa-aʻazz wa-akram wa-alṭaf wa-arḥam, fīmā maḍá wa-taqaddam wa-salafa min aḥādīth al-umam, annahu kāna bi-Baghdād rajul summiya Ibn Dīnār, la-hu qadr wa-miqdār, wa-huwa min al-tujjār al-kibār, wa-qad wassaʻa Allāh ʻalayhi dunyāh, wa-lam yarzuqhu min al-walad wa-al-dhurrīyah mimmā yatamannāh, fa-aqāma burhatan min al-zamān lam yarzuqhu Allāh shayʼan min al-banāt wa-lā min al-ṣibyān ..."
1. Secundo folio of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud": kamā yashāʼu khāliq al-khalq.

2. Incipit of "Nafāis al-ʻanāṣir fī majālis al-Malik al-Nāṣir". The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... baynahum, wa-kafá dhālida fī faḍīlat al-mashūrah dalīlan, wa-ilá nahj faḍlihā sabīlan, wa-qad qāla al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī mawāṭn kathīriah li-aṣḥābihi: Ashīrū ʻalayya. Wa-suʼila, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻan al-ḥazm, faqāl: An nastarshid. Wa-qāl, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Mā khāba man istakhār, wa-lā nadima man istashār. Wa-qāla, ʻalayhi al-salām: Mā shaqiya ʻabdun bi-mashūrah, wa-lā saʻida bi-istighnāʼ bi-raʼy. Wa-fī al-Tawrāt: Man lam yastashir fī amrihi nadim ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Nafāis al-ʻanāṣir fī majālis al-Malik al-Nāṣir": balagha min wāridāt al-ḥikam wa-musnadihā.

3. Incipit of "Mā jāʼa fī faḍl al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. 'Bāb Mā jāʼa fī faḍl al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī', ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Ruwiya ʻan Rasūl Allah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāl: Man ṣallá ʻalayya fī yawm khamsamiʼat ṣalāh lam yaftaqir abadan. Wa-ʻanhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: Man ṣallá ʻalayya fī yawm al-Jumʻah miʼat marrah ghufira lahu khaṭīʼat thalāthīn sanah. Wa-ʻanhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: Man ṣallá ʻalayya fī kitābin kataba, katab Allāh [la-hu] ʻalá mamarr al-ayyām afḍal al-ṣalāh. Wa-ʻanhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Man ṣallá ʻalayya fī laylat al-Jumʻah ṣalāh wāḥidah amara Allāh ḥāfiẓīhi an lā yuktaba ʻalayhi khaṭīʼah ilá al-Jumʻah al-ukhrá ..."
3. Secundo folio of "Mā jāʼa fī faḍl al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī": al-qabīḥ, fa-qāla la-hā fa-mā al-najāh minkī.

4. Incipit of "On Hell and Paradise": The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... ahl al-nār saḥābah ʻaẓīmah kull [yawm], fa-tanbasiṭu ʻalayhim, lahā ṣawāʻiq takhṭufu abṣārahum, wa-raʻd taqṣifu [yaqṣifu] ẓuhūrahum, wa-ẓulmah lā yubṣirūn maʻahā zabāniyatahum, fa-tunādī tilka al-saḥābah bi-ṣawt la-hā jahīr: Yā ahl al-nār, mā turīdūna umṭirukum, fa-yaqūlūn bi-ajmaʻihim: Amṭirnā [Amṭirīnā] al-māʼ al-bārid, fa-tumṭiruhum sāʻatan ḥijārah taqaʻu ʻalá ruʼūsihim fa-taqlaʻu jamājimahum, thumma tumṭiruhum sāʻah ukhrá anhāran min ḥamīm wa-jamran kathīran wa-shuwāẓan wa-khaṭāṭīf min ḥadīd, thumma tumṭiruhum sāʻatan ukhrá ḥayyāt wa-ʻaqārib wa-dūdan wa-ghislīn ..."
4. Secundo folio of "On Hell and Paradise": lābithūna fīhā aḥqāban fa-lā adrī.

5. Incipit of "Miscellaneous anecdotes": The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... fī al-majīʼ ilaynā, wa-jaʻala yazinu miʼah baʻda miʼah, ḥattá wazana alf Dīnār, fa-qāla la-hu al-rajul: Anā mā ākhudhu illā mā amaranī bi-hi Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-dhakara Abū ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Nuʻmān annahu samiʻa ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad ibn [?] yaqūlu: Aṣābanī wajaʻ fī yadī min waqʻah waqaʻtuhā fī ḥammām, fa-warimat yadī, fa-bittu laylatan mutawajjiʻan, fa-raʼaytu al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī al-manām, fa-qultu: Yā Rasūl Allāh, fa-qāla lī: Awḥshatnī ṣalātuka yā waladī. Fa-aṣbaḥtu, wa-qad zāla al-waram wa-al-wajaʻ bi-barakatihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."
5. Secundo folio of "Miscellaneous anecdotes": No secundo folio (the manuscript is one leaf only).

6. Incipit of "Ṭarīq al-taqwá": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-'Ṭarīq al-taqwá' awwalan, al-takhalluṣ min maẓālim al-ʻibād wa-ḥuqūqihim, thumma al-maʻāṣī wa-al-kabāʼir minhā wa-al-ṣaghāʼir, thumma al-ishtighāl bi-tark dhunūb al-qalb wa-uṣūlihā, fa-minhā yatafarraʻu dhunūb al-jawāriḥ, min al-riyāʼ, wa-al-nifāq, wa-al-ʻujb, wa-al-kibar, wa-al-ḥirṣ, wa-al-ṭamaʻ, wa-al-khawf min al-khalq wa-al-rajāʼ minhum, wa-al-jāh, wa-al-riyāsah, wa-al-taqaddum ʻalá abnāʼ jinsih, wa-ghayr dhālika mimmā yaṭūlu sharḥuhu ..."
6. Secundo folio of "Ṭarīq al-taqwá": ʻan waladihi wa-lā mawlūd.

7. Incipit of "Selections from the Ḥadīth": "... wa-rawá ʻUtbah bi-al-iḍāfah wa-al-jamʻ, wa-Khushbah, bi-al-tanwīn ʻalá al-ifrād. Waqawluhu: 'Mā lī arākum ʻanhā muʻriḍīn', yaʻnī ʻan hādhihi al-sunnah. Wa-ʻanhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻanhu wa-sallam, qāl: 'Man kāna yuʼminu billāh fa-li-yukrim ḍayfahu, wa-man kāna yuʼminu billāh wa-al-Yawm al-Ākhir fa-lā yuʼdhī jārahu, wa-man kāna yuʼminu billāh wa-al-Yām al-Ākhir fa-li-yaqul khayran aw li-yaskut', muttafaq ʻalayhi. Wa-ʻan Abī Shurayḥ al-Khuzāʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, anna al-Nabī, <ṣallá> ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: 'Man kāna yuʼminu billāh wa-al-Yam al-Ākhir fa-li-yuḥsin ilá jārihi, wa-man kāna yuʼminu billāh wa-al-Yawm al-Ākhir fa-li-yukrim ḍayfahu, wa-man kāna yuʼminu billāh wa-al-Yawm al-Ākhir fa-li-yaqul khayran, aw, li-yaskut', rawāhu Muslim bi-hādhā al-lafẓ wa-rawá al-Bukhārī baʻḍahu ..."
7. Secundo folio of "Selections from the Ḥadīth": thumma māt fī dhālika al-yawm.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: Binding deteriorated, exposing manuscript waste. Remnant of dark brown leather on spine.
In fair to good naskh script (ranging from small to large), in black ink, on white paper; some headings, phrases, and markings in red; some commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud wa-mā jará la-hā maʻa al-faqīh wa-al-muqrī wa-al-ṭabīb wa-al-munajjim wa-Ibrāhīm al-Nāẓim, bayan yaday Amīr al-Muʼminīn Hārūn al-Rashīd, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."
At the head of folio 1a (in pencil): "Jamāl Murād."

1. Colophon of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud": "Wa-hādhā ākhir al-ḥadīth, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá khayr khalqih, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-salāmuh. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman kathīran dāʼiman ilá Yawm al-Dīn."

1. Translation of the colophon of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud": "This is the end of the discourse. Praise be to God alone. May His prayers and peace be upon the best of his creatures, Muḥammad, his family and his companions. God suffices us. He is the best advocate. There is no power nor might except in God, the Almighty the All Powerful. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, and on his family and companions, and grant them abundant and continuous peace until Judgment Day."

2. Colophon of "Nafāis al-ʻanāṣir fī majālis al-Malik al-Nāṣir". No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Qāla Abū ʻAlī al-Qāḍī: Kuntu bayna yadī ʻAḍud al-Dawlah, wa-qad qāla li-Abī Bakr ibn Shāhawayh, wa-huwa min aṣḥāb Abī al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz: Tamḍī ilá Muḥammad al-Ḥaznabāzī, wa-taqūlu la-hu yamḍī ilá al-Baṣrah, wa-naḥnu nujrī laka maʻīshah tartaziqu minhā, fa-qad ṭāla tabaʻuka lanā wa-taʻabuka maʻanā, wa-qad tabarramnā bika, wa-laysa laka fī ḥaḍratinā mā tuḥibbuhu, wa-al-salāmah laka fī buʻdika ʻannā, wa-ṣāḥibunā Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz qad istaṣḥaba jamāʻah kathīrah, fī baʻḍihim ghunyah ʻan amthālik, fa-inṣarif ʻannā wāthiqan bi-mā nurattibuhu laka ..."

3. Colophon of "Mā jāʼa fī faḍl al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-yasmaʻu ahl al-samāʼ al-sābiʻah, fa-yaqūlūn: Ṣallá Allāh ʻalayka bi-hā sabʻat ālāf marrah. Wa-yaqūlu Allāh taʻālá: Daʻū, thawāb hādhā al-ʻabd, kamā ʻaẓẓama Nabī [al-Nabī] wa-ṣallá ʻalayhi bi-ṭībat qalbih, ʻalayya an aghfira la-hu kull dhanb. Wa-ʻan Anas, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Mā jalasa qawm majlisan fa-lam yadhkurū Allāh ʻazza wa-jall wa-lam yuṣallū ʻalá Nabīyihi illā kāna ʻalayhim ḥasrah wa-nadāmah ilā [ilá] Yawm al-Qiyāmah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam 'ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam' [written in a different hand]. Wa-qāl ..."

4. Colophon of "On Hell and Paradise": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... ḥattá idhā shabiʻa wa-iktafā ṣāra ṭayran kamā kān, fa-takhruju [fa-yakhruju] min al-bāb alladhī kāna dakhala minhu, fa-huwa ʻalá al-arāyikah, wa-zawjatuhu mustaqbilatuhu, yubṣiru wajhahu fī wajhihā min al-ṣafāʼ wa-al-bayāḍ, kullamā arāda an yujāmiʻahā naẓara ilayhā, fa-yastaḥī minhā an yadʻuwahā, fa-taʻlamu mā yurīdu minhā, fa-tadnū ilayhi, bi-abī wa-ummī irfaʻ raʼsaka wa-unẓur ilayya, fa-innaka al-yawm lī wa-anā laka, fa-yujāmiʻuhā ʻalá qadr qūwat miʼat rajul min al-awwalīn, wa-ʻalá shahwat arbaʻīn rajul, kullamā atāhā wajadahā ʻadhrāʼ lā yuqfilu ʻanhā miqdār arbaʻīn yawman, fa-idhā faragha wajada rīḥ al-misk minhā fa-yazdādu ḥubban la-hā. Wa-fīhā arbaʻat ālāf wa-thamānimiʼat zawjah mithālihā, li-kull zawjah sabʻūn khādiman. ʻAn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, karrama Allāh wajhahu, ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāl: Law anna jāriyatan aw khādiman ukhrijat ilá al-dunyā la-iqtatala ʻalayhā ahl al-dunyā kulluhum ḥattá yatafānaw, wa-law anna al-ḥūr al-ʻīn arkhat dhawāʼibahā ilá al-arḍ la-aṭfaʼat al-shams min nūrihā. Qīla ..."

5. Colophon of "Miscellaneous anecdotes". No colophon. The text ends with praising Prophet Muḥammad, as follows: "... al-ḥabīb al-akram, wa-al-jalīl al-aʻẓam, Sayyidinā Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib, wa-ʻalá sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, barakātuka sarmadan wa-azká, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-āl wa-al-ṣaḥābah ajmaʻīn, ʻadad maʻlūātika wa-midād kalimātika, kullamā dhakaraka al-dhākirūn wa-ghafila ʻan dhikrika al-ghāfilūn, fa-innahā ṣalāh maqbūlah ghayr mardūdah. Tammat."

6. Colophon of "Ṭarīq al-taqwá": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Wa-iʻlam inna dukhūl al-nār bi-al-kufr, wa-taḍāʻuf al-ʻināyah wa-qismat al-darajāt bi-al-aʻmāl al-musīʼah wa-al-akhlāq al-sayyiʼah. Wa-dukhūl al-Jannah bi-al-īmān, wa-taḍāʻuf al-niʻam wa-qismat al-darajāt bi-al-aʻmāl al-ṣāliḥah wa-al-akhlāq al-ḥasanah. Wa-inna Allāh ʻazza wa-jall, jalaqa al-Jannah fa-ḥashāhā bi-al-naʻīm thawāban li-ahlihā, wa-khalaqa al-nār fa-ḥashāhā bi-al-ʻadhāb ʻiqāban li-ahlihā, wa-khalaqa al-dunyā fa-ḥashāhā bi-al-āfāt wa-al-naʻīm miḥnatan wa-ibtilāʼan, thumma khalaqa al-khalq wa-al-Jannah wa-al-nār fī ghaybin minhum, lam yuʻāyinūhu, fa-al-naʻīm wa-al-afāt allatī fī al-dunyā hiya namūdhaj al-ākhirah wa-madhāqat ..."

7. Colophon of "Selections from the Ḥadīth". No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-ʻan Jaʻfar al-Ṣādiq, kāna yaqūlu: 'Niʻma al-baqlah hiya al-bādinjān, labbinūhu wa-zayyinūh, ay, ijʻalū fīhi duhn al-zayt, wa-kulū minhu, fa-innahā awwal shajarah āmant billāh, li-annahā tūrithu al-ḥikmah, wa-turaṭṭib al-dimāgh tarṭīban, wa-yuqawwī al-mathānah taqwiyatan, wa-yukthir al-jimāʻ."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud : manuscript.
record.note: Title of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud" supplied by cataloger based on folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of the unidentified excerpt on the attributes of God: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Iʻlam inna al-ḥukm al-ʻaqlī yanḥaṣir fī thalāthat aqsām: al-Wujūb, wa-al-istiḥālah, wa-al-jawāz. Fa-al-wājib mā lā yutaṣawwaru fī al-ʻaql ʻadamuh, wa-al-mustaḥīl mā lā yutaṣawwaru fī al-ʻaql wujūduh, wa-al-jāʼiz mā yaṣiḥḥu fī al-ʻaql wujūduhu wa-ʻadamuh ..."
Secundo folio of the unidentified excerpt on the attributes of God: fa-hādhihi al-ʻishrūn wājibah lillāh.

Incipit of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-sallam. Ruwuya ʻan al-Shaykh Abū Bakr ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Hāshim, ʻan Ibrāhīm al-Yamānī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, qāl: Kāna rajulan min al-tujjār ʻaṭṭār, bi-madīnat Baghdād, wa-kāna dhū mālan jazīlan wa-ʻabīdan wa-imāʼ wa-sakhāʼ wa-ʻiffah wa-diyānah wa-ṣiyānah wa-shajāʻah ..."
Secundo folio of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud": al-muḍīyah ḍāḥikat al-sinn.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 9 x 14 cm; 14 lines per page.
Binding: Remnant of brown leather on spine and the edges.
In good large naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; few corrections on the margins; catchwords.
At the head of folio 1a: "Jumād Awwal 15, sanat 308 [i.e., 1308 = 27 December 1890]" ; "Qiṣṣah."

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Jāriyah Tawaddud, raḥimahā Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanhā, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Hādhā min kutub al-faqīr ilayhi taʻālá Muḥammad Āṣif, ʻufiya ʻanhu."

Colophon of the unidentified excerpt on the attributes of God: No colophon. Text ends with: "... thumma sabʻ tusammá ṣifāt maʻnawīyah, wa-hiya mulāzimah lil-sabʻ al-ūlá, wa-hiya kawnuhu taʻālá, qādiran, wa-murīdan, wa-ʻāliman, wa-ḥayyan, wa-samīʻan, wa-baṣīran, wa-mutakalliman. Fa-hādhihi al-ʻishrūn wājibah lillāh taʻālá, yajibu ʻalá kull muʼmin wa-muʼminah."

Colophon of "Qiṣṣat al-Jāriyah Tawaddud": "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah, yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, shahr Rabīʻ Awwal, alladhī huwa min shuhūr ʻām alf wa-miʼatayn tisʻah wa-sittīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-dhālika ʻalá yad kātibihi, al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-dhalīl ilá Allāh taʻālá, ʻAlī Sulaymān al-Maghribī, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Khalwatī ṭarīqatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-man qaraʼa fīhi. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on blessed Thursday, in the month of Rabīʻ Awwal, of the year 1269 of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best prayer and peace be upon Him, by the hand of its copyist, the poor, wretched, and submissive to God Almighty, Sulaymān al-Maghribī, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Khalwatī ṭarīqatan, may God forgive him, his parents, and he who reads it. God is more knowledgeable."

record.title: 880-01 Ḥikāyat Ṣāliḥ wa-Ṣāliḥah : manuscript.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Ḥukiya wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-ghaybihi wa-aḥkam, fīmā maḍá wa-taqaddam, min aḥādīth al-umam, annahu kāna fī sālif al-zamān rajul khawājah fī madīnat Baghdād, yuqālu la-hu al-Khawājah ʻUmar al-Baṣrī, wa-kāna tilka al-rajul yafʻal al-khayr, wa-yaʼmuru bi-al-maʻrūf, wa-yanhá ʻan al-munkar, wa-yataṣaddaqu ʻalá al-fuqarāʼ wa-al-masākīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-kāna abūhā dāʼiman yūṣī ummahā.
16.3 x 22.8 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark red leather on spine.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on mostly cream colored paper; some phrases in red; no catchwords.

On the flyleaf (in pencil): "Ṣāliḥ wa-Ṣāliḥah"; a price (in pencil): "Ghurūsh 25"; an ownership statement with a date: "Hādhā kitāb min kutub Ṣāliḥ wa-Ṣāliḥah yakhuṣṣu Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Saʻīd Jawharjī, fī sanat 1335 [October/November 1916]"; and two verses of poetry by an owner urging the borrower of his book to return it quickly: "Yā mustaʻīr kitābī hādhā ruddahu ʻājilan // amā samiʻtā maqālāt Ibni Marwānī. Man yaʼkhudh kitāb wa-lam yaruddahu // yakūnu ibn zāniyah min nasl Qarnānī."
On the labels pasted to the front cover: "Ṣāliḥ wa-Ṣāliḥah"; an ownership statement: "Ḥikāyah. Min kutub Ṣubḥī al-Ḥalabī, fī jiwār al-Umawī."
On the label pasted to the back cover: "Hādhā Kitāb Ṣāliḥ wa-Ṣāliḥah, fī al-tamām wa-al-kamāl."

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahā ilaynā min ḥikāyat Ṣāliḥ wa-Ṣāliḥah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Āmīn. Fī shahr Shaʻbān 18, sanat 1211. Kātibuhu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Qalʻajī, al-ḥalāq fī al-Zarārilīyah."

Translation of the colophon: "This is what reached us of the tale of Ṣāliḥ and Ṣāliḥah. Praise be to God in all circumstances. Amen. Dated on the 18th of the month of Shaʻbān, of the year 1211 [of the Hijrah = 1 February 1797]. Copied by the poor and wretched al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Qalʻajī, the barber at al-Zarārilīyah."

record.title: Arabic folktales : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of "Qiṣṣat al-Ḥajjāj" from the caption in the incipit (folio 1b).
2. Title of "Ḥikāyat Luqmān al-Ḥakīm wa-waladih" from the caption in the incipit (folio 5b).
3. Title of "Ḥikāyat ʻAlī al-Baṣrī wa-Muḥammad al-Miṣrī" from the caption in the incipit (folio 10b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of "Qiṣṣat al-Ḥajjāj": "Hādhihi Qiṣṣat al-Ḥajjāj ʻalá al-tamām. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla ʻAbd Allāh al-Kūfī: Ḥaḍartu dhāt yawm majlis al-Ḥajjāj ibn Yūsuf al-Thaqafī, wa-al-nās min ḥawlihi jālisūn, idh dakhala ʻalayhi ṣabī lā nabāta bi-ʻāriḍayhi, zarī al-ḥāl wa-al-thiyāb, fa-sallama wa-taraḥḥam, faradda al-Ḥajjāj wa-al-ḥāḍirīn al-salām. Qāla la-hu al-Ḥajjāj: Min ayna aqbalta yā ṣabī ..."
Secundo folio of "Qiṣṣat al-Ḥajjāj": Yā Ḥajjāj fa-min ayna anta yā ṣabī.

2. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat Luqmān al-Ḥakīm wa-waladih": "Ḥikāyat Luqmān al-Ḥakīm wa-waladih. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam fī ghaybihi wa-aḥkam, fīmā maḍá wa-taqaddam min al-aḥādīth [aḥādīth] al-umam, min al-qawl al-gharīb wa-al-kalām al-ʻajīb, anna Luqmān al-Ḥakīm kāna la-hu māl jazīl, wa-min jumlat dhālik khizānah munfaridah bi-rasm al-qarḍ lillāh taʻālá, min ghayr fāʼidah min al-makhālīq, wa-kān kull man qaṣadahu min ayy makān kān, wa-mahmā ṭalabahu aʻṭāh, aʻṭāh min qalīl aw kathīr, ibtighāʼan li-wajh Allāh taʻālá wa-ṭalaban lil-ajr wa-al-thawāb ..."
Secundo folio of Ḥikāyat Luqmān al-Ḥakīm wa-waladih": wa-al-thawāb wa-kān bi-balad ākhar ḥakīm dhimmī.

3. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat ʻAlī al-Baṣrī wa-Muḥammad al-Miṣrī": "Ḥikāyat ʻAlī al-Baṣrī wa-Muḥammad al-Miṣrī. Yuḥká annahu kāna fī madīnat al-Baṣrah rajul khawājā, raʼs al-tujjār bi-al-Baṣrah, wa-la-hu walad rabbāhu wa-taʻiba ʻalayhi, wa-ʻallamahu al-Qurʼān wa-al-ʻilm, fa-ilá yawm min al-ayyām qāla li-wālidihi: Urīd usāfir ilá Miṣr wa-atafarraj fīhā, fī ayyām ḥayātik wa-taqurru ʻaynuka bī idhā jiʼtu sāliman rābiḥan, fa-ajābahu ilá dhāli, wa-ʻabbā la-hu safrat arbʻīn ḥiml, bi-arbʻīn alf Dīnār, ghayr lafāyifihā, wa-khayshihā, wa-ḥibālihā, wa-jimālihā, wa-khiyāmihā, wa-zādihā, wa-qurabihā, wa-faras, wa-baghlah, wa-shiqqah māwardīyah ..."
Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat ʻAlī al-Baṣrī wa-Muḥammad al-Miṣrī": bi-ahl al-balad waddaʻathu masāfat.
14 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover; dark red leather on spine and upper edges of the cover.
In fair large naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; headings in red; catchwords.
On the label pasted to the front cover: An ownership statement: "Luqmān, wa-al-Ḥajjāj, ʻAlī al-Baṣrī wa-Muḥammad al-Miṣrī. Min kutub Kamāl al-Dīn ʻAṭṭār."
Inside the front cover: "Ḥikāyat al-Ḥajjāj, sirruhu ʻajīb. Ḥikāyat Luqmān al-Ḥakīm wa-waladih, min aghrab al-gharāyib al-muʻjibā."

Inside the back cover: Two readers statements, as follows: 1. "[...] wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr naḥwa Rabbihi al-Karīm Muḥammad Ibrāhīm al-Kat[...] al-Ḥājj Maḥmūd al-Ḥimṣī [... ...], 6 Jumād Awwal, sanat 214 [1214 = 6 October 1799]." 2. "Naẓara fīhi Muḥammad Saʻīd." And an illegible signiture dated 15 Shaʻbān, sanat 219 [1219 = 19 November 1804]."

On folio 1a: An unidentified poem praising the teacher and acquiring knowledge, in 13 verses. It starts with: Lawlā al-muʻallimu kāna al-nāsu kulluhumu // shibha al-bahāʼim lā ʻilmun wa-lā adabu. It ends with: "... Thumma al-ṣalātu ʻalá al-Mukhtāri min Muḍarin // khayri al-barīyati min ʻUjmin wa-min ʻArabi."
On folio 5b: Four verses of poetry attributed to a certain sage: "li-baʻḍ al-ḥukamāʼ, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi"; and one verse "lil-Shāfiʻī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu."
1. Colophon of "Qiṣṣat al-Ḥajjāj": "Tammat wa-bi-al-khayr ʻammat, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl."
Translation of the colophon of "Qiṣṣat al-Ḥajjāj": "It is completed and well dispersed, thoroughly and perfectly."
2. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat Luqmān al-Ḥakīm wa-waladih": "Tammat al-ḥikāyah."
Translation of the colophon of "Ḥikāyat Luqmān al-Ḥakīm wa-waladih": "The tale is completed."
3. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat ʻAlī al-Baṣrī wa-Muḥammad al-Miṣrī": "Wa-hādhā mā intahā ilaynā min al-Baṣrī wa-al-Miṣrī, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Tammat bi-khayr."
Translation of the colophon of "Ḥikāyat ʻAlī al-Baṣrī wa-Muḥammad al-Miṣrī": "This is what reached us about the Basran and the Egyptian. Praise be to God in all circumstances. It was well completed."

record.title: 880-01 Nukat wa-nawādir wa-ḥikāyāt : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Hādhā kitāb muntakhab, mujtamiʻ min kitābayn: Kitāb Anīs al-jalīs, wa-Nuzhad [wa-Nuzhat] al-ʻābid wa-rawḍat al-zāhid, qad ḥawā nikāt wa-ʻuẓayyāt mufīdāt li-kull dhī lubb. Qāla ṣāḥib kitāb Anīs al-jalīs, ḥikāyah ʻan Sayyidinā Ādam Abū al-bashar, ʻalayhi al-salām: Saʼala aḥad al-nās suʼāl: Inna Sayyidanā Ādam, ʻalayhi al-salām, adhnaba dhanban bi-aklihi li-shajarat al-qamḥ, wa-Iblīs adhnaba bi-qillat sujūdihi li-Ādam ..."
Secundo folio: ayyuhā al-malik lima radadta dhālika al-ghulām.
15.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18 cm; 17-24 lines per page.
Binding: In greenish cardboard; brown leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; few headings in red; few notes on the margins; catchwords.
On the label pasted to the front cover: "al-Ḥubb anīs al-jalīs."
On folio 1a: "Hādhā nukat wa-nawādir wa-ḥakāyā wa-mawāʻiẓ muntakhab min kitābayn: Kitāb Anīs al-jalīs, wa-Rawḍat al-ʻābid wa-nuzhat al-zāhid."
At the end of the colophon (folio 129a): Two illegible stamps.

Colophon: "Fahādhā mā intakhabtuhu min al-kitābayn: Anīs al-jalīs, wa-Nuzhat al-ʻābid wa-rawḍat al-zāhid. Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. M."

Translation of the colophon: "This is what I selected from the two books: 'Anīs al-jalīs' and 'Nuzhat al-ʻābid wa-rawḍat al-zāhid'. God is He who leads to what is right, to Him is the reference and returning. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and on his companions, and grant them peace. M."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Nūr al-Dīn wa-Maryam al-Zunnārīyah : manuscript.
record.note: Title from supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Dhukira, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-ghaybihi wa-aḥkam, fīmā maḍá wa-taqaddam, wa-kāna min aḥādīth al-umam annahu kāna bā-arḍ [bi-arḍ] Miṣr rajul tājir dhū māl wa-niʻam, wa-kāna min akābir al-tujjārī [al-tujjār] al-atqiyāʼ al-abrār al-musāfirīn ilá Miṣr wa-al-Shām wa-al-barārī wa-al-qifār, ṣāḥib dirham wa-dīnār wa-ʻabīd wa-jawār, wa-kān akthar al-tujjār amwāl, wa-aḥsanahum aḥwāl, wa-aṣdaqahum maqāl ..."
Secundo folio: al-rāwī fa-ʻazamū ʻalayhi awlād al-tujjār.
15 x 22 cm; written surface: 12 x 18 cm; 13-15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark red leather on spine.
In fair large naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; catchwords.

Inside the front cover: A reader's statement: "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Karīm, Kāmil al-Dīn ibn al-Sayyid Saʻīd Rābiʻ, bi-ʻimārat al-Jawwānīyah, jānib Zuqāq al-Naqīb, tujāh Jāmiʻ al-ʻUmarīyah. Fī 12 Ramaḍān al-mubārak, sanat 1318 [3 January 1901]."
Inside the front cover: Stamp of Rābiʻah Kāmil and other illegible stamps.
On folio 1a: "Hādha [Hādhā] Qiṣṣat Nūr al-Dīn wa-Maryam al-Iznārīyah."

On folio 1a: Three readers' statements, as follows: 1. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-Qadīr Muḥammad Khālid Muṣliḥ." 2. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-Qadīr Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Qādir Aghawānī, kātib al-khutūm fī bāb al-Sarāyah al-ʻAskarīyah ʻinda al-ḥawrah, fī 10 Muḥarram 297 [1297 = 24 December 1879]." 3. "Janāb ʻAbd [Allāh (?)] ibn Shaykh al-Arḍ." And three illegible stamps.

On folio 51a: Five readers' statements, as follows: 1. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr Muḥammad Ḥamdī ibn ʻAlī, ghafara Allāh ilayhi wa-ilá wālidayhi." 2. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammalat maʻāniyahu Surayyā Khānum bint [...]." 3. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr Muḥammad ʻAṭā Allāh [...]." 4. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad Ṣiddīq al-Busnī, ghafara Allāh la-hu. Āmīn. M. 18 Ṣafar, sanat 1290 [17 April 1873]." 5. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá al-Ḥājj ʻAbd Allāh al-Naṭafjī, fī 22 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, sanat 94 [1294 = 28 December 1877]."

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā intahá ilaynā min Ḥikāyatihi [Ḥikāyat] Maryam al-Zunnāriyah wa-Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn al-tājir, bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-naʻūd [naʻūdh] billāh min al-ziyādah wa-al-nuqṣān wa-balā [wa-al-balāʼ]. Kulluhā min faḍl Rabbihi al-Qadīr. Wa-ṣalla [wa-ṣallá] Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. M."

Translation of the colophon: "This is the end of what has reached us of the 'Tale of Maryam al-Zunnārīyah and Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī', son of the merchant, thoroughly and completely. We seek refuge in God from increase and decrease, and from affliction. This is all from the favor of his Almighty Lord. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and on all his companions. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Qamar al-Zamān wa-Shams al-Nahār. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Dhukira, wa-Allāh aʻlam maghībihi [bi-ghaybihi] wa-aḥkam, fa-mā [fīmā] maḍā [maḍá] wa-taqaddam wa-salaf min aḥādīth al-umam, annahu kāna fī qadīm al-zamān wa-sālf al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān, bi-madīnah yuqālu lahā Ghazwas, malik min mulūk al-Furs, wa-kāna ismuhu Bahram, wa-kāna la-hu bint qad ajmaʻa al-khalq fī alqṭār [aqṭār] al-arḍ annahu mām [mā] ʻalá wajh al-arḍ mithluhā, wa-kānat tuḍrabu bi-hā al-amthāl, wa-kāna ismuhā Shams al-Zamān, wa-kāna khaṭabahā sāyir al-mulūk wa-badhalū lahā al-amwāl, wa-kānat zāhidah fī al-rijāl ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ayy al-malik [malik] atá ilayhā yarjiʻu khāyib.
11 x 14.8 cm; written surface: 9 x 11.5 cm; 9 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark red leather on spine and the edges.
In fair large naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; text tends toward colloquialism; catchwords.
On the labels pasted to the front cover: "Qamar al-Zamān wa-Shams al-Nahār". "Min kutub Ṣubḥī al-Ḥalabī fī jiwār al-Umawī".
Inside the front and back covers: Miscellaneous "love" writings, in poetry and prose, in a crude hand, in colloquial Arabic.
On folio 1a: "Qamar Azzamān [al-Zamān]" (in pencil).
On folio 1a: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal min Ḥikāyat Qamar al-Zamān wa-Shams al-Zamān [al-Nahār]."
Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min ḥadīthihim ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."
Translation of the colophon: "This is what has reached us of their discourse, completely and perfectly. Praise be to God alone."

record.title: 880-01 Sīrat Muḥammad Khayr. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Subḥāna man jaʻala siyar al-awwalīn ʻibratan lil-ākhirīn. Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam fī ghaybihi wa-aḥkam, ʻan mā maḍá wa-salafa wa-taqddam, min aḥādīth al-umam, annahu kāna fī qadīm al-zamān wa-sālif al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān, fī madīnat Dimashq al-Shām, rajul tājir, dhū ʻizz wa-jāh wa-khāṭir, wa-kāna dhālik al-tājir yusammā Nūr al-Dīn, wa-kāna ṣāḥib amwāl wa-mālikānāt wa-basātīn, wa-kāna fī majmūʻ ʻumrihi mā ruziqa illā walad dhakar ..."
Secundo folio: walad dhakar ka-annahu filqat qamar.
11 x 16 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 12.5 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown buckram; dark red leather on spine.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.
On the label pasted to the front cover: "al-Awwal min Sīrat Muḥammad Khayr."
On folio 1a: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal min Sīrat Muḥammad Khayr. M."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-baʻdahā qaʻida yantaẓiru al-laylah allatī qāla la-hu ʻanhā al-darwīsh, ilá an atat tilka al-laylah, fa-qāma fī al-waqt alladhī akhbarahu ʻanhu al-darwīsh min al-layl, fa-tawaḍḍaʼa wa-ṣallá rakʻatayn ilá Allāh taʻālá, wa-kadhālika faʻalat zawjatuhu mithlahu, daʻaw Allāh bi-daʻawāt lam tuḥjab ʻan bāsiṭ al-arḍ wa-rāfiʻ al-samāwāt. Wa-baʻdahā wāqaʻa zawjatahu, fa-kharajat fī tilka al-laylah ḥāmil bi-idhn musayyir al-maḥāmil. Wa-baʻeda muddah ẓahar ʻalá al-malikah al-ḥaml ilá an maḍat dhālik al-tisʻ ashhur, fa-waḍaʻat mawlūd, wa-huwa khulqah wadūd, qāla la-hu al-Dayyān kun ..."

record.title: Arabic folktales : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of "Ḥikāyat al-Miṣrī wa-al-Baṣrī" from colophon (folio 1a).
2. Title of "Ḥikāyat Badr ʻAjīb" supplied by cataloger.
3. Title of "Ḥikāyat Muḥammad al-Kaslān" from incipit (folio 15a).
4. Title of "Ḥikāyat al-Mahdī maʻa al-Badawī" from incipit (folio (24b)
5. Title of "Ḥikāyat al-Maʼmūn wa-jāriyatuh" supplied by cataloger.
6. Title of "Ḥikāyat ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Marwān wa-al-ṣabī al-rāʻī" supplied by cataloger.
7. Title of "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-jāriyatuh" supplied by cataloger.
8. Title of "Ḥikāyat al-Khalīfah wa-al-shuṭṭar al-thalāthah" supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat al-Miṣrī wa-al-Baṣrī": The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... taʻālá yajʻalauhu hanā wa-ʻāfiyah ʻalá qalbik, wa-an yuhnīka ʻalá mā aʻṭāk, wa-qad baqīta ṣihrī wa-zawj ukhtī, wa-anā ṣihruk wa-zawj bint ʻammik. Wa-lā wa-Allāh, lā aqdir ukāfīk bi-mā faʻalta maʻī min al-khayrāt, wa-mā kān lī ʻayn anẓuruk fī tilka al-ḥālah ..."
1. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat al-Miṣrī wa-al-Baṣrī": There is no secundo folio (the fragment is on one page only).

2. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat Badr ʻAjīb": "Wa-ḥukiya anna baʻḍ mulūk awlād al-ʻAjam, yusammá bi-'Badr ʻAjīb', min ʻiẓam ḥusnihi summiya bi-dhālika al-ism, qad rabbāhu wāliduhu wa-taʻiba ʻalayhi, wa-lam yrzaq ghayrahu qaṭṭ, fa-min awwal mubtadāh taʻallama al-Qurʼān, wa-ḥafiẓahu, wa-atqanahu, wa-qaraʼa min al-ʻilm wa-sharḥihi, wa-taʻallama al-khaṭṭ wa-jawwadahu, wa-al-rimāyah wa-ḥafiẓahā ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat Badr ʻAjīb": min al-wuḥūsh wa-kāna taḥtahu jawād.

3. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat Muḥammad al-Kaslān": "Ḥikāyat Muḥammad al-Kaslān. Wa-yuḥká anna al-Khalīfah bi-Baghdād qāla yawman li-wazīrihi: Khaṭara lī an ashuqqa Baghdād jamīʻahā, wa-azūra al-awliyāʼ wa-qubūrahum, wa-atafarraj, wa-tnazzah [wa-atanazzah], wa-lākin akūnu anā wa-anta faqaṭ, bi-ḥaythu lā yaʻrifunā aḥad. Fa-qāla la-hu: al-Samʻ wa-al-ṭāʻah. Fa-labisā malbūs al-tujjār ka-aḥad al-nās, wa-rakiba kull wāḥid baghlah wa-kharajā ..."
3. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat Muḥammad al-Kaslān": lammā ṭalabanī al-Wazīr ḥākā fī nafsī.

4. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat al-Mahdī maʻa al-Badawī": "Ḥikāyat al-Mahdī maʻa al-Badawī. Ḥukiya anna Amīr al-Muʼminīn al-Mahdī dhāt yawm min al-ayyām [kharaja] yataṣayyadu, fa-lāḥa la-hu ẓabyah, fa-taṭallabahā, wa-alaḥḥa fī ṭalabihā. Wa-ʻāran ʻalá al-mulūk idhā ṭalabū shayʼ lam yaṣilū ilayh, fa-abʻda ʻan ʻaskarihi, wa-ghalghala fī al-barr, fa-mā wajada nafsahu illā bi-baʻḍ aḥyāʼ al-ʻArab ..."
4. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat al-Mahdī maʻa al-Badawī": bayna buyūtihim ʻaṣrīyat al-nahār.

5. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat al-Maʼmūn wa-jāriyatuh": "Wa-ḥukiay anna al-Maʼmūn, aḥad khulafāʼ Baghdād, kāna yahwá jāriyatan min jawārihi [jawārīhi], yuqālu lahā Nasīm, wa-kānat dhāt adab wa-faḍl wa-ʻaql, kāmilat al-funūn, wa-kāna lā yufāriquhā fī al-safar muddah min al-zamān, fa-malla minhā wa-māla ilá ghayrihā, wa-lam trāhu muddatan, fa-ightammat li-dhālik ..."
5. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat al-Maʼmūn wa-jāriyatuh": wa-ijʻal li-man hadāhumā zawratan.

6. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Marwān wa-al-ṣabī al-rāʻī": "Wa-ḥukiya anna ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Marwān, aḥad khulafāʼ Banī Umayyah bi-Dimashq, kāna mūlaʻan bi-al-ṣayd. Qīla innahu kharaja dhāt yawm lil-ṣayd, fa-nafara min bayn yadayhi ẓabyah, fa-sāqa warāʼahā, fa-abʻadat, wa-mā baqiya yará ʻalá nafsihi al-rujūʻ bi-lā iqtināṣihā, fa-amʻana fī al-barr, wa-huwa warāʼahā, wa-idhā bi-rāʻin wa-maʻahu qaṭīʻ ghanam ..."
6. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Marwān wa-al-ṣabī al-rāʻī": Fa-man yaṣbaḥi [yaṣḥabi] al-akhyāra yaḥfaẓ wuddahum.

7. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-jāriyatuh": "Wa-yuḥká anna baʻḍ al-Aʻrāb kāna la-hu jāriyah ʻallamahā al-adab, wa-al-qurʼān, wa-al-faṣāḥah, wa-al-kitābah, wa-al-shiʻr, wa-kānat dhāt ʻaql wa-jamāl wa-taḥfaẓ sāyir al-funūn, kāmilat al-maʻānī wa-al-awṣāf, wa-kāna yuḥibbuhā ḥubban shadīdan ..."
7. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-jāriyatuh": ghulāmahu, ʻalayya bi-al-māl fa-uḥḍir.

8. Incipit of "Ḥikāyat al-Khalīfah wa-al-shuṭṭār al-thalāthah": "Wa-yuḥká anna aḥad al-khulafāʼ bi-Baghdād marrat bi-hi laylah muẓlimah muʻtimah, wa-huwa jālis waḥdahu fī shubbāk al-qaṣr, fa-ḥāka fī nafsihi: Aysh yaḥduthu fī hādhihi al-madīnah al-kabīrah wa-anta muṭālab bi-hi, wa-Allāh yasʼaluka ʻan dhālik, taṣdīqan li-qawl Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Kullukum rāʻī, wa-kullukum masʼūlun ʻan raʻīyatih ..."
8. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat al-Khalīfah wa-al-shuṭṭār al-thalāthah": huwa dāyir ʻalá al-asṭiḥah.
14 x 20 cm; written surface: 11 x 14.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In brown buckram; dark red leather on spine and the upper edges.
In good large naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; headings in red; catchwords.

1. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat al-Miṣrī wa-al-Baṣrī": "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min al-kalām. Wa-naʻūdhu billāh min al-ziyādah wa-al-nuqṣān. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tammat Ḥikāyah al-Miṣrī wa-al-Baṣrī ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl."

1. Translation of the colophon of "Ḥikāyat al-Miṣrī wa-al-Baṣrī": "This is what has reached us of the discourse. We take refuge in God from increase and decrease. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, on his family and companions and grant them peace. 'Hikāyat al-Miṣrī wa-al-Baṣrī' is completed thoroughly and perfectly.

2. "Ḥikāyat Badr ʻAjīb" ends with: "... fa-qāla la-hu: Yā kalb. Anta takdhib, wa-anā qad thabuta ʻindī ṣidquhum. Wa-amara bi-nahb jamīʻ mā fī al-markab, wa-qāla la-hu: Anta Majūsī, wa-taʻbudu al-nār, wa-anā urīdu uḥriquka bi-hā, fa-aḥraqahu, wa-akhadha jamīʻ mā la-hu fī al-markab, wa-amara al-dawādār wa-al-khāzindār wa-ummaham an yadkhulū ilá dākhil al-sutūr, wa-dakhala ʻindahum wa-ʻarrafahum bi-rūḥihi, wa-qāl: Anā abūkum, wa-antī zawjatī, wa-aḥká la-hum mā jarā la-hu, fa-fariḥū bi-al-ijtimāʻ baʻda al-firāq, wa-bi-al-ʻizz baʻda al-dhull, wa-bi-al-liqā baʻda al-buʻd, wa-bi-al-jamʻ baʻda al-shatāt, ilá an atāhum al-mawt al-mufarriq kull jamʻ."
2. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat Badr ʻAjīb": "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min al-kalām, baʻdamā naqūlu: Astaghfiru Allāh. Tammat."
2. Translation of the colophon of "Ḥikāyat Badr ʻAjīb": "This is what has reached us of the discourse. After that we say: I seek God's forgiveness. It is completed."

3. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat Muḥammad al-Kaslān": No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-aʻjaba al-Khalīfah dhālika minhum, kamā qālahu al-Ḥājj Muḥammad al-Kaslān, fa-taʻajjaba al-Khalīfah min dhālik, wa-khalaʻa ʻalayhim wa-ʻalá awlādihim. Wa-baqaw yataraddadū ilá Dār al-Khilāfah, ilá an farraqa al-mawt baynahum. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

4. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat al-Mahdī maʻa al-Badawī": No colophon. Text ends with: "... fa-lammā raʼāhu al-Mahdī ʻalá hādhihi al-ḥālah nādāhu: Lā baʼsa ʻalayk. Ṭibb nafsan wa-qurra ʻaynan, fa-innka awjabta ʻalaynā ḥaqqa ikarāmika wa-inbisāṭika maʻī, wa-ishtirākika maʻī fī al-akl wa-al-shurb. Thumma amar la-hu khilʻah jamīlah. Fa-fariḥ al-Badawī. Wa-Allāh wa-Allā Yā Amīr al-Muʼminīn, law iddaʻayta al-rābiʻah la-aṣdaqtuka fīhā."

5. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat al-Maʼmūn wa-jāriyatuh": No colophon. Text ends with: "... thumma innahu qāla naʻam, bal fī hādhihi al-laylah, wa-raḍiya ʻan Nasīm, wa-ḥamadahā ʻalá fiʻlihā, wa-wāṣalahā baʻda hajrihā, wa-baqiya yazūruhā li-ajl jāriyatihā, wa-akrama manzilihā.

6. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat ʻAbd al-Malik ibn Marwān wa-al-ṣabī al-rāʻī": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Qāl: Fa-tabassama ʻAbd al-Malik minhu, wa-amar bi-ann yuḥalla kitāfuhu, wa-amar la-hu bi-jāʼizah sanīyah, wa-an yumlá famuhu durran nafīsan, wa-anʻama ʻalayhi, wa-jaʻalahu min baʻḍ nudamāhu."

7. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-jāriyatuh": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Qāla Ibn Maʻmar: Qad shiʼtu, qad shiʼtu. Khudh jāriyataka, bāraka Allāh laka fīhā wa-fī al-māl, fa-akhadhahumā jamīʻan, wa-inṣarafā, masrūrīn dāʻīn, wa-istamarrū ilá an atāhum al-mawt."

8. "Ḥikāyat al-Khalīfah wa-al-shuṭṭār al-thalāthah" ends with: "... Qāl: Wa-mā ṣanʻatī allatī waṣaftu nafsī bi-hā? Qāl: Anta qult idhā inʻaqadat aḥulluhā, wa-akthar min hādhihi al-ʻuqdah, fa-mā taḥullahā, wa-naḥnu qad ḥaḍḍarnā al-māl, wa-mā baqiya illā ḥalāhā [ḥalluhā]. Fa-ʻinda dhālika amara bi-iṭlāqihim, wa-istatwabahum, wa-aḥsana ilayhim, wa-jaʻalahum min baʻḍ khadamihi, ilá an farraqa al-mawt baynahum."
8. Colophon of "Ḥikāyat al-Khalīfah wa-al-shuṭṭār al-thalāthah": "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min al-kalām."
8. Translation of the colophon of "Ḥikāyat al-Khalīfah wa-al-shuṭṭar al-thalāthah": "This is what has reached us of the discourse."

record.title: Two Arabic tales : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-mā jará la-hu maʻa zawjatih" from folio 1a.
2. Title of "Ḥadīth qamīṣ al-Nabī" from folio 4a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit: of "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-mā jará la-hu maʻa zawjatih": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ruwiya ʻan Anas ibn Mālik, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, annahu qāl: Lammā tuwuffiya Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ijtamaʻa aṣḥābuhu, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhum ajmaʻīn, yaktubūn tafsīr al-Qurʼān min ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbbās, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻnhumā, fī Masjid Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, idh dakhala rajul Aʻrābī fa-qāl: al-Salām ʻalaykum yā aṣḥāb Rasūl Allāh ..."
1. Secundo folio of "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-mā jará la-hu maʻa zawjatih": Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam.

2. Incipit of "Ḥadīth qamīṣ al-Nabī": "Wa-hādhā Ḥadīth qamīṣ al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ruwiya ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā, annahu qāl: Ṣallá binā Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, dhāt yawm ṣalāt al-ṣubḥ, thumma istanada bi-ẓahrihi al-mubārak ilá miḥrābihi, wa-aqbala ʻalá al-nās bi-wajhihi al-mubārak, wa-huwa ka-annahu al-badr bayna al-kawākib, wa-al-anwār tushriqu min wajhihi al-sharīf ... wa-idhā bi-Aʻrābī qad dakhala al-masjid, waqafa ʻalá qadamayhi wa-qāl: al-Salāmu ʻalaykum yā ahla Ṭībah al-kirām ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Ḥadīth qamīṣ al-Nabī": fa-baká al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam.
10 x 14 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 11 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In thin dark brown cardboard cover.
In good naskh script; in black ink on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.
At the head of folio 1a: "Qiṣṣat qamīṣ al-Nabī, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām." And under it (in red): "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-mā jará la-hu maʻa zawjatih".

Colophon of : "Ḥikāyat al-Aʻrābī wa-mā jará la-hu maʻa zawjatih": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Qālat zawjat al-Aʻrābī: Yā aṣḥāb Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, 'Qūlū li-zawjī yarḍá ʻannī, fa-innī tāʼibah ilá Allāh ʻazza wa-jall'. Fa-qāla al-Aʻrābī: 'Qad raḍītu ʻanhā'. Fa-akhadha bi-yadihā wa-inṭalaqā ḥamīdan. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

"Ḥadīth qamīṣ al-Nabī" ends with: "... Qāl: Fa-baynamā hum fī al-kalām idh bi-ʻaqʻat [bi-qaʻqaʻat] ajniḥat al-muṭawwaq bi-al-nūr Jibrīl, ʻalayhi al-salām, wa-qad nazila min ʻind Rabbin lā yanām, wa-huwa yaqūl: Yā Muḥammad Iqraʼ. Qāl: Wa-mā aqraʼ. Qāl: Iqraʼ 'Wa-innaka la-ʻalá khuluqin ʻaẓīm'."
Colophon of "Ḥadīth qamīṣ al-Nabī": "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min 'Ḥadīth al-qamīṣ wa-al-Aʻrābī' bi-al-tamām. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm."
Translation of the colophon of "Ḥadīth qamīṣ al-Nabī": "This is what thoroughly reached us of 'Ḥadīth al-qamīṣ wa-al-Aʻrābī'. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. It is completed."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Tamīm al-Dārī : manuscript.
record.note: Title from the flyleaf.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata [quwah] illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Ruwiya ʻan Kaʻb al-Aḥbār, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qāl: Fa-baynamā naḥnu fī Masjid Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, jālisun, wa-idhā bi-imraʼatun [bi-imraʼatin] ʻalá bāb al-masjid, wa-hiya taqūlu: Ayyukum Amīr al-Muʼminīn, fa-qāl: Mā ḥājatuki yā ḥurmah. Fa-qālat la-hu: Yā Amīr al-Muʼminīn, innī jāriyah min banāt al-Anṣār, wa-kāna lī wālid wa-akhawān, fa-qutilū bayna yaday Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī Ghazwat Badr ..."
Secundo folio: li-baʻliki khabar wa-taqaʻīn la-hu ʻalá athar.
11 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 12.5 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In greenish cardboard; dark brown leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; catchwords.
On the flyleaf: "Qiṣṣat Tamīm al-Dārī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. M."

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min 'Qiṣṣat Tamīm' ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāll. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nuskhat Tamīm, fī shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-mubārak, fī nahār al-Khamīs, yawm wāḥid wa-ʻishrīn, sanat al-alf wa-miʼah wa-sitt wa-thamānīn, sanat 1168 [i.e., 1186]. Katabahā alā-rājī [al-rājī] luṭf Rabbihi wa-ghufrānih. Ḥasbiya Allāh wa-kafā [wa-kafá], Yūsuf ibn Muṣṭafá, adkhalahu Allāh huwa wa-jamīʻ al-ikhwān jinān ruḍwān."

Translation of the colophon: "This is what has reached us of the 'Story of Tamīm', completely and perfectly. Praise be to God in all circumstances. The copy of Tamīm was completed on Thursday, the twenty-first day of the blessed month of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, of the year 1186 [of the Hijrah = 13 February 1773]. Copied by the aspirer to the kindness and forgiveness of his Lord. God alone suffices me, I Yusūf ibn Muṣṭafá, may God admit him, and all the brethren, to the gardens of bliss".

record.title: Two Arabic folktales : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of "Qiṣ̣ṣat al-qāḍī wa-al-ḥarāmī qāṭiʻ al-ṭarīq" from the caption (folio 1b).
2. Title of "Qiṣṣat al-jumjumah" from the caption (folio 13b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of : "Qiṣ̣ṣat al-qāḍī wa-al-ḥarāmī qāṭiʻ al-ṭarīq": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥukiya, Allāh [wa-Allāh] aʻlam fī ghaybihi wa-aḥkam fī mā maḍā wa-taqaddam fī qadīm al-zamān wa-sālif al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān, fī zamān Amīr al-Muʼminīn Hārūn al-Rashīd, kān qāḍī min akābir quḍātih, wa-kāna ismuhu Muḥammad ibn Muqātil, wa-kāna min al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻiẓām, fa-qaliqa dhāt laylat [laylah] min allayālī [al-layālī], fa-qāla baʻḍ [li-baʻḍ] khuddāmihi iʻliqū al-sirāj, fa-ʻalaqūhu, thumma akhadha kitāb wa-badā yaṭlaʻ [yuṭāliʻ] fīhi ..."
1. Secundo folio: "Qiṣ̣ṣat al-qāḍī wa-al-ḥarāmī qāṭiʻ al-ṭarīq": Ḥadīthan ʻan al-Nabī.

2. Incipit of "Qiṣṣat al-jumjumah": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Kaʻb al-Aḥbār, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Baynamā ʻĪsá sāyiḥ fī baʻḍ siyāḥatih ilá yawm min baʻḍ al-ayyām, marra fī wādī min baʻḍ awdiyat al-Shām, wa-kāna dhālik al-wādī kathīr al-ashjār walanhār [wa-al-anhār], fa-atā [fa-atá] ilá al-nahr yatawaḍḍá, fa-raʼa [fa-raʼá] ʻalá ḥaffat [ḥāffat] al-wādī jumjumah kabīrah hāʼilah, fa-waqafa ʻĪsá, ʻalayhi al-salām, yatafakkaru fī hādhihi al-jumjumah ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Qiṣṣat al-jumjumah": rakʻatayn wa-qāla Ilāhī wa-Sayyidī.
9.5 x 14.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13 cm; 13-16 lines per page.
Binding: In thick paper cover. The first and last leaves are pasted to the cover.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on thin paper; text within double frame; catchwords.
At the head of folio 1b and 13b: A geometrical design.
On folio 1b: "Hādhihi Qiṣṣat al-qāḍī wa-al-ḥarāmī qāṭiʻ al-ṭarīq. Min al-mujādalah."
On folio 13b: "Hādhihi 'Qiṣṣat al-jumjumah' ʻalá al-tamām, fīmā jara [jará] lahā maʻá Sayyidinā ʻĪsá."

1. Colophon of : "Qiṣ̣ṣat al-qāḍī wa-al-ḥarāmī qāṭiʻ al-ṭarīq": "Wa-hādhā mā intahá min 'Qiṣṣat al-qāḍī wa-al-ḥarāmī qāṭiʻ al-darb' ʻalá al-tamām. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tammat."

1. Translation of the colophon of: "Qiṣ̣ṣat al-qāḍī wa-al-ḥarāmī qāṭiʻ al-ṭarīq": "This is what reached [us] of the 'Story of the judge and the highway robber', completely. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, his family, and his companions, and grant them peace. It is completed."

2. Colophon of "Qiṣṣat al-jumjumah": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... thumma innahu ʻāsha baʻda dhālika min al-ʻumr thamānīn sanah, wa-ʻabada Allāh ḥaqqa ʻibādatih, ḥattá baqiya yufṭiru yawm wāḥid fī kull sanah, wa-lam yazāl rākiʻan sājidan bākiyan khāshiʻan lillāh taʻālá khawfan min nār Jahannam ḥattá atāhu ..."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Ṣāliḥ maʻa Ibn Harūn al-Rashīd Aḥmad : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam, anna Ṣāliḥ al-Baṣrī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, [qāl]: Baynamā anā amshī fī shawāriʻ Baghdād, wa-anā mutafakkir fī amrī wa-firāqī li-awlādī wa-ahlī, wa-anā aqūlu fī nafsī: Subḥān Allāh, mā buliya aḥad bi-al-buʻd wa-al-firāa mithlī. Fa-baynamā anā fī wiswās, wa-idhā bi-Aḥmad ibn Hārūn al-Rashīd, qad aqbala fī ʻaskarihi wa-qawmihi wa-junūdihi wa-ʻashīratih ..."
Secundo folio: thumma anshaʼa Ṣāliḥ yaqūl.
10 x 14.2 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown cardboard.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Allāh aʻlam. Allāh aʻlam" with different cryptic symbols.
At the head of folio 1b (in red): "Qiṣṣat Ṣāliḥ maʻa Ibn Hārūn al-Rashīd Aḥmad."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... Qāl: Fa-rufiʻat al-bāriyah, wa-idhā taḥtahā kitāb bi-khaṭṭihi wa-Muṣḥaf wa-khātim, fa-qāl: Yā Ibrāhīm, nāshadtuka Allāh al-ʻAẓīm wa-Nabīyahu al-Karīm, idhā qaḍaytu naḥbī wa-laḥiqtu bi-Rabbī kaffinnī fī hādhihi al-ʻabāʼah, wa-ṣallī ʻalayya fī jamāʻah min al-ghurabāʼ, wa-wārīnī taḥta al-turāb, wa-awdiʻnī ilá al-Malik al-Wahhāb, wa-ajruka ʻalayhi, fa-lā yaḍīʻ, innahu Karīmun Awwāb, matá duʻiya ajāb. Tammat."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Tawaddud al-Jāriyah : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāl: Ḥaddathanā al-Shaykh Abū Bakr ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Hishām, ʻan Ibrāhīm al-Yamānī, raḥimahum Allāh taʻālá, qāl: Kāna fī zaman Hārūn al-Rashīd, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, rajulan min al-tujjār, bi-madīnat Baghdād, wa-kāna dhā māl jazīl wa-ʻabīd wa-jawārin, wa-karam, wa-ʻiffah, washajāʻh, wa-ṣiyānah wa-amānah, wa-kāna la-hu al-amlāk wa-al-iḥsān, wa-kāna yashtarī al-imāʼ, fa-waqaʻat fī yadihi dhāt yawm min al-ayyām jāriyah khumāsīyah, kaannahā al-shams al-muḍīʼah ..."
Secundo folio: mawlāhā aqāma muddah min al-zaman.
11.5 x 16 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In thin dark brown cardboard.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a (in red): "Hādhihi Qiṣṣat Tawaddud al-Jāriyah wa-mā jarā lahā [... ...] maʻa jamīʻ [... ... ...] wa-al-naḥwīyīn wa-ghayrihim ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Tamm."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... thumma sakatat, fa-qālū al-ḥāḍirīn: Aḥsantī yā Tawaddud. Bāraka Allāh fīki wa-fīman rabbāki wa-ʻallamaki. Fa-qāmat wa-bāsat al-arḍ bayna yaday Amīr al-Muʼminīn, fa-amara bi-iḥḍār miʼat kīs, fī kull kīs alf dīnār, thumma innahu amar bi-mawlāhā, fa-taqaddama bayna yaday Amīr al-Muʼminīn, fa-qabbala al-arḍ, thumma waqafa muṭraq al-raʼs. Thumma qāla la-hu: Yā hādhā, laqd rabbayta fa-aḥsant al-tarbiyah, thumma sallama ilayhi al-māl fī ʻasharat ṣanādīq, wa-amar la-hu ..."

record.title: 880-02 Qiṣṣat ʻAwwād Ṣādiq al-Miṣrī wa-Saʻd al-Suʻūd : manuscript / Asʻad Mārīyā al-Ṣaydanāwī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi Qiṣṣat ʻAwwād Ṣādiq min Miṣr al-ʻAdīyah [al-Muʻizzīyah], wa-mā naẓara fī siyāḥatihi wa-ʻushqihi ilá Saʻd al-Suʻūd bint Hāshim Khuzām al-Ṣīnī min madīnat Kāntūn. Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam wa-aḥkam ʻanmā maḍá wa-taqaddam wa-salaf min aḥādīth al-umam, annahu kāna fī qadīm al-zamān, wa-sālif al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān, rajulan ghanīyan jiddan, min madīnat Miṣr al-Qāhirah, dhū māl ʻaẓīm, wa-nawāl jasīm, wa-dāyirah ʻaẓīmah yutawwih ḥisābuhā al-fikr al-salīm, wa-kāna ismuhu ʻAwwād, wa-wāliduhu yudʻā Ṣādiq, wa-umm ismuhā Rashīdah ..."
Secundo folio: bi-manām, wa-ʻāda ḥazīnan kaʼannahu sāhī.
16.3 x 23 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 18 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark red leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on laid thick paper; headings in purple; catchwords.
On folio 1a (in purple): "Kitāb Qiṣṣat ʻAwwād Ṣādiq al-Miṣrī wa-Saʻd al-Suʻūd bint Hāshim Khuzām min al-Ṣīn, min madīnat Kāntūn, wa-hiya min taʼlīf Asʻad Mārīyā al-Ṣaydanāwī."

The text of "Qiṣṣat ʻAwwād Ṣādiq al-Miṣrī wa-Saʻd al-Suʻūd" ends with: "... Wa-ʻādat Fāṭimah tūṣī ʻAwwād bi-ukhtihā Saʻd al-Suʻūd, wa-bikyū ʻinda al-wadāʻ, ḥattá ballū al-wisāʻ [al-wisād (?)], wa-sāfarū al-rāyḥīn, wa-ʻādū al-muwaddiʻīn, wa-lā zāla ʻAwwād wa-Saʻd al-Suʻūd sāyrīn, ilá an aqbalū ilá Miṣr al-ʻAdīyah [al-Muʻizzīyah], wa-dakhalū bi-yawm surūr, wa-baqiya ʻAwwād, huwa wa-Saʻd al-Suʻūd, ʻalá taqaḍī al-afrāḥ wa-al-masarrāt, bi-ghinā wa-nawbāt, ilá an atāhum hādim al-ladhdhāt wa-mufarriq al-jamāʻāt wa-bālī bi-al-shatāt."
Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min Dīwān ʻAwwād wa-Saʻd al-Suʻūd, wa-lillāh al-ḥamd wa-al-kamāl ʻalá kull ḥāl, wa-huwa min taʼlīf Asʻad Mārīyā al-Ṣaydanāwī. Tammat."

Translation of the colophon: "This is what has reached us of the Account of ʻAwwād and Saʻd al-Suʻūd. Praise and perfection be to God in all circumstances. It was authored by Asʻad Mārīyā al-Ṣaydanāwī. It is completed."

record.title: Miscellaneous subjects of Islamic literature : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Faṣl fī dhikr wafāt Mūsá, ʻalayhi al-salām. Ruwiya ʻan Kaʻb al-aḥbār, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, anna Mūsá, ʻalayhi al-salām, saʼala Rabbahu, ʻazza wa-jall, an yuʻlimahu bi-mawtihi. Qāl: Fa-awḥá Allāh ilayhi, ʻazza wa-jall, inna ākhir ayyāmika yawm al-Jumʻah ..."
Secundo folio: al-jamāʻāt wa-mukharrib al-quṣūr wa-muʻammir al-qubūr.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 11 x 18 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In green cardboard; green cloth on spine.
In large good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Majmūʻat masāʼil Sayyidinā Mūsá wa-wafāt al-Sayyidah Fāṭimah wa-ghayrihim."

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahā ilaynā min 'Munājāt Sayyidinā Mūsá', ʻalayhi al-salām, wa-ʻalá Nabīyinā wa-sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm. Ghafara Allāh lanā wa-liwālidaynā wa-al-ḥāḍirīn wa-wālidīhim, wa-li-qāriʼihā, wa-li-nāsikhihā, wa-li-mustamiʻihā, wa-li-sāʼir al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tammat bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá, fī 15 Ṣ [Ṣafar], 1269."

Translation of the colophon: "This is what has reached us of the 'Soliloquy of our Master Moses', peace be upon him, and upon our Prophet, and the rest of the prophets, the best prayer and the most perfect peace. May God forgive us, our parents, the attendees and their parents, its reader, its copyist, he who listens to it, and all Muslims. Amen. Amen. Amen. It was completed by the help of God Almighty, on 15 Ṣ [Ṣafar], 1269 [of the Hijrah = 28 November 1852]."

record.title: 880-01 Ḥikāyat Muḥammad Khayr wa-Khayr Yakūn wa-Badr Jamāl : manuscript.
record.note: Title from the back of the end leaf.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Kayf lammā qulnā inna Badr Jamāl qālat innī [ilá] Muḥammad Khayr ismaʻ li-qiṣṣat samar, law kutibat fī al-ibar ʻalá āmāq al-baṣar la-kānat ʻibrah li-man iʻtabar. Qāla lahā: Asmiʻīnī yā sitt al-milāḥ. Qālat: Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam, annahu kāna fī madīnat al-Ṣīn malik ʻaẓīm al-shān, dhū ʻizz wa-sulṭān, ṣāḥib ʻasākir wa-dasākir wa-aʻwān, wa-kāna ismuhu al-Shāh ʻUthmān ..."
Secundo folio: wa-dākhil darwīsh ikhtiyār.
16 x 22.7 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover; dark red leather on spine.
In fair large naskh script, in black ink, on laid paper; pages also numbered in East Arabic (Indian) numerals (1-76); catchwords.

Inside the front cover (in pencil): A reader's statement: "Qad naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammal maʻāniyahu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr, al-muqirr bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Qadīr, Muḥammad Amīn ʻUlabī. M. Fī 2 Shaʻbān, sanat 316. 1316 [16 December 1898], and crude drawings (in pencil) of two flying birds and a man wearing a tarboosh/fez.
At the head of folio 1a (in pencil): A reader's statement: "Yā Asyād, yā kirām, kull al-kalām kadhib. Lā tuṣaddiqū, bas shī fī shaʼn al-maṣārī."

On folio 1a: Readers statements: "Naẓara fīhi [... ...] al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi [... ... ...] 27 Jumād Awwal, sanat 1308 [8 January 1891]". "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn". "al-Thānī Muḥammad Khayr [in pencil]".
On the left margin of folio 34a: Two illegible stamps.

On folio 39b (in pencil): A reader's statement: "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammal maʻāniyahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-Sayyid Muḥammad Kāmil ibn Khālid [... ...] Qūl [...] Baghdād [?], ʻafā ʻanhum wa-ghafara Allāh lahum ajmaʻīn", two illegible stamps, and a crude drawing (in pencil) of a mān leading a horse/camel (?) with a "hawdaj" (litter) bearing the name "Amīn ʻUlabī".

On the front of the end leaf: Several readers statements, as follows: 1. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-Jalīl, Muḥammad Rasmī al-ʻUjaylī. Kānūn [...], sanat 306 [1306 = January 1889]." 2. "Laqad naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Qadīr fī ghurrat Ṣafar al-Khayr, sanat 1305, Ṣafar 15 [2 November 1887]." 3. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr rājī ʻafwá Rabbihi al-Ḥalīm, Muḥammad Kaʻdān, adāma Allāh taʻālá ʻizzahu bi-awfar al-niʻam. Āmīn. Ghurrat Dhū al-Qaʻdah 24, sanat 1311 [28 June 1894]" with a crude drawing (in pencil) of a mān leading a horse/camel (?) with a "hawdaj" (litter) bearing the name "Muḥammad Shawkī Kaʻdān".

On the back of the end leaf: 1. An advertisment from a soldier: "Kull man ḍāyiʻ la-hu ḍāyiʻ ankushuhu la-hu, wa-al-ujrah rubʻ Majīdī, wa-mā baʼkhudh ḥattá balāqī gharaḍah, wa-baktub lil-maḥabbah. Anā Ḥasan Ḥabīb Ṭarābulusī, ʻaskarī fī al-Shām, birinjī ṭābūr, Niẓāmīyah Alāy 40." 2. "Hādhihi Ḥikāyat Muḥammad Khayr wa-Khayr Yakūn wa-Badr Jamāl, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Wa-hādhihi al-ḥikāyah kulluhā kadhib, wa-mā fīhā kalimat ṣidq ʻalá al-iṭlāq, wa-narjū min kull man qaraʼa hādhihi al-siyar an lā yuṣaddiq minhā wa-lā kalimah abadan. Wa-hādhihi taṣnīf al-faqr [al-faqīr] Khālid ibn Khaldūn min qaryat Ḥalbūn. Fī Ṣafar ullifa hādhā al-kitāb sanat 1789 [...], fī Mart [?] 45."
Inside the back cover: A reader's statement: "Hādhihi al-ḥikāyah kulluhā ṣidq, naẓara fīhā Muḥammad Amīn ʻUlabī."

Text ends with: "... wa-ṣāra kullamā ishtāqū li-baʻḍihim al-baʻḍ yaḥḍur Luṭf Kamāl li-ʻind ukhtihi Badr Jamāl, wa-Badr Jamāl kullamā ishtāqat li-akhīhā tarūḥ li-ʻind akhīhā Luṭf Kamāl. Wa-lā zālū ʻalá dhālika al-ḥāl ilá an adrakahum hādim al-ladhdhāt wa-mufarriq al-jamāʻāt. Wa-astaghfir, Wa-astaghfir, Wa-astaghfir Allāh al-ʻAẓīm, al-Tawwāb al-Raḥīm, min al-ziyādah wa-al-nuqṣān, wa-min al-kadhib wa-al-buhtān."
Colophon: "Tammat bi-al-khayr. M M M."
Translation of the colophon: "It ended well. M M M."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat al-Malik Marhamadān wa-ibnatuhu Qaṣṭūn : manuscript.
record.note: Title from colophon: "Qiṣṣat al-Malik Marhamadān wa-ibnatuhu Qaṣṭūn".
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Dhukira, wa-Allāh aʻlam fī ghaybihi wa-aḥkam, ʻanmā maḍā wa-taqaddam min aḥādīth al-umam annahu kāna fī qadīm al-zamān wa-sālif al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān, fī zamān al-ʻamāliqah, malik min mulūk al-zamān kāfir yaʻbudu al-aṣnām, min dūn al-Malik al-Jabbār, wa-kāna jabbāran ʻanīdan, wa-fārisan shadīdan, wa-baṭalan ṣindīdan takhāfuhu al-mulūk ..."
Secundo folio: wa-kāna ʻulū tilka al-qubbah arbaʻīn qāmah.
16.2 x 22.2 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In large clear naskh script, in black ink, on laid paper; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥikāyat al-Malik al-Madʹhamadān, wa-hiya min kutub al-Sayyid Muḥammad al-Ḥifnī al-Kutubī."
On folio 1a: A reader's statement, as follows: "Naẓara fīhi Muḥammad Yaḥyá al-Ṣawwāf fī 12 R Ākhir sant 1301 [10 February 1884]."
The name of the king's daughter on folio 11a is "Qarqaysūn".

On folio 33b: A poem (song) in dialectical Arabic, in a different hand, in four stanzas, the first three in four verses each, the fourth in finve verses, starts with: "Anā māriq bi-darbī // lāqī ʻāshiqan yabkī. Huwa yanūḥ // wa-anā mashghūl bi-ḍiḥkī ..."

The text ends with: "... wa-lam yazālū fī al-ʻibādah ḥattá tawaffat Qaṣṭūn al-ṣāliḥah wa-dufinat fī makānihā, raḥimahā Allāh, wa-tabiʻahā zawjuhā wa-abūhā, wa-mātū al-arbaʻūn wa-indafanū fī dhālika al-makān, wa-kānū al-arbaʻīn mulūk min al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-inna qubūrahum lā yastaṭīʻu aḥad an yaʻbura ilayhim waḥdahu li-shiddat haybatihim, wa-hum jamīʻ min awliyāʼ Allāh taʻālá."
Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min 'Qiṣṣat al-Malik Marhamadān wa-ibnatuhu Qaṣṭūn'. M."
Translation of the colophon: "This is what has reached us of the 'Story of the King Marhamadān and his daughter Qṣṭūn'. M."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Qamar al-Zamān wa-Shams al-Nahār. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... wa-anshada hādhihi al-abyāt yaqūlu, baʻda al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Rasūl: Wa-lī zafratun ẓaharat qatalatnī // bi-shawqi layālīnā allatī qad tawallatī. Idhā qultu hādhī zafratu al-yawmi qad maḍat // fa-man lī bi-ukhrá baʻdahā qad ʻuẓẓimatī. Qāla al-rāwī: Thumma qāma yatamashshá ḥawālī al-bustān, wa-dāra wa-huwa ghāriq fī baḥr al-afkār, wa-qad ʻaduma iṣṭibārahu ..."
Secundo folio: wa-anshada wa-jaʻala yaqūlu.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 11.5-12.5 x 17.5-18 cm; 13-19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark red leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; folios 1-4 and 29-32 are written in a different hand; headings in purple; catchwords.
On labels pasted to the front cover: "Qamar al-zamān". "Min kutub Ṣubḥī al-Ḥalabī fī jiwār al-Umawī."
On folios 1a and 32b: An illegible stamp.

On the back of the end leaf: A reader's statement: "Naẓara fīhi wa-ḥafiẓa maʻāniyahu al-Sayyid al-faqīr, rājī min al-Bārī taʻālá, al-ʻafw, al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad Kamāl Rafīq al-Jākūsh, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-lī jamʻ [wa-li-jamīʻ] al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Ḥurrira, 7 Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat 1282 [26 December 1865]."

Text ends with: "... Wa-ammā Qamar al-Zamān fa-innahu aḥḍara waladahu al-Asʻad, wa-jaʻalahu sulṭān yaḥkumu fī madīnat al-Abwas, wa-raḍiya bi-hi jadduhu Armānūs. Wa-baʻda dhālika tajahhaza Qamar al-Zamān wa-laḥiqa abīhi ilá an waṣala ilayhi, wa-sāfara maʻahu, waṣalū ilá arḍ al-Mashriq, wa-dakhalū ilá madīnat Khālid. Fa-lammā dakhalū zuyyinat al-madīnah daffat al-basātīn shahr kāmil, wa-jalasa Qamar al-Zamān malaka makān abīhi, wa-aqāmū ʻalá dhālika al-ḥāl ilá an atāhum hādim al-ladhdhāt wa-mufarriq al-jamāʻāt."
Colophon: "Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min Dīwān Qamar al-Zamān ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamālī, raḥimahum Allāh."
Translation of the colophon: "This is what has reached us of the Account of Qamar al-Zamān, completely and perfectly. May God have mercy upon them."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Qaḍīb al-Bān : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Qiṣṣat Qaḍīb al-Bān wa-mā jarā la-hu. Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam, anna al-Malik al-Iskandar, wa-huwa fī ḥukmihi, qad ḍāqa ṣadruhu dhāta yawm min al-ayyām, fa-qāla li-wazīrihi: Qad ḍāq ṣadrī. Fa-qāla la-hu: Yā malik al-zamān, ilʻab bi-al-dirham wa-al-dīnār. Fa-qāla la-hu: Laysa dhālika fī khāṭirī, wa-innamā murādī atakhaffā wa-anzil ashuqqu fī hādhihi al-madīnah. Fa-qāla la-hu: Niʻma al-raʼy ..."
Secundo folio: wa-qāla la-hu mā ismuka.
10 x 15 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 12.5 cm; 12-14 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather cover.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on thin paper; no catchwords.
On the labels pasted to the front cover: "Qaḍīb al-Bān". And an ownership statement, as follows: "Min kutub Ṣubḥī al-Ḥalabī fī jiwār al-Umawī."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-kharajtu ilá ʻind al-Malik Yaʻfūr Shāh wa-qabbaltu al-arḍ bayna yadayh. Fa-lammā raʼānī fariḥa bī wa-taraḥḥaba bī. Wa-iḥkīt la-hu mā jarā lī maʻa al-Malikah al-ʻAnqā, min al-awwal ilá al-ākhir, wa-maʻa al-Malik al-Iskandar, wa-kayfa amar al-Kahīn an yūṣilanī ilá hādhihi al-madīnah. Fa-taʻajjaba al-Malik min dhālik, wa-akhlaʻa ʻalá Qaḍīb al-Bān, wa-ʻādahu ilá martabatihi, wa-zawwajahu fī ibnatihi, wa-istaqāma ʻindahu ʻalá hanā wa-inshirāḥ, ilá an atāhum hādim al-ladhdhāt wa-mufarriq al-jamāʻāt. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Subḥāna mufnī al-umam, wa-lā yabqā illā wajhuhu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Qamar al-Zamān wa-Shams al-Nahār : manuscript.
record.note: Title from the label pasted to the front cover.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... Fa-lammā naẓara al-malik ilá fiʻl al-wazīr ḍaḥika ḥattá ghashiya ʻalayhi, wa-qāl. Wa-ammā al-wazīr, fa-innahu lā zāla yamshī, wa-huwa yaqūlu: Yā Arḥam al-Rāḥimīn, wa-al-shaykh al-aʻmá jaʻala yaṣun [yuṣghī (?)] ʻalayhi bi-idhnihi, wa-lam yukallimhu. Wa-ammā al-wazīr jaʻala yamshī, wa-huwa yaṭruqu bi-al-ʻaṣā, ilá an qaruba min al-aʻmá wa-tasharkala bi-hi, wa-waqaʻa fawqahu, fa-qāl: Yā Sattār, yabqá hādhā kalb nāyim ..."
Secundo folio: kithār, qāla al-wazīr lā.
11.2 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13 cm; 11 lines per page.
