Secundo folio: bi-qurūn mushaʻʻabah fa-lammā raʼāhu al-Mihrajān.
15.5 x 20.6 cm; written surface: 10 x 17 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark red leather on spine.
In fair large naskh script, in black ink, on laid white paper; catchwords; some leaves seem to be missing between folios 10 and 11.
On the label pasted to the front cover (in pencil): "al-Murhij wa-al-Marhajān."

Inside the front cover: Four readers' statements, as follows: 1. (in purple) "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-jalīl, Naʻīm ibn al-Ḥājj Ḥusayn Fākihānī. Ḥurrira fī 12 Muḥarram, sanat 1319 [1 May 1901]." 2. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu MHMD ṢDYQ [Muḥammad Ṣiddīq]." 3. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-Ḥājj Ṣāliḥ ibn al-marḥūm al-Ḥājj Muḥammad Abū Aḥmad Nāṣir. Sanat 1290, fī 26 Dhī [al-Qaʻdah/al-Ḥijjah (?) = 15 January 1874/14 February 1874]." 4. (in purple) "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-jalīl, Ṣādiq al-Mallāḥ, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻalá wālidayhi wa-ʻala jamīʻ al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Fī 15 Muḥarram, sanat 1319 [4 May 1901]."

Inside the back cover: Two readers' statements, as follows: 1. "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr ilá Allāh, al-r[ā]jī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Karīm, Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAbd, yaghfiru Allāh la-hu wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bilghufrān. Āmīn. M." 2. "[... ... ...] maʻāniyahu [... ...] Allāh al-r[ā]jī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-Karīm, ʻUthmān ibn Ḥamīd."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-aqāma al-Mihrajān fī aladhdh ʻaysh, wa-akhūhu Murhij yazūruhu min Jabal Qāf kull shahr marrah, wa-qad ahābathu al-mulūk, wa-aṭāʻahu kull ghanī wa-ṣuʻlūk, ḥattá atāhum hādim al-ladhdhāt, wa-naqalahum min saʻat al-quṣūr ilá ḍīq al-qubūr, fa-subḥān man ḥakama bi-al-mawt ʻalá al-umam, wa-fī aḥkāmihi mā ẓalam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh bārī al-umam, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tammat."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat al-Hindabād al-Ḥammāl maʻa Sindabād al-Baḥrī : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Fa-hādhihi Qiṣṣat al-Hindabād al-Ḥammāl maʻa Sindabād al-Baḥrī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Wa-baʻd, Qad kāna bi-Baghdād fī ʻahd al-Khalīfah Hārūn al-Rashīd, rajul yuqāl la-hu al-Hindabād al-Ḥammāl, wa-annahu fī baʻḍ al-ayyām ḥāmil ḥimlan thaqīlan, wa-arāda bi-hi makān baʻīd, fa-adrakahu al-taʻab, wa-ḥamiya ʻalayhi al-ḥarr, wa-sāla ʻaraqahu, wa-qad ijtāz bi-zuqāq qad raqqa rasmuhu wa-ṭāba nasīmuhu, wa-arḍuhu marshūshah bi-al-māward, bi-rāʼiḥat al-ʻūd wa-al-nadd ..."
Secundo folio: ḥimlahu ʻan ʻunuqihi wa-qad ghamiya ʻalayhi.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 18.5 cm; 10-18 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good large naskh script, in black ink, on thick white paper; some leaves replaced; catchwords.

On folio 1a: Remnant of an unidentified previous manuscript and colophon, as follows: "... wāḥidat khiṭāb lahum [... ...], ilá an atāhum hādim al-ladhdhāt, wa-mufarriq al-jamāʻāt. Wa-hādhā mā intahá ilaynā min [khabarihim (?)] bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-naʻūdhu billāh min al-ziyādah wa-al-nuqṣān. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. ʻAlá yad aḍʻaf al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilá Rabbihi al-Karīm, al-Sayyid Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj Ibrāhīm, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-liman qaraʼa la-hu al-Fātiḥah. Āmīn Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."

Text ends with: "... wa-istaqāma al-Sindabād al-Baḥrī fī ḥaẓẓ wa-surūr, wa-ghibṭah wa-ḥubūr ilā an atāhu [hādim] al-ladhdhāt, wa-mufarriq al-jamāʻāt, wa-mukharrib [al-quṣūr] wa-al-dūr, wa-muʻammir al-qubūr."
Colophon: "Wa-hādhā [mā intahá] ilaynā min Qiṣṣat Sindabād [...] bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, ʻalá [yad] nāsikhihā li-nafsihi [... ... ...]."
Translation of the colophon: "This is [what has reached] us of the Story of Sindabād [...] completely and thoroughly, by the [hand] of its copyist, for himself [... ... ...]."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Fīrūz : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥukiya, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-ghaybihi wa-aḥkam, fīmā maḍá wa-taqaddam wa-salaf min aḥādīth al-umam, bi-annahu kāna al-Khalīfah Hārūn al-Rashīd billāh, al-khāmis min Banī al-ʻAbbās, wa-kānat dar [dār] mamlakatihi fī madīnat Baghdād, Dār al-Salām. Ittafaqa annahu kāna al-Malik jālis yaqẓān, ghayr nāʻis, yuṣallī wa-yusallimu ʻalá Nabīyin, lān bi-yamīnihi kull jazʻ [jadhʻ] yābis, wa-laylata mawlidihi al-sharīf khamadah [khamadat] nār Fāris. Ilatafata ilá wazīrihi, wa-qāla la-hu: Yā Jaʻfar, ṣadrī muḍāyiqunī ..."
Secundo folio: al-zīq anā wa-antum nataraḍḍá.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark brown leather on spine.
In large clear naskh script, in black ink, on thick white laid paper; catchwords.
On the label pasted to the front cover: "Fayrūz awwal." "Hādhā kitāb al-miʼah wa-arbaʻah wa-arbaʻūn min Sīrat al-Malik al-Ḍāhir. 144."
At the head of folio 1a: A reader's statement: "Qaraʼa fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu Ṣāliḥ ibn Maḥmūd [...] al-Khaṭīb." And a name: "Ṣādiq Wahbah."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... fa-qāla lī: Yā fatá, min ayy makān anta ḥattá sāqaka al-naṣīb ilá baladinā, wa-tasharrafnā bi-qudūmika. Fa-qultu la-hu: Min bilād baʻīdah. Fa-qāla lī: Kam buʻduhā, wa-mā ismuhā. Fa-qultu la-hu: In kān turīd muddat buʻdihā, fa-buʻduhā iḥdá wa-tisʻūn shahran, wa-ammā ismuhā, al-Ṣīn al-Adná. Fa-taʻajjaba al-khayyāṭ min dhālik. Wa-rabbaytu maʻahu ṣuḥbah, wa-qultu la-hu: Urīdu minka an tufaṣṣillī badlah jūkh. Fa-qāla lī: Marḥaban bika yā Sayyidī, fa-matá iʻtamadta natasharrafu bi-qaḍāʼ ḥājatik. Fa-baynamā naḥnā fī al-kalām, wa-idhā bi-allādhī ..."

record.title: Archeologia Cristiana : typescript.
record.note: Title from title page of printed pamphlet.

record.title: Folktales and miscellaneous Islamic anecdotes and quotations : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of "Qiṣṣat Sayyidinā al-Ḥusayan ibn Sayyidinā ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib" from caption (folio 1a).
2. Title of "Ḥadīths, miscellaneous quotations, and invocations" supplied by cataloger.
3. Title of "Qiṣṣat Muʻādh ibn Jabal" from caption (folio 23b) and from the colophon (folio 44a).
4. Title of "Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes, and useful advices" supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of "Qiṣṣat Sayyidinā al-Ḥusayan ibn Sayyidinā ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib": "Hādhihi 'Qiṣṣat Sayyidinā al-Ḥusayan ibn Sayyidinā ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib', raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-huwa mā ruwiya ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhumā, ʻan mā bayna al-sittīn ilá alghiyat [ghāyat (?)] al-arbaʻīn, wa-aqall hum [wa-aqalluhum (?)] ʻan [man (?)] tajāwaza dhālik wa-al-sanah [?]. Wa-tuwuffiya, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-la-hu min al-ʻumr ithnayn wa-sittūn sanah, wa-tawallá al-khilāfah min baʻdihi Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu, wa-kānat khilāfatuhu ʻāmayn wa-ʻshrat ashhur, thumma tuwuffiya, wa-tawallá al-khilāfah min baʻdihi ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu ..."
1. Secundo folio of "Qiṣṣat Sayyidinā al-Ḥusayan ibn Sayyidinā ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib": fa-qālat la-hu yā akhī al-raʼy min al-Rabb al-Rashīd.

2. Incipit of "Ḥadīths, miscellaneous quotations, and invocations": "Qāla Ibn ʻAbbās, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhumā, bi-anna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāl: al-Khams bi-khams. Qālū: Yā Rasūl Allāh, 'Wa-mā khamsun bi-khams'. Qāl: Mā naqaḍa qawmun al-ʻahd illā sallaṭa Allāh ʻalyhim ʻadūwahum, wa-idhā ḥakamū bi-ghayr mā anzala Allāh taʻālá illā afshā Allāh taʻālá fīhim al-faqr, wa-mā ẓaharat fīhim al-fāḥishah illā awqaʻa Allāh taʻālá fīhim al-mawt, wa-mā ṭaffafū al-mikyāl illā muniʻū al-nabāt wa-ukhidhū bi-al-sinīn, wa-mā manaʻū al-zakāh illā ḥubisa ʻanhum al-maṭar. Wa-hādhā mā samiʻnāhu ʻanhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Intahá ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Ḥadīths, miscellaneous quotations, and invocations": lā yastaʼkhirūn sāʻatan wa-lā yastaqdimūn.

3. Incipit of "Qiṣṣat Muʻādh ibn Jabal": "Wa-hādhihi 'Qiṣṣat Muʻādh ibn Jabal' wa-afʻāluhu maʻa ahl al-Yaman, wa-sayaʼtī bayānuhā, wa-hiya awwal mā dhakarnā. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Fa-subḥān mumīt al-aḥyāʼ, wa-bāʻith al-amwāt, wa-mudabbir al-araḍīn wa-al-samāwāt ..."
3. Secundo folio of "Qiṣṣat Muʻādh ibn Jabal": al-khalāʼiq wa-al-bashar min kull unthá wa-dhakar.

4. Incipit of "Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes, and useful advices": "Qāla Ibn Mālik, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanh: Lil-muʼmin khamsat aʻyād, awwaluhā: Kull yawm yamurru al-muʼminīn, wa-lā yuktabu ʻalayhi dhanb, fa-huwa yawm al-ʻīd. Thānī: al-Yawm alladhī yakhruju min al-dunyā bi-al-īmān, wa-al-shahādah, wa-al-ʻiṣmah min kayd al-Shayṭān, fa-huwa yawm ʻīdih. Thālith: al-Yawm alladhī tajāwaza ʻalá al-ṣirāṭ wa-amin aḥwāl al-Qiyāmah, wa-takhallaṣ min yad al-khuṣūmah wa-al-zabāniyah, fa-huwa yawm ʻīdih. Rābiʻ: al-Yawm alladhī yadkhulu al-Jannah, wa-yaʼman min al-Jaḥīm, fa-huwa yawm ʻīdih. al-Khāmis: al-Yawm alladhī yanẓuru fīhi Rabbahu jalla jalāluhu, fa-huwa yawm ʻīdih ..."
4. Secundo folio of "Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes, and useful advices": an yujʻala fī qindīl min qanādīl al-ʻArsh.
14.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 18 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather.
In calligraphic naskh script, in black ink, on laid white paper; headings in red; text fully vocalized; catchwords.
Folios 106b-107a are blank.
On folios 107b-108b: Miscellaneous poems.

1. Colophon of "Qiṣṣat Sayyidinā al-Ḥusayan ibn Sayyidinā ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib": "Wa-hādhī mā intahá ilaynā min 'Qiṣṣat Sayyidinā al-Ḥusayn ibn al-Imām ʻAlī', raḍiyá Allāh taʻālá ʻanhumā, wa-laʻana Allāh Yazīd wa-qawmahu al-fasaqah al-liʼām, wa-ghafara Allāh lanā, wa-ilá kull al-Muslimīn faraj, wa-ʻizz, wa-faraḥ, wa-nūr, ʻalá 'Dhawī al-Nūrayn' [?] raḥmat Allāh, ʻalá al-dawām. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Sanat 1287."

1. Translation of the colophon of "Qiṣṣat Sayyidinā al-Ḥusayan ibn Sayyidinā ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib": "This is what has reached us of the 'Story of our Master al-Ḥusayn ibn al-Imām ʻAlī', may God Almighty be pleased with both, may He condemn Yazīd and his godless and wicked kinsfolk. May God forgive us, and grant to all Muslims comfort, honor, joy, and light. May the mercy of God be upon 'Dhawī al-Nūrayn' [?] continuously. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and his companions, and grant them peace. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. Amen. Year 1287 [of the Hijrah = 1870/1871]."

2. Colophon of "Ḥadīths, miscellaneous quotations, and invocations": No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-min duʻāʼ Ibn Daqīq al-ʻĪd, kāna yaqūlu kull yawm idhā aṣbaḥ: Allāhumma irziqnī al-uns fī waṭanī, wa-al-ʻāfiyah fī badanī, wa-al-barakah fīmā razaqtanī, Yā Arḥam al-Rāḥimīn."

3. Colophon of "Qiṣṣat Muʻādh ibn Jabal": "Wa-hādhī mā intahá ilaynā min 'Qiṣṣat Muʻādh ibn Jabal', raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhihi al-qiṣṣah al-ḥāwiyah li-mā fīhā min al-maʻānī al-jawharīyah fī awṣāf Khayr al-Barīyah, wa-afʻāl aṣḥābihi al-bararah al-taqīyah, ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muqirr bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-laṭīf al-khabīr, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻAtmānī, min ṭāʼifat al-ʻAtāminah, min Ṣāliḥīyat Miṣr al-Kubrá, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh, wa-li-wālid wālidayhi, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah, wa-daʻā lil-Muslimīn min baʻdihi. Āmīn. Yā Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Fī 24 Jumād Thānī, sanat 1287 [lil-Hijrah = 21 September 1870]."

3. Translation of the colophon of "Qiṣṣat Muʻādh ibn Jabal": "This is what has reached us of the 'Story of Muʻādh ibn Jabal', may God Almighty be pleased with him. The copy of this story which includes the fundamental meanings of the traits of the Best of Creation, and the pious deeds of His righteous companions, was completed by the hand of the poor and wretched, who admits his guilt and negligence, and hopes for the forgiveness of his gracious and discerning Lord, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻAtmānī, of the ʻAtāminah clan, of Ṣāliḥīyat Miṣr al-Kubrá, may God forgive him, his parents, the parents of his parents, him who invokes forgiveness for him, and the Muslims after him. Amen. O Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family, and all his companions, and grant them peace. Amen. Dated, 24 Jumād Thānī, of the year 1287 [of the Hijrah = 21 September 1870]."

4. Colophon of "Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes, and useful advices": No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-qad ruwiya ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam annahu qāl: Arbaʻat anfār yadkhulūn al-Jannah, wa-lam yarḍá Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhim: Aḥaduhum waladan aṭāʻa wālidayhi wa-ʻaṣá Allāh taʻālá. Wa-al-thānī imraʼatun aṭāʻat zawjahā wa-ʻaṣiayt Allāh taʻālá. Wa-al-thālith ʻabdan aṭāʻa mawlāhu wa-ʻaṣá Allāh taʻālá. Wa-al-rābiʻ rajulun ḥasuna maʻāmalatuhu maʻa al-kabīr wa-al-ṣaghīr wa-ʻaṣá Allāh taʻālá. Min fatāwá al-Ẓahīr: ʻAṣīyu Allāh lā yad[khul] al-Jannah illā bi-ʻafw Allāh; inshāʼa ʻafā ʻanhu, wa-inshāʼa adkhalahu al-nār."

record.title: Collection of three manuscripts on Arab medicine : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of "al-Raḥmah fī al-ṭibb wa-al-ḥikmah" supplied by Hartford Seminary.
2. Title of "Maʻrifat al-ʻurūq fī al-insān" from incipit (folio 40a, fourth group).
3. Title of "Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī ʻilāj al-abdān" from folio 43a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of "al-Raḥmah fī al-ṭibb wa-al-ḥikmah": The beginning is missing. Text starts with: "... inṭalaqat al-ḥarārah al-gharīzīyah, wa-kāna dhālika sabab al-halāk, wa-al-raṭib fa-idhā ḥaṣalat al-māddah lahā bi-al-ghidhāʼ qaṭaʻat qawādim al-inasān al-ḥāddah ʻalá qadr mā yuqdim ʻalayhi al-ṭabīʻah wa-ḥarakat al-lisān alladhī jaʻalahu Allāh dhawqaṭ [li-dhawq (?)] al-ṭaʻām wa-tarjumān lil-kalām, wa-yaqlubu yamīnan wa-shimālan ilá al-aḍrās fa-taṭḥanuhu ..."
1. Secundo folio of "al-Raḥmah fī al-ṭibb wa-al-ḥikmah": fa-tubakhkhir bi-hi al-ṭabīʻah bukhāran ṣaḥīḥan.

2. Incipit of "Maʻrifat al-ʻurūq fī al-insān": "Kitāb Maʻrifat al-ʻurūq fī al-insān. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: 'Yakhruju min bayn al-ṣulb wa-al-tarāʼib', fa-hiya al-nuṭfah, tajtamiʻu min ghishāʼ fawqa al-yāfūkh, wa-aṭrāf al-shaʻr, wa-ʻurūq al-dimāgh, wa-sharādīf al-ṣadr, wa-ḥijāb faqāqīr al-ẓahr. Thumma rakkaba Allāh taʻālá fī ibn Ādam arbaʻ ṭabāʼiʻ, wa-hiya al-Shitāʼ, wa-al-Ṣayf, wa-al-Kharīf, wa-al-Rabīʻ, wa-shamāl wa-janūb, wa-qabūl wa-dabūr, wa-al-māʼ wa-al-rīḥ wa-al-nār wa-al-turāb ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Maʻrifat al-ʻurūq fī al-insān": fa-yasqūna jamīʻ mā fīhi min al-ukhrá.

3. Incipit of "Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī ʻilāj al-abdān": "Kitāb Mukhtaṣar fī al-ṭibb. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ḥimyah raʼs kull dawāʼ, wa-lam yunzil dāʼan illā wa-la-hu dawá. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-aṣfiyāʼ wa-aṣḥābihi al-atqiyāʼ, ṣalātan dāʼimah, mā wāfaqa dāʼ dawá. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'Mukhtaṣar fī al-ṭibb', nāfiʻ in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, ikhtaṣartuhu min 'Taqwīm al-abdān' li-Ibn Jazlah, wa-min 'al-Kifāyah' li-Abī Sahl Maʻmar ibn Madyan al-Fārisī, wa-ghayrihā, wa-sammaytuhu: 'Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī ʻilāj al-abdān', jaʻalahu Allāh khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm, wa-wasīlatan ilá jannāt al-naʻīm ..."
3. Secundo folio of "Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī ʻilāj al-abdān": wa-sammaytuhu: 'Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī ʻilāj al-abdān'.
13 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 14 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover; dark red leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the leaves are reinforced with new paper on the edges; headings in red; some comments on the margins; catchwords.

On cover: An ownership statement, dated 1197 of the Hijrah (1782/1783) "Hādhā kitāb ḥikmah, ilá al-Sayyid ʻUthmān ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-samā [al-musammá] al-Khayyāṭ. Allāhumma ighfir la-hu wa-lī waladihi wa-lī jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, al-ḥayā [al-aḥyāʼ] minhum [...] fī sanat 1197."
Includes a purple colored insert of a medicinal recipe written in ink and pencil, bearing a square seal of a crown and the letters: BATH.
The folios of the codex are in six parts (102 leaves): 8 + 12 (blank leaves) + 1 (medicinal recipes) + 55 (the three manuscripts) + 4 (medicinal recipes) + 22 (blank leaves).
On folio 1a (first group): A table of contents of an unidentified work on medicine.
Folios 1b-2a (first group) are blank.

On folio 2b-3a (first group): A love poem in 17.5 verses. Starts with: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qum naḥwa ḥimāhu wa-ibtahij // wa-ʻalá dhāka al-muḥayyā fa-ʻuj." It ends with: "Yā ʻādhila qalbī wayḥaka fa-daʻ."
On folio 3b-6a (first group): A table of contents of an unidentified work on medicine.
On folio 6b-8b (first group): A collection of medical advices and recipes. Followed by 12 blank leaves. Followed on folio 1a by medical recipes and advices.
At the upper left corner of folio 1a (fourth group): An ownership statement: "Hādhā lī ʻUthmān al-Usṭah."
At the upper right corner of folio 55b (fourth group): An ownership statement: "Ilá ʻUthmān al-Usṭah."
On the four leaves of the fifth group are popular medicinal recipes in different hands.

1. Colophon of "al-Raḥmah fī al-ṭibb wa-al-ḥikmah": No colophon. Text ends with: "... Dawá lil-ḥabal. Yuʼkhadh waraq ghubayrā yābis, yudaqqu nāʻiman, wa-yunkhal min khirqah, wa-yuḍrabu bi-marārat baqar, wa-yuṭlá bi-hi al-dhakar, wa-tujāmaʻ al-marʼah, taḥmil wa-dhālika ʻaqib al-ṭuhr min al-ḥayḍ."

2. Colophon of "Maʻrifat al-ʻurūq fī al-insān": No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-khalaq al-riʼah bāridah raṭbah, wa-hiya tamlaʼu al-jānibayn lāṣiqah bi-al-qalb, mughaṭṭāh lil-fuʼād, turawwiḥu ʻanhu wa-tusakkin al-ḥarārah ʻan kull al-jasad. Wa-khalaqa al-ḥulqūm bārid raṭib, wa-jaʻalahu raʼs al-riʼah, wa-jaʻalahā madkhal al-nafas wa-makhrajahu, lā yadkhulu fīhā ghayruhu. Wa-jaʻala raʼs al-ḥulqūm fī al-ḥanjarah, wa-jaʻala fī al-ḥulqūm muṣṭalaḥ al-baṭn. Wa-Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá aʻlam."

3. Colophon of "Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī ʻilāj al-abdān": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with the section on "Awjāʻ al-maʻidah" (Ailments of the stomach), as follows: "... wa-amrāḍuhā munqasimah ilá arbaʻat aqsām: al-Awwal al-shahwah al-kalbīyah, wa-al-thānī ala-shahwah al-kādhibah, wa-al-thālith al-ghathayān, wa-al-rābiʻ al-shabaʻ al-kādhib. Fa-ammā al-kalbīyah, huwa an yaʼkul al-insān ilá an yashbaʻ, wa-fawqa al-shabaʻ, wa-huwa yashtahī al-ṭaʻām, wa-yastamlī al-ghidhāʼ fī jawfihi wa-yanhaḍimu sarīʻan qabla iʻādat al-haḍm al-muʻtadil, fa-yajūʻu jūʻan shadīdan, wa-lā yuṣaddiqu matá yalqá al-ṭaʻām. Fa-hādhihi al-shahwah al-kalbīyah. Sabab dhālik ziyādat khalṭ ṣafrāwī muḥtaqin fī al-maʻidah. al-ʻIlāj yashrab māʼ al-laymūn maʻa al-sukkar, aw, yataqayyaʼ bil-milḥ wa-al-ʻasal, aw, bi-māʼ al-baḥr ..."

record.title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat Jahān Shāh : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: Incipit missing. Text starts with: "... wa-al-thimār wa-al-miyāh. Qāla al-rāwī: Fa-qaʻadū ʻinda al-qurūd muddata khams sanawāt, thumma innahum ṣabarū ilá ayyām Tishrīn, wa-ʻamilū yaraq, wa-qālū nasīru ilá bilād al-naml, mā naṣil ilá bilādihim illā wa-al-Shitāʼ qad ḥakam, wa-yakūnū al-naml fī awkārihim, nuʻaddī bialādahum wa-nakhluṣ min sharrihim. Thumma inna Jahān ṣāḥa ʻalá al-qurūd, wa-qāla lahum: Nurīd nusāfir ilá aṭrāf al-bilād, fa-ʻamilū al-yaraq wa-rakibū wa-sāfarū ḥattá aqbalū ilá ḍayʻah min ḍiyaʻ al-qurūd ..."
Secundo folio: kullamā lahum yakthur wa-yaʻuḍḍū.
15.2 x 22 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark red leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on laid white paper; catchwords.

Inside the front cover: A reader's statement: "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Ghanī, Muḥammad ibn Salīm Aghā ʻAbdī Āghā, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi. Āmīn. 4 Muḥarram 205 [1205 lil-Hijrah = 13 September 1790]."

Inside the back cover: A reader's statement (in pencil): , as follows: "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-Sayyid Muḥammad Salīm Shaykh al-Shabāb wa-Shaykh Qiṭāṭ." And a name (in purple): "ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd Ṣāliḥah."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... iltafata Karīm al-Dīn ilá ummihi wa-qāla la-hā: anā abī kāna ismuhu Dāniyāl al-Ḥakīm, mā khallā lī shayʼ abqá atabārak fīhi min atharih. Fa-qālat la-hu: Yā waladī, abūk tarak ʻindī ṣundūq, wa-qāla lī, idhā saʼalaki ibnī wa-qāl aysh tarak lī abī, iʻṭīhi hādhā al-ṣundūq, wa-akhrajat la-hu īyāhu, fa-fataḥahu, raʼá fīhi awrāq min kitāb, fa-akhadhahum, wa-naẓara fīhim, wa-qāla la-hā: Yā ummī, baqīyat hādhihi al-awrāq aysh jará lahum. Fa-qālat la-hu: Yā waladī, lammā sār abūk yajīb aʻshāb wa-yaṣnaʻ la-hu dawāʼ li-ajl al-ḥayāh wa-al-mamāh [wa-al-mamāt] wa-aqbala ilayhi Jarbal [Jibrīl], ʻaylayhi [ʻalayhi] al-salām, ʻalá dhālika al-jisr, fa-ramā al-kitāb min yadihi fī dhālika al-nahr, wa-baqiyat hādhihi al-awrāq, wa-abūk jābahum ilá al-bayt ..."

record.title: Treatises on Islamic law and Arabic grammar : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.
record.note: 1. Title of "Sharḥ al-thalāthat abyāt fī aqsām al-shubhah al-thalāthah" supplied by cataloger based on incipit.
2. Title of "Aḥkām lāsīmā wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hā" supplied by cataloger based on incipit.
3. Title of "Iʻrāb qawl Miḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī 'Qalla man junna illā wa-anzala'" supplied by cataloger based on incipit.
4. Title of "Suʼāl ʻan iʻrāb lafẓ 'Araʼayta' idhā urīda bi-hi maʻná 'Akhbirnī'" supplied by cataloger based on incipit.
5. Title of "Taqyīd laṭīf lil-abyāt allatī naẓamahā al-Sujāʻī fī al-khulʻ wa-aḥkāmih ʻalá wajh mukhtaṣar mufīd" supplied by cataloger based on incipit (folio 8b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of "Sharḥ al-thalāthat abyāt fī aqsām al-shubhah al-thalāthah": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, afḍal rusul Allāh, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīn khalaṣū min ittibāʻ al-shubuhāt, wa-fāzū bi-nayl al-makārim fī al-ḥayāh wa-baʻda al-mamāt. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'Sharḥun laṭīf lil-thalāthah al-abyāt alltī naẓamtuhā fī aqsām al-shubhah al-thalāthah', lakhkhaṣtuhu min 'al-Qawāʻid' lil-Imām al-Zarkashī, wa-min 'Sharḥ' al-ʻAllāmah Shihāb al-Dīn Sayyidī Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī 'alá 'al-Arbaʻīn al-Nawawīyah', raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-himā ..."
1. Secundo folio of "Sharḥ al-thalāthat abyāt fī aqsām al-shubhah al-thalāthah": faqad qālū yuʻazzaru wāṭī al-rajʻīyah.

2. Incipit of "Aḥkām lāsīmā wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hā": "Aḥkām lāsīmā wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hā, li-jāmiʻihā al-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa qadr Ḥabībihi fī al-dārayn, wa-naṣabahu li-khafḍ al-ʻidā, lāsīyamā yawm Badr wa-Ḥunayn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi al-kirām, wa-ʻalá man tabiʻahum min al-sādah al-bararah al-aʻlām ... Ammā baʻd, fa-iʻlam ... anna alladhī yalī lafẓ 'Lāsīyamā' ḥālatān, al-tankīr wa-al-taʻrīf, fa-in kāna nakirah jāza fīhi thalāthat awjuh, al-jarr wa-al-rafʻ wa-al-naṣb ..."
2. Secundo folio of "Aḥkām lāsīmā wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hā": wa-ʻalá man tabiʻahum min al-sādah al-bararah.

3. Incipit of "Iʻrāb qawl Miḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī 'Qalla man junna illā wa-anzala'": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī azāla bi-nūr al-ʻilm kull ẓalām, wa-jaʻalahu rāfiʻn limā ashkala min al-awhām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi nujūm al-Islām. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad ashkala ʻalá kathīr iʻrāb qawl Imāminā al-aʻẓam al-nafīs, wa-walī niʻmatinā al-Imām Muḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī, ṭayyaba Allāh tharāhu 'Qalla man junna illā wa-anzal', wa-qad ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ al-ikhwān bayān dhālik, fa-ajabtuhu dafʻan li-tilka al-awhām ..."
3. Secundo folio of "Iʻrāb qawl Miḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī 'Qalla man junna illā wa-anzala'": maḥallahu li-anna illā lā yubtadaʼu bi-hā.

4. Incipit of "Suʼāl ʻan iʻrāb lafẓ 'Araʼayta' idhā urīda bi-hi maʻná 'Akhbirnī'": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad waqaʻa al-suʼāl ʻan iʻrāb lafẓ 'Araʼayta' idhā urida bi-hi maʻná 'Akhbirnī'. Wa-qad waqaʻa fī al-Qurʼān al-Sharīf mutakarriran, fa-aradtu an ajmaʻa khulāṣat mā dhakarahu al-naḥwīyūn fī dhālik, maʻa bayān wa-tawḍīḥ li-mā hunālik, fa-aqūlu: Qāla al-Akhfash 'Inna al-ʻArab akhrajat 'Araʼayta' ʻalá maʻnāhu bi-al-kullīyah, fa-qālū 'Araʼytaka' wa 'Araytaka' ..."
4. Secundo folio of "Suʼāl ʻan iʻrāb lafẓ 'Araʼayta' idhā urīda bi-hi maʻná 'Akhbirnī'": qāla ʻan ayy shayʼ min ḥālihi tasʼalu.

5. Incipit of "Taqyīd laṭīf lil-abyāt allatī naẓamahā al-Sujāʻī fī al-khulʻ wa-aḥkāmih ʻalá wajh mukhtaṣar mufīd": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr Mawlāh, Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī, shakara Allāh la-hu jamīʻ al-masāʻī: Hādhā Taqyīd laṭīf lil-abyāt allatī naẓamtuhā fī al-khulʻ wa-aḥkāmih ʻalá wajh mukhtaṣar mufīd, jaʻalahu Allāh khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm, wa-nafʻan ladyhi yawm al-mazīd. Āmīn. Wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Qawl al-nafīs fīmā yataʻallaqu bi-al-khulʻ ʻalá madhhab al-Shāfiʻī ibn Idrīs. Iʻlam anna al-khulʻ, bi-ḍamm al-Khāʼ al-muʻjamah, lughatan, maʼkhūdh min al-khalʻ bi-fatḥihā, wa-huwa al-nazʻ ..."
5. Secundo folio of "Taqyīd laṭīf lil-abyāt allatī naẓamahā al-Sujāʻī fī al-khulʻ wa-aḥkāmih ʻalá wajh mukhtaṣar mufīd": fī shahr kadhā tamurru ayyāmuhā.
16.3 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 22 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.

1. Colophon of "Sharḥ al-thalāthat abyāt fī aqsām al-shubhah al-thalāthah": "Intahá, maʻa taqdīm wa-taʼkhīr, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

1. Translation of the colophon of "Sharḥ al-thalāthat abyāt fī aqsām al-shubhah al-thalāthah": "It is completed, with some adjustment forward or backward, but God is more knowledgeable of what is correct. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and all his companions, and grant them peace. Amen."

2. Colophon of "Aḥkām lāsīmā wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hā": "Intahá. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá. Wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-aḥibbatihi wa-muḥibbīhi, kullamā dhakaraka al-dhākirūn wa-ghafala ʻan dhikrihi al-ghāfilūn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Qāla muʼallifuhā: Wa-kāna al-farāgh min tabyīḍihā yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, li-ithnay ʻashar min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, yawm Mawlidihi al-Sharīf, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-taslīm, ʻalá yad jāmiʻihā al-ʻabd al-faqīr, Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Sujāʻī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī, ḥaqqaqa Allāh la-hu āmālahu, bi-jāh Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam."

2. Translation of the colophon of "Aḥkām lāsīmā wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hā": "It is completed. Praise be to God, and that is sufficient. Peace be on His worshipers whom he selected. May God pray on Our Master and Leader Muḥammad, on his family, his companions, those whom he loves, and those who love him, whenever You [God] are remembered by those who remember You, and whenever the heedless forget to mention Him [Prophet Muḥammad]. Amen. Amen. Its author said: The fair copy was completed on blessed Monday, the twelfth day of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, the day of His noble birth, may the best prayer and the purest peace be upon Him, by the hand of its compiler, the poor servant, Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Sujāʻī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azharī, may God fulfill his hopes, by the status of our Master Muḥammad, may God pray on Him and grant Him peace."

3. Colophon of "Iʻrāb qawl Miḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī 'Qalla man junna illā wa-anzala'": "Intahá mulakhkhaṣan. Wa-ḥāṣil al-jawāb ʻan dhālik, anna baʻḍ mā dhukira yataʻayyanu bi-nāʼuhu lil-mafʻūl, li-kawnihi lam yarid illā kadhālika, wa-baʻḍuhā jāʼa mabnīyan lil-fāʻil wa-al-mafʻūl. Wa-al-aṣaḥḥ bināʼuhu lil-mafʻūl, wa-hādhā huwa al-manqūl. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

3. Translation of the colophon of "Iʻrāb qawl Miḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī 'Qalla man junna illā wa-anzala'": "It is completed in summary. The concluding answer about the issue is that what was mentioned could be constructed in the passive voice, because it did not occur except in that format, and some was constructed in both the active voice and the passive voice. However, the more correct is to construct it in the passive voice because this is what has been transmitted. But God is more knowledgeable. May God pray on Our Master and Leader Muḥammad, on his family, and his companions, and grant them peace."

4. Colophon of "Suʼāl ʻan iʻrāb lafẓ 'Araʼayta' idhā urīda bi-hi maʻná 'Akhbirnī'": "Intahá. Wa-fīhi radd ʻalá man qāl 'Hādhihi al-masʼalah mimmā lā yaʻrifuhu ahl al-maʻānī'. Wa-Allāh aʻlam'. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman dāʼiman ilá Yawm al-Qiyāmah."

4. Translation of the colophon of "Suʼāl ʻan iʻrāb lafẓ 'Araʼayta' idhā urīda bi-hi maʻná 'Akhbirnī'": "It is completed. It includes a reply to those who say that 'This issue is not known to the rhetoricians'. But God is more knowledgeable. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and his companions, and grant them abundant and continuous peace until the Day of Resurrection."

5. Colophon of "Taqyīd laṭīf lil-abyāt allatī naẓamahā al-Sujāʻī fī al-khulʻ wa-aḥkāmih ʻalá wajh mukhtaṣar mufīd": "Wa-fī hadhā al-qadr kifāyah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl."

5. Translation of the colophon of "Taqyīd laṭīf lil-abyāt allatī naẓamahā al-Sujāʻī fī al-khulʻ wa-aḥkāmih ʻalá wajh mukhtaṣar mufīd": "This amount is sufficient. But God is more knowledgeable of what is correct, to Him is the reference and returning. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and his companions, and grant them peace. Praise be to God in all circumstances."

record.title: Collection of two treatises on parsing and taqlīd : manuscript.
record.note: Title of "Risālah fī iʻrāb Kalimat al-tawḥid" supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Title of "Shurūṭ al-taqlī" supplied by cataloger based on incipit (folio 7b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of "Risālah fī iʻrāb Kalimat al-tawḥid": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala 'Kalimat al-tawḥīd' ʻalāmah ʻalá al-īmān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid kull insān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-dhurrīyatihi dhawī al-iḥsān. Ammā baʻd, fa-aqūlu: Qad iḍṭarabat aqwāl al-muʻribīn lil-kalimah al-musharrifah 'Lā ilāha illā Allāh', fa-qāla al-jumhūr: Lā nāfiyah lil-jins, wa-ilāh ismuhā, wa-khabaruhā maḥdhūf, al-taqdīr mumkin ..."
Secundo folio of "Risālah fī iʻrāb Kalimat al-tawḥid": lā ifādat annahu taʻālá mawjūd.

Incipit of "Shurūṭ al-taqlīd": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī bayyana al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, wa-amaranā bi-taqlīd ayy wāḥid min al-aʼimmah al-arbaʻah al-mujtahidīn al-aʻlām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Sayyid al-Anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-aʼimmah al-kirām. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī jalastu maʻa Shaykh mashāyikhī al-Shaykh al-Fuḍālī, yawm al-Khamīs, wa-kāna jālisan maʻanā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Sādāt, fa-asmaʻa Shaykhanā baytayn yataʻallaqān bi-shurūṭ al-taqlīd, fa-qāla la-hu Shaykhunā: Anā aḥfaẓu baytayn ghayra hādhayn al-baytayn yayaʻallaqān bi-shurūṭ al-taqlīd ayḍan, fa-asmaʻahum Shaykhunā lanā, wa-amaranī bi-kitābatihimā, wa-amlānī ʻalayhimā sharḥan ..."
Secundo folio of "Shurūṭ al-taqlīd": al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Sādāt fa-asmaʻa.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 10.5 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire), wrapped in a typewritten sheet of paper.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on thick white paper; headings and keywords in red; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

Colophon of "Risālah fī iʻrāb Kalimat al-tawḥīd: "Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam, kullamā dhakarahu al-dhākirūn wa-ghafala ʻan dhikrihi al-ghāfilūn. Tamma al-kalām ʻalá al-Kalimah al-Musharrifah."

Translation of the colophon of "Risālah fī iʻrāb Kalimat al-tawḥīd": "May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the Illiterate Prophet, on his family, and companions, and grant them peace, whenever He is remembered by those who remember, and whenever the heedless forget to remember Him. The discourse on the Noble Statement is completed".

Colophon of "Shurūṭ al-taqlīd": "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā yassarahu Allāh ʻalá al-baytayn al-madhkūrayn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tamma al-risālatān bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Allāh, Ibrāhīm Suwaydān kathīr al-masāwī al-Ḥayārī, ʻufiya ʻanhu wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of of "Shurūṭ al-taqlīd": "This is the end of what God facilitated on the two aforementioned verses. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the Illiterate Prophet, and on his family and companions, and grant them peace. The two treatises are completed, by the praise of God and His help, by the hand of the poorest of the servants of God, Ibrahīm Suwaydān al-Ḥayārī, of the many offenses, may he and the Muslims be forgiven. Amen."

record.title: 880-01 Risālah fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Abū Isḥāq al-Tūnisī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī bayyana al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, wa-amaranā bi-taqlīd ayy wāḥid min al-aʼimmah al-arbaʻah al-mujtahidīn al-aʻlām. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-lā ʻudwāna illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī ūtiya al-ʻilm wa-al-yaqīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-qāla Abū Isḥāq al-Tūnisī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Saʼalanī baʻḍ ikhwānī al-rāghibīn fī ṭalab al-ʻilm ʻan al-īmān wa-al-Islām, hal humā makhlūqān am ghayr makhlūqayn, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik, rājiyan lil-thawāb, rāghiban ilá Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá fī al-tawfīq ilá al-ṣawāb ..."
Secundo folio: huwa al-imtithāl li-amr Allāh.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 8 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on thick white paper; keywords in red; few corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālah fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd, lil-Shaykh Abū Isḥāq al-Tūnisī, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-tusammá ayḍan bi-Matn al-Shaykh al-Tūnisī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn. Āmīn. Bi-jāh Sayyid al-Awwalīn wa-al-Ākhirīn.
On folio 1a: Three verses of poetry praising the acquisition of knowledge, and a Ḥadīth on the different reasons for acquiring knowledge.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah fī shahr Rajab al-fard, sanat 1284, alf wa-miʼatayn wa-arbaʻah wa-thamānūn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá yad kātibihā al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAẓīm al-Qādir, ʻabduhu ʻĀmir ibn Sulaymān ʻĀmir, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn, wa-li-man daʻā ilayhi bi-khayr. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed during the sacred month of Rajab, of the year 1284, of the Hijrah of the Prophet (November 1867), by the hand of its copyist, the poor to his Exalted and Mighty Lord, his servant ʻĀmir ibn Sulaymān ʻĀmir, may God forgive him, his parents, the Muslims, and him who invokes wellbeing for him. Amen. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and his companions, and grant them abundant peace.

record.title: 880-02 Ṣifat ṣalāt al-tasbīḥ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr Imāmʹzādah al-Jūghī.
record.note: Title from front cover and colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla fī 'Shirʻat al-Islām' wa-sharḥihā: 'wa-aṣaḥḥ mā jāʼa min nawāfil al-ṣalāh 'Ṣalāt al-tasbīḥ', fa-yuṣallīhā al-ʻabd kull yawm, aw jumʻah, aw shahr, aw sanah, aw fī al-ʻumr marrah' ..."
Secundo folio: ʻAbbās raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu.
14 x 22 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 7 lines per page.
Binding: In thick cardboard.
In calligraphic large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; text fully vocalized; catchwords.
On folio 1a (in pencil): "Ṣifat ṣalāt al-tasbīḥ."
Folio 6a is blank; text folios 1b-5b.
On folio 6b: Calculation of the numbers of recitation of "Ṣalāt al-tasbīḥ", amounting to 75 times.
On the back cover: Calculations, and a date: 2 Rabīʻ Awwal 1312 (3 September 1894).
Text of 'Ṣifat ṣalāt al-tasbīḥ' ends with: "... qawluhu 'Lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm' fa-huwa ḥasan."
Colophon: "Tammat 'Ṣifat ṣalāt al-tasbīḥ', bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl."
Translation of the colophon: "'Ṣifat ṣalāt al-tasbīḥ' ended thoroughly and completely. Praise be to God in all circumstances."

record.title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-Qarīb al-Mujīb fī Sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... ayḍan bi-Abī Shujāʻ, Shihāb al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Aḥmad al-Iṣfahānī, saqá Allāh tharāhu ṣayyib al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu aʻlá farādīs al-jinān. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, abtadiʼu kitābī hādhā, wa-Allāh ism lil-dhāt al-wājibat al-wujūd, wa-al-Raḥmān ablagh min al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, huwa al-thanāʼ ʻalá Allāh taʻālá bi-al-jamīl ʻalá jihat al-taʻẓīm. Rabb, ay, mālik. al-ʻĀlamīn, bi-fatḥ al-Lām, wa-huwa kamā qāla Ibn Mālik, ism jamʻ khāṣṣ bi-man yaʻqil, wa-laysa mufraduhu ʻālaman, bi-fatḥ al-Lām, li-annahu ism ʻāmm li-mā siwá Allāh, wa-al-jamʻ khāṣṣ bi-man yaʻqil ..."
Secundo folio: fa-al-awwal muqtabas min qawlihi taʻālá.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 11 unnumbered quires).
In good large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the original "al-Taqrīb" in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

Under the colphon: An ownership statement, as follows: "Malaka al-faqīr al-Sayyid al-Shaykh Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Hādī al-Sayyid hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah inshāʼ Allāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālih."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min min hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārakah, fī 12 Muḥarram, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn sabʻah wa-sittīn khalat min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá sākinihā afḍala al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-salām. Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Ṣāḥib wa-mālik hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah al-Shaykh Bayyūmī, alladhī bi-Kutāb Jāmiʻ Turbānah. Wa-al-salām khitām."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on blessed Friday, 12 Muḥarram, of the year 1267 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [17 November 1850], may the best prayer and the most perfect peace be upon its sojourner. It was completed by the praise of God, His help, and His abundant benevolence. This blessed copy was written and owned by al-Shaykh Bayyūmi of Kuttāb Jāmiʻ Turbānah. Peace be the conclusion."

record.title: 880-02 al-Maftaḥ li-mughlaq Ḥizb al-fatḥ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Wafāʼ al-Muqrī ibn al-Muwaqqiʻ.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-minhu al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alāḥa lil-arwāḥ mā tamma lahā bi-hi al-irtiyāḥ min ẓulmin kathīf al-ashbāḥ, wa-ashhadu an lā mudīra li-sharīf falak al-rāḥ illā al-Karīm al-Fattāḥ, wa-ashhadu anna afḍala rāqin ʻalá manār al-najāḥ muʼadhdhinan fī jawāmiʻ tawḥīdihi al-muṭlaq bi-ḥayya ʻalá al-falāḥ ... Wa-baʻd, fa-qad ushīra ilayya ... waḍʻ maʻānī raqīqah ... ʻalá Ḥizb Imām al-Sharīʻah wa-al-ḥaqīqah ... Ustādhī ... al-Imām Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Maftaḥ li-mughlaq Ḥizb al-fatḥ' ..."
Secundo folio: bayān ẓarīf ḥaqāyiqih.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on thick paper; the phrases of "Ḥizb al-fatḥ" in red; text within double red frame; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "al-Fatḥ li-mughlaq Ḥizb al-fatḥ, mimmā fataḥa bi-hi al-Ḥaqq bi-lisān al-ṣidq ʻalá al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Shams al-Dunyā wa-al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Wafā al-Muqrī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Muwaqqiʻ, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn. Tamm."

On folio 1a: A quotation from "Tashīl al-sabīl", a commentary on the Qurʼān by al-Shaykh "Abī al-Ḥasan" (probably "Tashīl al-sabīl fī fahm maʻānī al-Tanzīl" of Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bakrī, 1493 or 1494-1545 or 1546), commenting on the verse "Wa-min al-nās man yashtarī lahwa al-ḥadīth", which includes a fatwá from some of the "fuqahāʼʼ" (Islamic law scholars) of Zabīd (Yemen), at the end of the 9th century of the Hijrah (15th century), stating that drinking coffee is permissible, as follows: "Wa-min Tashīl al-sabīl, tafsīr al-Qurʼān, lil-Shaykh Abī al-Ḥasan, min Sūrat al-Qamar, fī qawlihi taʻālá: 'Wa-min al-nāsi man yashtarī lahwa al-ḥadīth', mā naṣṣuhu: 'Wa-qad ḥadatha fī awākhir al-miʼah al-tāsiʻah anna al-bunn al-mawjūd bi-al-Yaman wa-al-Ḥijāz kathīr al-qishr, wa-yuṭbakh qishruhu, fa-yakhruju minhu māʼ aswad, yuqālu la-hu al-qahwah, wa-takallama fīhi nās kathīrūn, wa-al-ḥaqq annahu nafsahu mubāḥ, fa-in kāna wasīlah li-shurbihi ṣāra qurbatan, kamā aftá bi-hi baʻḍ fuqahāʼ Zabīd, wa-huwa ḥasan. Wa-ammā al-idārah, fa-qad ʻulima ḥukmuhā. Intahá."

On folios 1a, 2a, 4b, 5b, 6b, 8a, 10b: A black, oval "waqf" (endowment) stamp, inscribed with: "Yā Mawlāy Yā Wāḥid Waqafa lillāh taʻālá ʻazza shaʼnuhu hādhā al-kitāb Muḥammad al-Sayyid Abū al-Anwār al-Sādāt, 1193."

The author states on folio 10b that he finished his commentary on Tuesday, 29 Ramaḍān, of the year 945 of the Hijrah (7 July 1538), as follows: "... nahār al-Thulāth al-mubārak, al-tāsiʻ wa-al-ʻishrūn min shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam qadruhu wa-ḥurmatuh, min ʻām khams wa-arbaʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah, wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hā kamā nafaʻa bi-aṣlihā, wa-an yanshurahā fī al-āfāq."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-ijʻalnā Allāhumma maʻa alladhīna anʻamta ʻalayhim min al-Nabīyīn wa-al-ṣiddīqīn wa-al-shuhadāʼ wa-al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-ḥasuna ulāʼika rafīqan, sālikīna bi-faḍlika al-sanan al-aqwam, fa-inna sarīratanā ʻāmirah bika bi-faḍlika, wa-Anta Rabbanā bi-dhālika aʻlam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-qarābatih, wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Tamma dhālik."

record.title: 880-02 Shurūṭ al-imāmah : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Janzūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu rājī raḥmata al-Ghafūri // Muḥammad al-mashhūru bi-al-Jamzūrī. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi alladhī hadānā // wa-zādanā min faḍlihi imtinānā. Thumma al-ṣalātu wa-al-salām sarmadā // ʻalá al-Nabīyi al-Hāshimīyi Aḥmadā ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-lā yakūnu tābiʻan li-ghayrihi.
24 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 6 x 18 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; no comments on the margins; no catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Shurūṭ al-imāmah lil-Shaykh al-Janzūrī, ʻalá al-tamām."

The present poem has a commentary, under the title "al-Durr al-jusām fī sharḥ shurūṭ al-maʼmūm wa-al-imām", by Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Munayyir al-Samannūdī, 1687 or 1688-1784 or 1785 (See: Hartford Seminary Arabic MSS 902).
The poem of al-Janzūrī ends with: "... Wa-imnaʻ ṣalāta al-ẓuhri min kulli aḥad // in Jumʻatan kānat furādá fī al-balad. Wa-kull hādhā qad afāda al-Ramlī // ʻalá ahlihi futyā wa-hādhā maḥallī."
Colophon: "Tammat bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Ḥamīd. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tamm."
Translation of the colophon: "It was completed by the help of the Praiseworthy God. May God pray on Our Master Muḥammad, on his family, and his companions, and grant them peace. It is completed."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Urjūzah fī al-ism alladhī yaʻmalu ʻamala fiʻlih : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger, based on folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi urjūzah naẓamtuhā fī al-ism alladhī yaʻmalu ʻamal fiʻlih, wa-qad waqaftu ʻalayhim ʻasharah. Fa-min dhālika amthilat al-mubālaghah, maʻdūdah bi-wāḥid, illā annahum khamsah. Fa-kull fard minhum naẓamtuhu ʻalá ḥidatihi, takmalu dhālika arbaʻata ʻashar. Wa-qad aʻrabtu mā naẓamtuhu. Wa-anā asʼalu Allāh al-taysīr fī al-itmām ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalá al-ẓarfīyah mutaʻalliq bi-ghadā.
13 x 19 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In large clear naskh script, in black ink, on white laid paper; the verses of the original poem in red; some commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Ammā baʻd, fa-qad ashāra ilayya baʻḍ al-ikhwān alladhīna hum ilayya ka-al-ʻayn lil-insān, al-ḥāʼizīn sharaf ṭalab al-ʻilm wa-ḥifẓihi wa-naqlihi an ashraḥa urjūzatī alladhī naẓamtuhā fī al-ism alladhī yaʻmalu ʻamala fiʻlihi sharḥan yaḥullu rumūzahā, wa-yūḍiḥu maknūzahā, wa-yakūnu li-khafāyāhā jalī, nāfiʻan li-kull mubtadī mithlī, fa-sharaʻtu fī dhālik, maʻa ishtighāl al-khāṭir fī al-bāṭin wa-al-ẓāhir, wa-innī kamā qāla al-shāʻir: Wa-law kāna rumḥan wāḥidan la-ittaqaytuhu // walākinnahu rumḥun wa-thānin wa-thālithu. Fa-jāʼa bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá sharḥ laṭīf li-khafāyāhā, jalī nāfiʻ li-kull mubtadī mithlī."

The original poem, "al-Urjūzah" of al-Sujāʻī starts with: "Yaqūlu ʻabdun qad summiya bi-Aḥmadā // wa-kātibun bayna al-anāmi qad ghadā. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qad khaṣṣanā // ʻArabīyatan bihā nuqīmu al-alsunā. Thumma al-ṣalātu ʻalá al-Nabīyi al-Muṣṭafá // wa-ālihi al-ḥāyizīna al-sharafā. Wa-baʻdu iʻlam anna mā qad ʻamila // ka-fiʻlihi arbaʻatan [wa-]ʻashran nuqilā ..." It ends with: "... Wa-in aradta lāziman fa-irfaʻ bi-hi // maddan wa-mā wa-al-naṣbu lā tuʻna bi-hi."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... fa-irfaʻ, al-Fāʼ wāqiʻah fī jawāb al-sharṭ, wa-irfaʻ fiʻl amr mabnī ʻalá al-sukūn, wa-fāʻiluhu mustatir wujūban, taqdīruhu anta. Bi-hi, al-Bāʼ ḥarf jarr, wa-al-Hāʼ fī maḥall jarr, wa-al-jārr wa-al-majrūr mutaʻalliq ..."
